75b4(mdo sde): can de dag der skyes nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos par 'gyur zhing de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed par yang gyur cig/ sems bskyed ma
75b5(mdo sde): zag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can 'ga' yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang / sdug
75b6(mdo sde): bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / gcig la gcig 'gums par 'gyur ba'i gnod sems kyi sems dang ma bral bar 'gums pa'i dus bgyid par ma gyur cig/ de slan chad mi khom pa rnamasu skye bar ma gyur cig/ 
75b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnamasu skye bar ma gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi bral bar gyur cig/ chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la snyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ 
75b8(mdo sde): den sems can thams cad tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa dang / phra dog dang / ser sna dang bral bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnam par spangs par gyur cig/ sangs
76a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis gang bar gyur cig/ sems can gang dag der skye bar 'gyur ba dag 'jam pa'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems
76a2(mdo sde): dang / khon med pa'i sems dang / gdug pa med pa'i sems dang / zhi ba'i sems dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'od gsal bar
76a3(mdo sde): gyur cig/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yon tan chen po bkod pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngag nas kyang ganga' zhing
76a4(mdo sde): dris khyab par gyur cig/ de na sems can dag rtag tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sdug bsnga dal gyi sgra yang mi grags par gyur cig/ ji srid du bdag
76a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpar gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu dag gisang sa rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'jog par 'gyur ba de srid du
76a6(mdo sde): bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bsam pa yongasu dag pa'i sems can de lta bu dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par bkod pa de'i 'og tu bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/ 
76a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o// bdag byang chub thob pa na 'od dpag tu ma mchis par gyur cig/ phyogs bcu gzhan gyi sangs/ 
76a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu bdag gi lus mtshan gyis brgyan pa gda' bar gyur cig/ de na sems can gang dag gis bdag mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can gang dag gi 'dod chags
76b1(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal dang / 'chab pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ 
76b2(mdo sde): thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur cig/ ting 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ji lta bu dag 'tshal ba de lta bu dag kyang bdag mthong bas thob par gyur cig/ de na
76b3(mdo sde): sems can gang dag grangs pa'i sems can dmyal bar skyes par gyur pa de dag gis kyang bdag mthong bas bde ba'i tshe rab 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ dge slong bsam gtan
76b4(mdo sde): gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bu'i bde ba'i tsher rab thob par gyur cig/ de dag gis bdag mthong nas/ lu ngas dang sems kyi bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur nas/ bla na
76b5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par/ gyur cig/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing / der bla na med pa yang dag
76b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag yi dgas kyi gnas rnamasu skyes par gyur pa dag gis kyang bdag mthong bar gyur cing snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ bla na
76b7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnasu skyes pa rnams la yang brjod par bgyi'o// lha rnams la yang de bzhin du sbar te/ 
76b8(mdo sde): bdag gi 'od kyang nyis gyur du snang bar gyur cig/ bdag gis tshe yang dpag tu ma mchis par gyur cig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sus kyang bgrang bar rngo mi thog/ 
77a1(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis
77a2(mdo sde): gang dag bsgrags par 'gyur ba dag gi bsngags pa rjod par gyur cig/ de na sems can gang dag gis bdag gis bsngags pa thos par gyur pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu sngo bar
77a3(mdo sde): gyur cig/ de dag 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ma gtogs pa
77a4(mdo sde): dag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ bad dag byang chub thob pa na gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchi pa dag gis sems can rnams kyis
77a5(mdo sde): bdag gi ming thos par 'gyur zhing bdag gi sangasargyas kyi zhing du skye 'tshal bar gyur cig/ de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe na yang bdag tshogs du mas yongasu bskor cing
77a6(mdo sde): rab ring ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gang sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i legs pa bshad pas/ sems can de
77a7(mdo sde): dag tshim par bgyid par gyur cig/ dad pa de nyid sems med pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig/ sems dga' ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yang thob par gyur cig/ 
77a8(mdo sde): 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na/ sems can gang dag nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang / theg
77b1(mdo sde): ba gsum ngon du mi gnyer ba rnams dang lha dang mi phun sum tshogs bdag don mi gnyer ba rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btsal ba don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang / bsod nams / 
77b2(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po gsum ba don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang / chos ma lags pa dang / 'dod chags la chags pa rnams dang / 'dod pa mi bad pas zil gyis non pa rnams dang / chos
77b3(mdo sde): logs pas sems bkris pa de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe na bdag tshogs du mas yongasu bskor te/ mdun du mchis nas 'od dang ting 'dzin gyis chos ston par gyur cig/ 
77b4(mdo sde): la bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang ston par gyur cig/ byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar yang gyur cig/ sems can de dag kyang bdag la mchog tu dgan
77b5(mdo sde): gling dang bathob par gyur nas/ byang chub tu sem sa skyed par gyur cig/ de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshar bathams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ de dag
77b6(mdo sde): ting 'dzin nyi ma'i sgron mthob par gyur nas/ gti mug spangs par gyur cig/ de dag 'gum pa'i dus bgyis nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan
77b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa leg so leg so// khyod kyis ni smon lam bzang por btab bo// des gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag
77b8(mdo sde): smon lam de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur blta na/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phyi/ 
78a1(mdo sde): ma'i char rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang blan med pa'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma
78a2(mdo sde): skyes par gyur cig/ bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi nas snang zhes bgyi bathob par gyur cing de yang bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur cing rigs kyi bu des ting nge 'dzin ma nam dang 'i
78a3(mdo sde): bdang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i bye ma'i char bab bde yang bdag nyid kyis mthong la
78a4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa gang dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag kyang mthong ba dang / bcom ldan 'dra
78a5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu shin tu myur bar spos kyi cha ra yang babal/ sems can bgrang ba las 'das bdag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa dang
78a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod seng ge'i spos shes bya bar gyur cig/ seng ge'i spos khyod ni bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na/ 
78a7(mdo sde): shar phyogs legs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das pa der 'jig rten gyi
78a8(mdo sde): khams dri sngo snang ba rdul bral zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/ seng ge'i spos khyod ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin
78b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba rdul dral smras na mo nga drug rgyal ba zhes bya ba nag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar 'gyur/ rags ldadun
78b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i spos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i stang po'i de la ba/ 
78b3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ lha mi lA min rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa longs/ srid pa'i 'gro bar sems can sdug bsngal khyod kyi sgrol/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'ching ga khyod kyis chod/ 
78b4(mdo sde): mo'i rgyal ba 'phags pa'i gang bganyid du 'gyur/ rigs kyi/ bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu brgyad pa gnad dab med ces bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// btsun pa
78b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag ni ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can khwa sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji sngo snang ba rdul bral ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba de ltar yongasu dag par 'god par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi
78b6(mdo sde): zhing de de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis khyab par gnas par
78b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de srid du byang chub sems dpar gyur cingasangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyad nasaslad kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
78b8(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mi spyod pa de lta bu'i byang chub sems
79a1(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi che bdag la bdun pa 'di la cig pu dben par mchis nas
79a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yongasu dag pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi skyon me ga pa la sems shing mchis pa na bdag gis ting 'dzin
79a3(mdo sde): snang ba bkod pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin khri cig stong bskyed cing thob ste bsgoms pa gang lags pa de dag ni btsun pa bco rgya rgyas ma 'gyur ba'i byang chu
79a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa lags so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan da'adas gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' ya nga sa mu ma mchis pa dag na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems
79a5(mdo sde): can rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos ston pa de dag dang / gang dag dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan
79a6(mdo sde): ces bgyi ba rgyal ba rnams kyis yongs su bltam pa de dag mthong zhing der 'jug par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin des bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang
79a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyeng dag mthong bar gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bdag gnas pa ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul
79a8(mdo sde): drug snyed kyi lus kyis re re la yang phyag 'tshal bar gyur cig/ re re la yang bdag gi lus re res rin po che dang me tog sna tshogs bla na ma mchis pa dag dang spos dang / 
79b1(mdo sde): me tog drang dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgra bla na ma mchis pa sna tshogs dang bkod bablan ma mchis pa thams cad kyis mchod par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyin
79b2(mdo sde): gcig tu yang bdag bskal pa rgya mtsho'i byem snyed spyod par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gis lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting 'dzin gyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas re re'i sa
79b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag 'tshal bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin yon tan 'byung gnas kyis de dag re re la yang sangs
79b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi stod pa bla na ma mchis dbadag gis stong par gyur cig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig mi 'dzums pa'i ting 'dzin gyis rdul gcig
79b5(mdo sde): gi steng du sems kyi skad cig gi tshad kyis rgyal ba rnams kyis bltam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mthong bar gyur ra cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
79b6(mdo sde): gi nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i ting 'dzin gyis sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dag na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems
79b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag mthong bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin gyis sems
79b8(mdo sde): can dmyal ba rnams su zhugs te/ sems can dmyal ba'i lus su sprul nas sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ 
80a1(mdo sde): chu ga par dzin tshul / mams ma dgapa nga rgyu mam sreng bar rgya
80a2(mdo sde): nas ga ngas nas rnams nal bamam pa par yul na kau nasangs rgyas com ldan 'das dag 'azhugs pa'as sa rgyas bcom ldan la ma da mamatsham can
80a3(mdo sde): ldag pas sa nas par gyu //  na rnams pa yang mi ga rnams pa yang na/ na byin rnams
80a4(mdo sde): rnams pa sa nas sal pa mas sa nga nam rnams pa / 
80a5(mdo sde): nas can sab nga ma rnag pa ma ra smra gsadang/  sa nga
80b1(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sems mgu bar bgyid cing chos kyang ston par gyur cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing bcud pa dang / rab tu 'god par yang
80b2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa la 'god par yang gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
80b3(mdo sde): stong phrag bcu po thams cad dag na sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la yang ci nas kyang sngon gyi las dang / nyon mongs pa ma lus par 'gyur ba dang / sems can 'ga'i sems kyi rgyud kyi
80b4(mdo sde): lam yang bdud bzhis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sems/ de can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba de srid du bdag gis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyad par bgyi'o// de'i
80b5(mdo sde): sla du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri yang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba rdul bral spos mtho dbang phyug rgyal po skar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri sngo snang ba rdul bral gyi yon tan bkod
80b6(mdo sde): pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba de ltar yong su dag par 'jog par gyur cig/ de bzhin du bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bdag gi 'khor yang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' seng ge spos
80b7(mdo sde): kyis smon lam btab pa bzhin du gyur cig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag gi sems
80b8(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ thams cad kyang sems mnyen par gyur cig/ sems la su rung bar gyur cig/ rang rang gi gling bzhi pa dag na sangs
81a1(mdo sde): rgyas bzhugs pa dag mthong bar gyur cig/ sems can de dag la rin po che sna tshogs bdag dang / me tog dang spos dang / byug pa dang / 
81a2(mdo sde): bye ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag 'dog par gyur la des sems can de dag sangs rgyas de dag la yang mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang
81a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin snang ba bkod pa'i mthus bdag nyid kyis mthong bar gyur cig/ tshig de
81a4(mdo sde): brjod ma thag ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyi sa mthong bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu leg so legaso// 
81a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod ni rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kho ra khor yug/ tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa khri 'jog par 'gyuraro// sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi
81a6(mdo sde): sems kyi rgyud yongasu dag par byed par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la mchod pa dpag tu med pa dag byed par spro bar yang 'gyur// 
81a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kun du bzang po zhes bya bar gyur cig/ kun du bzang po khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ 
81a8(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pan byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nasasangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung drug cu'i khyim snyed 'das
81b1(mdo sde): bden/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes kyi chu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/ kun tu bzang po khyod ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
81b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rjes rnam par bsgyings
81b3(mdo sde): pa'i dbang drug tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ de bzhin
81b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos gtugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ brtul
81b5(mdo sde): zhugs bzang po rab tu dga' ba sems dul longs// dam bcas bstan pa sems can rnams kyi rgyud sbyongs la/ khyod kyis sems can nyon mongs mi/ 
81b6(mdo sde): bzang klung las grol// khyod ni 'jig rten ye shes sman mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur// rigs kyi bu yang de 'tshon srog chags le lo can khris tshig 'thun par 'di skad
81b7(mdo sde): ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
81b8(mdo sde): spyod cing yongasu dag par 'jog par 'gyur ba na/ bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su
82a1(mdo sde): 'gyur bar bgyi'o// de ltar bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur cig/ rigs/ 
82a2(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos srog chags khri bo de dag la 'di skad ces lung bstan te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
82a3(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i tshe khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams de'i kho ra khor yug dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
82a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ stong stong zhing mtshan 'thun pa'i de bzhin ga/ shegs par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste stong ni de bzhin ga shegs pa me lce thab kung dbang phyug dbyangs shes bya bar 'gyu ro// 
82a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa sdom pa'i dbang phyu/ gdabyangs shes bya bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal
82a6(mdo sde): po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa gya nom 'jigs med dbyangs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa dri med// 
82a7(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi gzi brjid dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// lnga brgya yang mtshan 'thun ste/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dbyangs shes bya bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin du nyis stong lnga brgya ni
82a8(mdo sde): 'jigs bral drags pa'i rgyal po dang / 'od gzer bral ba'i dbyangs dang / grags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs dang / rnam 'grel tshes grags dang / snying po grags pa
82b1(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / rin chen rgyal tshan dang / snang ba'i dbang phyug dang / thub chen ye shes 'bar ba'i dbang phyug dang / gnas kyi gos bsags rgyal po dang / ye shes blo gros bsam yas snying / 
82b2(mdo sde): po dang / ye shes lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang brtson 'grus chen po'i dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang lhun po'i dpal lta bu dang / ye shes rdul bral zhugs
82b3(mdo sde): dang ci'i dbang phyug sa bon dang / ye shes shin tu dri med sgrogs pa'i dbang phyug dang / yon tan rgya mtsho'i zil non rgyal po dang / ye shes 'byung ba stobs kyi rgyal po dang / byang chub
82b4(mdo sde): rdul bral rgyal po dang thub pa dpal brtsegs shugangs kyi me tog dang / ye shes dpal brtsegs blo dang rdo rje seng ge dang / tshul khrims 'od gsal dang
82b5(mdo sde): bzang mchog dang / 'od gser mtha' yas dang seng ge dga' dang / ye shes mi bzad brtsegs dang / rin chen snang ba dang / ye shes dri med dang / ye shes
82b6(mdo sde): rgyags pa dang / seng ge grags pa dang / mngon shes yon tan rgyal po dang / chos kyi sna ma'i me tog char 'bebs dang / 'od byed dang / lhun po mngon par 'phags dang
82b7(mdo sde): chos yang dag 'phags rgyal po dri med dang spos kyi dbang phyug dang dri med spyan dang / rab tu che bsags dang / thogs med stobs kyi rgyal po dang / rang gi ye shes bso
82b8(mdo sde): nams stobs dang / ye shes chos gos dang / dbang sgyur dang / chags med phan bzhed dang / ye shes yang dag 'byung dang / lhun po chen po dang stobs kyi snying pa
83a1(mdo sde): das ston tan byu gnas dang / 'khri gang ma thag rgyal dang / yon tan 'ad dang / gti mug rnams bral yan tan rgyal pa dang / 
83a2(mdo sde): mchog dang / chos kyi tog dang / dbyangs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / legs sbas dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen dbang phyug dang / mngon 'phags rgyal mtshan
83a3(mdo sde): dang / ri bo lta bu dang / dga' sprin dang / chos byed dang / sa la'i rgyal po dang / kun sbed dang / rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang / ye shes yang dag bstsags dang / ye shes 'od
83a4(mdo sde): 'phro dang / me tog sna tshogs can dang / glang po che'i dbang po'i dbang phyug dang / u dum pa ra'i me tog dang / gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang / chos ni rgyal
83a5(mdo sde): mtshan dang / sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang / tsan dan/ dang / shin tu brtan pa dang / mthus gnon dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sgron ma dang / ye shes go
83a6(mdo sde): rims dang / rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan dang / rnam rgyal chos grags dang nga rgyal sgrogs dang / yon tan 'od 'phro dang / ye shes 'od dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / bde ba
83a7(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / ye shes dbyangs dang / rgyal mtshan bsdus pa dang / rdo rje'i sgron ma dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal ba'i grangs dang / rab tu brtan pa dang / blo gros zla ba'i
83a8(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / rim gyis sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang / sa la'i dbang po seng ge'i sku dang / sred med kyi bus rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po dang / yon tan rin chen yang dag bsags dang / skar ma'i snyi
83b1(mdo sde): bo dang / skam rnams 'jig grags pa dang / bsod nams stobs la'i rgyal po dang / yid 'ong ba'i dbyangs dang / tshangs mchog dang / yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong ni sgo/ 
83b2(mdo sde): kyi pad+ma rnam rgyal grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / 'od gzer gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang spos kyi pad+ma dam pa'i shugs dang / yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas ye shes
83b3(mdo sde): bla ma dang / 'dzam bu'i grib ma dang / yon tan ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang / seng ge'i tog dang / klus spangs me tog gzi brjid rgyal po dang / dri zhim sa bon bdag med dang / yon tan
83b4(mdo sde): bdud rtsi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba dag tu 'gyur ro/  // gzhan yang stong ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom rapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos byin rgyal po klu
83b5(mdo sde): dbang rnam grol sad byed 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i mig gi ri bo zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa gzhan dang gzhan dag tu nyi ma gcig dang / dus gcig
83b6(mdo sde): tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / de dag gi tshe tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro// srog chags khri bo de dag gis de bzhin
83b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos gtugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' sprul pa/ klu ltar bstan par sgrogs dag re
83b8(mdo sde): shig longs// dge ba'i nor rnams dag ni yang dag sogs gyis la// pha rol phyin pa rnams la myur du brtson gyis dang // lha mi 'jig rten rnams kyi 'dren pa dag tu 'gyur// / 
84a1(mdo sde): bam po bdun pa// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ rgyal bu dgu pa sdig med ces bya ba la smras pa dang / snga ma bzhin du skur te/ des gsol pa
84a2(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung
84a3(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams bdag gi dbang lags par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang bdag
84a4(mdo sde): gis khyod kyi spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du bdag byang chub
84a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'gyod pa'i sems skye bar ma gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug pa nye bar bzung ba'i bar du/ dam bcas pa brtan zhing ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid par
84a6(mdo sde): gyur cig/ sems can gzhan gyi sems 'khrug par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ bdag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems mi skyed par gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
84a7(mdo sde): kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba skye bar ma gyur cig/ rmugs pa dang gnyis dang ldan par ma gyur cig/ rgod pa dang ldan par ma gyur cig/ 'gyod pa dang ldan par ma gyur
84a8(mdo sde): cig/ the tsom dang ldan par ma gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ srog gcod pa ma mchis pa dang / ma byin par len pa ma
84b1(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa ma mchis pa dang / brdzun du smra ba ma mchis pa dang / phra ma ma mchis pa dang / ngag rtsub po ma mchis pa dang / tshig kyal ba ma mchis pa dang / brna ba
84b2(mdo sde): sems ma mchis pa dang / gnod sems ma mchis pa dang / log par lta ba ma mchis pa dang / the tsom dang ldan pa ma mchis pa dang / chos la mi gus pa'i sems ma mchis pa dang / slu
84b3(mdo sde): ba'i sems ma mchis shing chos de dag ma mchis par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug pa nye bar bzung ba'i bar du gom pa 'dor ba tsam la yang rtag tu sangs rgyas rje su dran pa'i sems dang sems
84b4(mdo sde): las byung ba dag 'jug par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa da dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / mi 'bral bar
84b5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ tshe rabs thams cad du yang rab tu 'byung ba thob par/ gyur cig/ tshe rabs thams cad du phyag dar khrod par gyur cig/ chos gos gsum pa dang / shing drung ba dang / 
84b6(mdo sde): cog pu pa dang / dgon pa pa dang / bsod snyoms pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / chos ston pa dang / tshig btsun pa dang / spobs pa dpag tu ma mchis pa
84b7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar ma gyur cig/ brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams kyis phas kyi rgol ba 'dul bar ma gyur cig/ bud med la stong pa nyid dang / 
84b8(mdo sde): ldan pa'i chos ston par ma gyur cig/ stong pa nyid yid la bgyid pas bud med la chos ston par ma gyur cig/ lag pa sgyur zhing chos ston par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu bdag theg pa
85a1(mdo sde): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed par gyur cig/ bdag chos smra ba gang la chos nyan pa na de la ston par
85a2(mdo sde): 'du shes kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyur cig/ bdag chos smra ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ji lta ba de ltar rim gro bgyid pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / 
85a3(mdo sde): ri mor bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid par gyur cig/ chos smra ba la bdag gi sha dag gis kyang bsnyen bkur bgyid pa gyur cig/ bdag snod dang snod ma lags par mi rtog par sbyin pa sprin
85a4(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ bdag chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig/ bdag chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag skyed par ma gyur cig/ bdag byang chub don du
85a5(mdo sde): gnyer ba'i sems can rnams la rang gi srog gi sbyin pas yo/ ngasu skyob par gyur cig/ bdag nyid kyi brtson 'gru/ sa kyi stobs dang / smon lam gyis nye bar bsgrubs pa'i rdzas/ 
85a6(mdo sde): kyis sems can rnams sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar par bgyid par gyur cig/ bdag rab tu byung ba'i rtags can nam/ khyim pa'i rtags can ltung ba
85a7(mdo sde): byung ba 'am/ ltung ba ma byung ba dag la skul bar bgyid par ma gyur cig/ bdag rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la rtag tu me dang / dug dang mtshon cha lta bur
85a8(mdo sde): 'du shes skyed par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pa'i smon lam 'di dag byang chub kyi mthar thug pa nye bar bzung / 
85b1(mdo sde): ba'i bar du yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur blta na/ de'i slad du bdag gi sug pa gnyis su lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong mchis pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ mu khyud dang bcas pa/ 
85b2(mdo sde): ma'i kha tog ltar 'od gsal ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ rgyal bu sdig med kyis tshig de smras mthag tu lag pa gnyis ji ltar 'dod pa de lta bu'i 'khor lo dag byung bar gyur pa dang / yang gsol/ 
85b3(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bdag gi reb 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur blta na/ de'i slad du 'khor lo 'di dag/ 'di ltar thams cad
85b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag sgras mngon par go bar ba gyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung ston pa/ dran ba mi brjed pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ stong pa nyid sgom pa la spyod
85b5(mdo sde): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod du/ stsal pa'i sladu/ ji ltar klu'i rgyal po dga' bo// dang nye dga' bo gnyis mchi ba de lta bu'i sgra gsang
85b6(mdo sde): mthon pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa steng bdag tu mchi bar gyur cig/ gang dag der skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi rna ba'i dbang po dag tu yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ 
85b7(mdo sde): grag par gyur cig/ grags ma thag tu yang sems can de dag gi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna rab/ 
85b8(mdo sde): tu zhi bar gyur cig/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la bgyid pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu
86a1(mdo sde): rgyal bu sdig med kyis 'khor lo rin po che dag btang ba dang / de dag 'di ltar mgyogs par song ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
86a2(mdo sde): 'das mgyogs pas gshegs pa de bzhin du 'khor lo rin po che de dag kyang song ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu song nas
86a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' lung ston pa/ dran pa mi brjed pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa la spyad pas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'din/ 
86a4(mdo sde): du bcugs/ sems can gang dag gi rna pa'i nga po ches kyi rnam/ grangs 'di klag par gyur pa ded/ dathams cad kyi 'dod chags dang ser sna'i bar gyi sems
86a5(mdo sde): dang sems las byung ba dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul ya ngal byed pas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
86a6(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'khor lo de dag kyang yud tsam gcig gis phyir log ste/ rgyal bu sdig mod kyi mdun du 'dug ga/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin ga
86a7(mdo sde): b.rin po che'i snying pos rgyal bu sdig med la leg so zhes bya ba byin/ rigs kyi bu leg so legs// khyed kyini smon la mo shin tu bzang po btab / lha'i 'khor
86a8(mdo sde): lo rin po 'di dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong dag tu btang bas na srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag rnyog pa med pa'i sems dag la bkad/ 
86b1(mdo sde): cing byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur cig/ mi 'khrugs pa khyod ni 'jig rten gyi yong su 'dren par 'gyur gyis/ 
86b2(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu dag 'dod pa long shig/ mi 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ji ltar sa gzhi thams
86b3(mdo sde): cad gser las grub cing lag 'thil ltar mnyam la lha'i nor bu rin po che rnam par bkam pa gseg ma dang gyo mo dag ma mchis pa/ gor mi'i ka ba dang / pha bong dang / ri dgas ma
86b4(mdo sde): mchis shing / ka tsa lin di ka ltar rag na bde zhing 'jadam la/ rkang mthil bzhag na ni nems shes brgya da/ rkang mthil bteg na ni bar ces bgyid pa de lta bu'i
86b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag 'tshal te/ de na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'o/ skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi
86b6(mdo sde): dgas kyi yul dag ma mchis par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dri nga ba dag ma mchis par gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lha'i las shin tu 'das pa'i spos kyi khyab par gyur cig/ 
86b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dag gis kun tu gang bar gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams la rga ba dang / nad dang 'gum pa ma mchis par gyur/ 
86b8(mdo sde): cig/ gcig gis gcig 'jigs pa ma mchis pa dang / gcig la gcig tho 'tsham pa ma mchis pa dang / sems can rnams la dus ma lags par 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang / 
87a1(mdo sde): 'gyod cing 'gum da ma mchis pa dang / mnyam par bzhag par 'gum pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams sangs rgyas rje su dran pa yid la
87a2(mdo sde): bgyid par gyur cig/ ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par stong pa rnams skye bar ma gyur cig/ byang chub cing yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyi
87a3(mdo sde): bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams 'dod chags chung ba
87a4(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung bar gyuracig/ de na thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas gnas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
87a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing de na sems can rnams gzo bgyid par ma gyur cig/ de nang ngan song gi rgyu mtshan mchis par ma gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams la bdud kyi glags rnyed pa'i lam ma
87a6(mdo sde): mchis par gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams la mdog ngan pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams la 'di lta ste/ rje bo dang / bran gyi rim pa ma mchis par
87a7(mdo sde): gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams la bdag gi ba ma mchis shing yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tha na g.yar lam na yang khu
87a8(mdo sde): ba 'byin pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na sems can thams cad chos 'tshal ba dang / chos yongs su tshol ba lhur len par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can 'ga'
87b1(mdo sde): yang log par lta ba mi 'gyur zhing / gzhan mu stegs can yang ma gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams la lus ngal ba ma mchis shing / sems ngal ba ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na sem/ 
87b2(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur cig/ de na sems can thams cad la bkres pa dang / skom pa dang rnam par tho 'tshams pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ ji
87b3(mdo sde): ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams bzhin du kha zas ji lta bu dag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu dag mdun du rin po che'i snod dag nas 'byung bar gyur cig/ bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / 
87b4(mdo sde): mchil ma dang / snabs dang mchi ma dang / lus kyi rdul dag ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na grangs bam dmachis pa dang / tshab ma mchis par gyur cig/ dri bda'
87b5(mdo sde): ba dang nyams dga' bar gyur cig/ de na reg na bde ba'i bser ma dag ldang bar 'gyur zhing / de dag lha dang mi rnams kyi spos kyi bya ba bgyid par gyur cig/ gang gi
87b6(mdo sde): tshe 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / ji lta bur 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe gcig ni bser ma bsil ba 'tshal la/ gcig shos ni dron po 'tshal ba dang / la la ud pa la'i dri bad
87b7(mdo sde): ba'i bser ma 'tshal la/ la la ni tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri bda' ba'i bser ma 'tshal ba dang / la la ni dus kyis rjesu 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyi dri 'da' ba dang / la la ni rgya spos kyi dri gda' ba dang / la
87b8(mdo sde): la ni a ka ru'i dri bda' ba'i bser ma 'tshal la/ la la ni thams cad kyi thams cad du bser ma ye mi 'tshal bar 'gyur na yang de dag gis ji ltar sems bskyed cing dmigs pa de bzhin du 'grub par
88a1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de snyigs ma lnga dang bral bar gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams la rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i khang pa
88a2(mdo sde): brtsegs pa de dag na gang du mi dag mchis par 'gyur bar rin po che sna bdun gyi khri shing bal gyi sngas 'jam po dag gis kun tu g.yogs shing / ka tsa lin da ki ltar reg na 'jam pa dag 'byung
88a3(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi khor yug dag tu gang mi de dag chab kyi bya ba bgyid par 'gyur bar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chab kyis yongasu bltam pa'i rdzing dag 'byung bar gyur
88a4(mdo sde): cig sna ma'i me tog gi shing dang / shing ta la dang / nga shing ljon pa'i phreng bdag gis brgyan par gyur cig/  shing ljon pa de dag kyang me tog sna tshogs dang / 'bras busna
88a5(mdo sde): tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng sna tsho/ gas dang / rgyan sna tshogs dag gis brgyan par gyur cig/ 
88a6(mdo sde): de na sems can rnams gos dang rgyan ji lta bu 'tshal ba dag dpag bsam gyi shing de dag las blangs te gyon par gyur cig/ de bzhin du me tog rnams dang / rgyan dag gi bar yang
88a7(mdo sde): blangs te/ thogs par gyur cig/ bdag gi byang chub kyi shing rin po che sna bdun las grub par gyur la 'phang du ni dpag tshad stong mchis sdong po sboms su ni dpag tshad gcig mchis/ 
88a8(mdo sde): yal ga gyes pa'i khyon du yang dpag tshad stong mchis par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi shing de bser mas bskyod pa las/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang po dang
88b1(mdo sde): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra/ lha'i las shin tu 'das pa 'jam zhing yid du 'ong dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos par gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags
88b2(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i sems kyi dran pa so sor thob par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ bud med rnams ni 'di lta ste dper na bgyi na/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu mo ltar yon tan thams cad
88b3(mdo sde): dang ldan par gyur cig/ de na bud med rnams la dri nga ba ma mchis shing / lce gnyis dang phrag dog dang / ser snas dkris pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na mi rnams bud med dang
88b4(mdo sde): lhan cig tu lus sbyor zhing 'khrig pa spyod pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na skyes pa gang dag kun du chags pa'i se mas skyes par gyur na/ de mchis te kun tu chags pa'i
88b5(mdo sde): sems kyis yud tsam zhig bud med la bltas pas/ skyes pa'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyur nas/ shin tu yid byung ste/ slar ldog cing gtsang mas rdul dang bral
88b6(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin des bdud kyi zhags pa dag las yongasu grol nas/ slan chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye bar gyur cig/ de na bud med gang lagra
88b7(mdo sde): pa de dag kun tu chags pas skyes pa la brtags pa tsam gyis sbrum par 'gyur zhing / brtags pa tsam gyis gnyis ga'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u
88b8(mdo sde): 'am/ bu mo gang lags pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i lus dang / sems kyi bdeb
89a1(mdo sde): myong ba de lta bu'i lus dang / sems kyi bde ba myong bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang / bu mo dag gdugs mtshan
89a2(mdo sde): bdun du de lta bu'i bde ba nyam su myong bar gyur cig/ bud med sbrum ma de dag kyang 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ dge slong bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bu'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig/ 
89a3(mdo sde): sems can de dag kyang mngal gyi dri ma dang / mi gtsang bas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / dgung bdun pa la mchog tu dri bda' ba dang / bde ba'i yo byad dam pa dang ldan bzhin du btsa' bar gyur cig
89a4(mdo sde): bud med de yang sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar mi 'gyur zhing gnyis ka rdzing bur zhugs te/ khrus bgyis nas/ bud med des gang gis 'dod chags dang bral ba gtsang ba'i ting 'dzin
89a5(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa thob par gyur cig/ ting / 'dzin des 'dod chags kyi chos rnams las yongasu grol zhing rtag par rgyun tu mnyam par bzhag par gyur cig/ 
89a6(mdo sde): gang gis tshe rabs snga ma dag la bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por bud med kyi lus nyamasu myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las bgyis shing bsags pa gang lags pas kyang / ting 'dzin de mngon par
89a7(mdo sde): bsgrubs pas bud med kyi lus thams cad kyi thams cad du yongasu bas par 'gyur zhing yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du slan chad bud med kyi lus mi 'thob par gyur cig/ sems can gang
89a8(mdo sde): dag gis gang gi slad du bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa dag tu mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las bgyis shing bsags pa de dag gis bdag gis byang chub thob/ 
89b1(mdo sde): ba'i ming thos shing dad 'a thob par gyur nas/ de dag de nas shi 'phos kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing / mngal na gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig/ der sems can
89b2(mdo sde): de dag gi las de thams cad kyi thams cad du yongasu bas par gyur cing sems can de dag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du slan chad mngal na gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gi
89b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag las yongasu bas nas mngal du gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bud med dam mngal na gnas pa mngon pa'i sems can de dag kyang
89b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ da sna ma'i me tog gi shing dang / shing ta la dag bser maHbskyod par gyur pa na/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bcwa/ 
89b5(mdo sde): ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra skad nyam sa dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ sgra des mi rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes
89b6(mdo sde): bgyi ba thob par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin des sems can de dag gis stong pa nyid snang ba'i chos zab mo dag rtags par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra ma
89b7(mdo sde): mchis par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub kyi shong drung du mchis nas/ yud tsam gcig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur / 
89b8(mdo sde): bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zums pa ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od kyang mi mngon par gyur cig/ lha'i mig gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
90a1(mdo sde): dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od dag
90a2(mdo sde): bdag gis gtong bar gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu gang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgras chos ston par gyur cig/ de na
90a3(mdo sde): sems can gang dag mchis par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par gyur cig/ de dag gang dang gang du mchis pa dang / 'chag pa dang mchis pa dang / ldog
90a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba na/ de dag gis rtag par rgyun tu bdag mthong bar gyur cig/ de dag chos rnams la ji ltar the tsom du gyur pa na/ de dag gis bdag la bltam pa tsam dang / bdag
90a5(mdo sde): mthong ba tsam gyis de dag gi the tsom ma mchis par gyur ci/ ga/ bdag byang chub thob pa na/ phyogs bcu'i/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ 
90a6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 'am/ bla na med pa'i theg pa pa'i sems can gang dag mchis pa de dag gis bdag gi ming dang / bsngags pa thos par gyur cig/ 
90a7(mdo sde): de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ de dag gis der bdag las chos thos nas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang lags pa de dag ni rnam par
90a8(mdo sde): thar pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur cig/ de na gang dag theg pa chen po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang lags pa de dag gis ni bdag las chos thos nas ting nge 'dzin dang / 
90b1(mdo sde): gzungs kyi sgo dang / bzod pa zab mo dag thob par gyur cig/ de dag de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ bdag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni dpag tu/ 
90b2(mdo sde): ma mchis par gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ma gtogs par sus kyang bgrang bar rngo mi thog par gyur cig/ bdag gis byang chub thob pa na/ gang dang gang du mchis zhing sa phyogs
90b3(mdo sde): gang dang gang du rkang mthil bzhag pa de dang dar pad+ma 'dab ma stong mchis la gser gyi mdog lta bur gda' ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ pad+ma de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa gzhan dag tu mchis/ 
90b4(mdo sde): nas bdag gi bsngags pa dang / sgra dang dbyangs ba dad par gyur cig/ sems can de dag gis bdag dgi ming dang bsngags pa dang / snyan pa thos nas/ dga'
90b5(mdo sde): zhing rab tu dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skye bar gyur cig/ de dag rab tu dang ba skyes nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhi du skye 'tshal bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang der yongs
90b6(mdo sde): sngo bar gyur cig/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ bdag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang dge sbyong gi dri ma dang bral ba dang / dge sbyong gi
90b7(mdo sde): skyon dang / dge sbyong gi gyu dang bral ba dang / dge sbyong gi g.yo dang bral bar gyur cig 'khor rnams kyang chos lhur len cing yo byad lhur len pa ma lags pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti lhur
90b8(mdo sde): len pa ma lags pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur cig/ bdag gi 'khor rnams brtson
91a1(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams shing chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par gyur cig/ de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyir mi ldog par gyur pa de dag kyang ma/ 
91a2(mdo sde): 'ongs pa la zhugs pa'i dran pa thob par gyur cig/ de dag tshe 'phos nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gtam rjod par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du de dag gis chos de dag
91a3(mdo sde): mi brjed par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang bskal pa chen po khri'i bar du gnas par gyur cig/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang bdag gi dam pa'i chos bskal pa stong du gnas
91a4(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa yod su blangs pa ni leg so leg so// mi 'khrugs pa khyod ni ma 'ongs
91a5(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ grangs med pa gnyis pa la ba ba pa na/ shar phyogs logs su 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
91a6(mdo sde): stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar khyod kyi smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i yon tan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ der khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
91a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yang mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba nyid 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// mi
91a8(mdo sde): 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gang dag sems can du
91b1(mdo sde): bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can phung po dang / khams dang skye mched kyis yongasu zin pa de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig/ kho na ma mchis pa'i sems rnyog pa ma mchis pa'i sems
91b2(mdo sde): su gyur cig/ de dag 'di lta bu'i lus kyi bde ba myong bar gyur cig/ 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+ma la snyoms par zhugs shing des
91b3(mdo sde): bsam pa la spong ba rnam par dag par gyur pa de lta bur sems can rnams kyang lus dang sems kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag
91b4(mdo sde): 'tshal ba de'i tshe/ sa bzhi thams cad gser gyi kha dog da lta bur gda' bar gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu des de bzhin degashegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag
91b5(mdo sde): byas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can thams cad kyang nga ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur/ de'i tshe sa gzhi thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog lta bur
91b6(mdo sde): snang bar gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rab mchog sems mi 'khrugs pa longs// lag pa'i mthil na 'khor lo mchog rab gnas// mi rnams
91b7(mdo sde): mang po snying rje'i sems la bkod// blo gros dge khyod 'gro ba'i ston par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ rgyal bu bcu pa gangs kyi nor bu zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// 
91b8(mdo sde): rgyal bu gangs kyi nor bus kyang ji ltar mi 'khrugs pas smon lam btab pa de bzhin du smon lam btab bo// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta/ 
92a1(mdo sde): na/ de'i slad du sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bgyid pa thob par gyur cig/ thams cad kyi sug par yang tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying / 
92a2(mdo sde): dri 'byung bar gyur cig/ de dag thams cad kyis dri de yang sangs rgyas kyi sku dag la yongs su sngo bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smon lam rgya chen
92a3(mdo sde): po btab pa ni legaso legaso// gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi lag tu tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po bzhag pa dang / bsam pa thag pas sangs rgyas yid la byed pa bskyed pas na// rig
92a4(mdo sde): kyi bu de'i phyir khyod spos kyi glang po che zhes bya bar gyur cig/ da spos kyi glang po che khyod ni bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das na/ bskal pa grangs med
92a5(mdo sde): pa gang+gA'i klung gi byem snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/ dam bI
92a6(mdo sde): chos nub nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / spos kyi glang po che khyod 'jig rten gyi khams der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de
92a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// spos kyi glang po ches yang gsol pa
92a8(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe/ kun
92b1(mdo sde): dga' ra ba de thams cad du me tog tsam pa ka'i char rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la
92b2(mdo sde): yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe/ kun dga'i ra ba de thams cad me tog tsam pa ka'i tshar mngon par rab tu bab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ shin
92b3(mdo sde): tu dri zhim tshogs rab mchog sems longs// me tog tsam pa mchog gi char 'di 'ang rab tu gya nom dge ba'i lam ston la// 'gro ba mang po 'jigs med sgor khod cig/ rigs kyi bu
92b4(mdo sde): de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu bcu gcig pa seng dge zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// ji ltar spos kyi glang po ches smon lam btab pa bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin
92b5(mdo sde): po che'i snying po la rin po che'i rgyal mtshan phul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ kyis bu dam pa leg so lag so// khyod rin po che'i tog ces
92b6(mdo sde): bya bar gyur cig/ rin po che'i tog khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab
92b7(mdo sde): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de'i dam pa'i chos nub nas bar gyi bskal pa gsum 'das
92b8(mdo sde): pan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rgyal ba'i zla ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// der khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa grang
93a1(mdo sde): po rnam par bsgrags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs shes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
93a2(mdo sde): mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// rin po che'i tog gis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/ bdag gi ri ba 'di lta bu yongs
93a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltan de'i spyang/ gang gi tshe bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
93a4(mdo sde): ngag sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs te/ slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa sems can thams cad kyi
93a5(mdo sde): thob par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la phyag byas pa dang
93a6(mdo sde): bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis kyang / 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad snying rje'i sems la bkod par gyur pa de lta bu'i dran pa thob par gyur to// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshes
93a7(mdo sde): pa rin po che'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog la bka' stsal ba blo gros lags pa gzugs mchog brtan pa langs// sems can phyir ni dam bcas
93a8(mdo sde): rab brtan byas// skye bo mang po rdul bral sems la bzhag/ mi mchog sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ mnyen des la
93b1(mdo sde): mas pargyal du lnga brgyas dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'i phyag rgyas smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkad bdag yong su blangs pa de ltar smon lam btab cing deH
93b2(mdo sde): bu'i sangs rgyas kyi gong gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu blangs nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu blan
93b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyuro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// gzhan yang rgyal bu bzhi brgyas kyang rdo rjes
93b4(mdo sde): gcod pa shes rab snang ba'i dpal gyis ji lta bu'i sangs rgyas dkyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su blangs nasade dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che
93b5(mdo sde): snying dro 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// gzhan yang rgyal bu dgu bcus kyang kun tu bzang po// 
93b6(mdo sde): ji lta bu'i smon lam btab cing de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu blangs so// khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po thams cad kyis so so nas smon lam khyad par can dag btab cing / 
93b7(mdo sde): so so nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongasu blangs nas thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
93b8(mdo sde): dang gzhan dag tu byang chub thob par 'gyu ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de bzhin du srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis kyis
94a1(mdo sde): kyang so so nas smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongasu blangs nas/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
94a2(mdo sde): rin po che'i snying pos de bzhin du khyed cag kyang dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro zhes
94a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// rigs kyi bu de na bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i gcen/ bcung po brgyad
94a4(mdo sde): bcu po de dag gi thu ba bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khya bu bdag ces bya ba zhig yod de rigs kyi bu de nas bram na rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang
94a5(mdo sde): phyug khyab bdag la smras pa/ bram ze lce khyod kyis kya/ nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu dag pa yod/ su longs shig/ bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug
94a6(mdo sde): khyab bdag gis smras pa/ yab je khyod kyis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis smras pa bu je khyod kyis smon lam thob shig dang kho bos phyis smon lam gdab par bya'o// 
94a7(mdo sde): des smras pa/ yab cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu blang bar bgyi lags sam 'on tam yongasu ma dag pa blang bar bgyi lags mdun na 'don gyi gtso bos smras pa/ 
94a8(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u gang dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can yongs su len par byed cing / sems can bsam pa nyon mongs pa can
94b1(mdo sde): lta ba log par gyur pa dag gdul ba yang yong su len par byed pas khyod bdag rang gis shes par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag de de
94b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po gal ba der song ste phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
94b3(mdo sde): ni skye dgu'i lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ byang chub dam pa la reg par 'gyur ba de lta bur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tshal lags te bcom ldan 'das ji ltar da ltar/ 
94b4(mdo sde): gyi sems can rnams la 'dod chags chung ba dang zhe sdang chung ba dang / gti mug chung ba dang / skyo ba'i bsam pa can dang / 'khor ba la 'jigs pa dang
94b5(mdo sde): skyon du lta ba de ltar gang du bdag mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can rnams kyang de lta bur gyur cig/ de dag kyang bdag las
94b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bdag kyang sems can rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs
94b7(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos
94b8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa
95a1(mdo sde): la bab pa na/ bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog ces bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gling bzhi pa mchog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing skye dgu lo brgyad khri thub/ 
95a2(mdo sde): pa na/ byang chub mngon par 'thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che brtsegs pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyuraro// des gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom
95a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du kun dga'i ra ba 'di thams cad du mu tig dmar po'i char dag rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/ shing
95a4(mdo sde): ljon pa thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil da snyan gyi sgra dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu ga rang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis/ 
95a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe kun dga'i ra ba de tha mas cad du mu tig dmar po'i char dag kyang rab tu 'bab
95a6(mdo sde): shing ljon pa de thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan gyi sgra byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ mthu mchog mi zad shes rab
95a7(mdo sde): mdzod longs shig/ sems can snying rtse phan 'dod byams pa'i sems// khyod kyi bsam pa dag pa rdzogs 'gyur te// 'jig rten sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur/ 
95a8(mdo sde): bram ze'i bu gnyis pa yang dga' byung zhes bya ba des kyang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gis ji lta ba de bzhin du gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsa
95b1(mdo sde): pa bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyang bskal pa ung pa la yang dag rtags la sangs rgyas rgya na nga'ang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing skye dgu'i lo brgyad khrir 'phel ba na/ 
95b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du 'gyur// de bzhin du skur te gsum pas kyang gsol pa dang / lo nyis stong pa na skar mtha
95b3(mdo sde): dri zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyuraro zhes lung bstan to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs sna ma'i me tog dang / ri bo'i rgyal po dang / spyan bsdams dang
95b4(mdo sde): tshangs mchog dang / 'dzam bu'i grib ma dang / dang ba dang bla ma dang / rin chen ri bo dang rgyal mtsho'i snying po dang / sred med kyi bu dang gtsug tor can dang / gsar
95b5(mdo sde): thub dang thub dbang dang / ko'u din dang seng ge'i rtsal dang ye shes rgyal mtshan dang sangs rgyas smos/ sa pa dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rgyas pa dang
95b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang phan bzhed dang / shes rab snang dang dbang chen dang / zhi ba dang shes rab 'byung gnas dang / dga' ba dang / n+ya gro d+ha rgyal po dang / gser spyan dang phan bcas dang
95b7(mdo sde): gnyi dga' dang rin chen gtsug tor can dang / spyan bzang dang tshangs pa dang / mdzes pa dang / tshangs pa khyu mchog dang / sgra rab dang / chos kyi zla ba dang / don mthong dang
95b8(mdo sde): snyan pa dang / dga' can dang / grags mchog dang gzugs bzang dang / dri zhim dang grims g.yar dang rab mchog spyan dang / rab spong dang don bcas brtul zhugs dang
96a1(mdo sde): thugs kyi reb bzang dang / shes rab mchog dang / gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang spyan mdzes dang dga' ba'i lha dang / zas gtsang dang legs mthong lha dang / 'phags
96a2(mdo sde): skyes rgyal mtshan dang mig mi babang dang / tshangs dbyangs dang dpal 'byung dang / nga rgyal dpal dang / rdul bral dang nor bu bzang dang / 'od gzer can dang / shAkya thub pa dang
96a3(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang / bden 'byung dang thu bo dang yang dag 'byung dang / me tog dang yang dag me tog dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / 
96a4(mdo sde): klus byin dang / rdo rje'i 'od dang grags pa'i rgyal po dang / stag gi 'od gzer dang / spyod bcas dang / ye shes nga 'byung dang spos kyi dbang phyug dang / sa la'i dbang ba dang
96a5(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu'i snying po dang / skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba/ dag tu 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan to// rigs kyi bu de na ma/ dun na mngon gyi bu thams cad kyi thachungs 'jigs pa'i gdung
96a6(mdo sde): bral zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bram ze'i khye'u bdun cu rtsa dgu po 'di dag
96a7(mdo sde): thams cad ka yang dag rtog gi yar skye ba gnyis pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyu ro zhes lung bstan lags pas na/ btsun pa
96a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid ste/ bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog pas par 'gyur ba na thams cad kyi tha ma
96b1(mdo sde): byang chub mchog la reg par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po de dag gi/ sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa dag byang chub thob pa gcig du'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du gyur cig/ de dag gi 'dul
96b2(mdo sde): ba ji snyed mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar de dag theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston par 'gyur ba bdag gcig pu'i yang de snyed du gyur cig/ ji ltar de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed ma
96b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba bdag byang chub thob pa gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed tu gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po de dag byung ba'i bskal pa ud pa la yang dag rtog de la sems can gang
96b4(mdo sde): ngag gis mi'i lus thob par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bskal pa bas pas 'gyur ba na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
96b5(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas theg pa gsum po dag gis nges pa la dgod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcu ma ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs par
96b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tu gsol/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
96b7(mdo sde): snying pos 'jigs pa'i gdung bral la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la snying rje zhing phan par zhugs pa ni leg so legaso// bram
96b8(mdo sde): ba'i khye'u khyod ni sa mi dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i krung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das nas/ bskal pa zangs med pa ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal
97a1(mdo sde): ba ud pa la yang dag rtog de zad kar thams cad kyi tha mar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 
97a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral yang dag 'phags mngon par 'phags shes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyuraro// ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdun cu rtsa dgu po de dag
97a3(mdo sde): gi tshe bskal pa byed du 'gyur ba de bzhin khyod gcig pu'i yang bskal pa phyed du 'gyur te/ ji ltar smon lam btab pa'i smon lam de dag thams cad kyi bar yang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyuraro// 
97a4(mdo sde): des gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du gang gi tshe/ bdag bcom ldan
97a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du me tog/ sngon po'i char shin tu dri 'da' ba dag 'bab par gyur cig
97a6(mdo sde): sems can gang dag gis dri de tsher bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi khams rnams rab tu dang zhing mi 'thun pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi
97a7(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u 'jig pa'i gdung bral gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe/ 
97a8(mdo sde): de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du me tog sngon po'i char dag kyang rab tu bab/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang dri de tsher bar gyur nas de dag thams cad kyi khams rnams kyang snyoms
97b1(mdo sde): shing mi 'thun pa med par gnas par gyur/ de na sems can thams cad la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka'
97b2(mdo sde): stsal ba snying rje'i brtul zhugs dul ba'i sems longs shig/ 'jig rten mgon po mang po mchod 'gyur zhing // nyon mongs g.yo mdud dam po gcod 'gyur te/ dge ba
97b3(mdo sde): dam pa shes rab mdzad du 'gyur// / bam po brgyad pa// rigs kyi bu bram ze de'i slob ma bye ba phrag gsum kun dga'i ra
97b4(mdo sde): nga'i sgon 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / sems can 'ongs pa rnams gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la bkod ci/ dang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/ rig
97b5(mdo sde): kyi bud nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis slob ma de dag la sna sa ba/ kye bram ze'i khye'u bdag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed la/ sangs
97b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa dag long shig/ smon lam ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob shig/ de na bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog
97b7(mdo sde): gis smras pa/ lam ji lta bu dang / tshogs ji lta bu dang spyod pa ji lta bu dang rje su dran pa ji lta bus byang chub 'thob par 'gyur lags mdun na 'don gyis smras pa
97b8(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa'i mdzod bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par bsgrub par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs
98a1(mdo sde): med pa da la tshus kyi chags sa pa pa dang / shes gas ma da dang / chas thas sadang dag par sgrub pab chags ma 'das/ 
98a2(mdo sde): gyi bral ma de lta bu yinan// tham pa'i khye 'u de bzhin gshegs pa pang 'disad du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chags rnam par dag pasdu pa zhes byab tshogs nyam du
98a3(mdo sde): lon par byed pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i tshigs yong su gtong bar byed de/ de ni 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul dza
98a4(mdo sde): kyi chags ni sngon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshig ngas ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur
98a5(mdo sde): ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni/ dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi chom
98a6(mdo sde): ni cang shes kyi sems su byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad yongasu shes par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
98a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe bar
98a8(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni shes gathogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni
98b1(mdo sde): sems las su rung bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gi tshogs ni the tsom dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i
98b2(mdo sde): tshogs ni 'gras pa med pa'i sems byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni 'dul ba la mi skyo bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga'
98b3(mdo sde): ba'i tshogs ni chos kyi kun dga' mos par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rjesu 'chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong bar byed par 'gyuraro// 
98b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i tshogs ni/ sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sem/ sa dpa' rnams kyi mngon par byung ba'i tshogs ni yong su 'dzin pa
98b5(mdo sde): thams cad spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sem sa dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa'i tshogs ni dge ban las byas pa chud mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
98b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi dge ba spel ba bsgom pa'i tshogs ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyu ro// / 
98b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo'i bye brag 'byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i tshogs ni don gyi rnam pa rje su rtogs par byed par 'gyuraro// 
98b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshogs ni lus dang tshor ba dang / sems dang chos la so sor rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
99a1(mdo sde): kyi yang dag pa'i spong ba'i tshogs ni/ dge ba chos thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul
99a2(mdo sde): gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni lus dang / sems yang ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni sdom pa yong su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub
99a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du
99a4(mdo sde): chud par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnam ngas kyi snying por byed pa drug gi tshogs ni 'dul ba'i sems dacan rnams yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te
99a5(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u tshogs rnam par dag pa sdud pa zhes bya ba de ni chog sa nyam su lon par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i tshogs ni long/ 
99a6(mdo sde): spyod chen po dang / g.yog 'khor mang por 'gyur bar gsungs la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims ni mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang thos pa ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba
99a7(mdo sde): dang / dad pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / sgom pa ni 'khor ba las rgal bar byed par bstan to// mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u gang dag 'khor ba la mngon par dga'
99a8(mdo sde): ba rnams ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bram ze'i khye'u de yang ji skad du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni/ dul ba'i sems
99b1(mdo sde): kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// zhi gnas kyi sems kyis tshul khrims bsrungs par bya'o// rnyog pa med pa'i sems kyis thos pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o// snying rje chen po'i sems
99b2(mdo sde): kyis bsgom pa bsgom par bya'o// chos lhag ma rnams kyang shes rab dang ye shes dang / thabs kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/ 
99b3(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u de ni byang chub kyi lam yin no// tshogs de lta bus byang chub thob par 'gyur te/ bram ze'i khye'u bsgom pa ni de lta bu yin/ dran pa ni de lta bu yin byang chub kyi lam
99b4(mdo sde): gyi spyod pa ni de lta bu yin gyis/ bram ze'i khye'u byang chub tu 'dun pa skyed cig/ bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi ma ni yang dag pa yin gyis bsam pa thag pa nas
99b5(mdo sde): smon lam thob shig dang / yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu ro// bram ze'i khye'u bsam bdag pas byang chub kyi lam ni dang ba yin no// bram ze'i khye'u g.yo med pas/ rnam
99b6(mdo sde): par dag ste nyon mongs pa rab tu bstsal bas/ byang chub kyi lam ni drang ba yin no// bram ze'i khye'u bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thugs pas byang chub kyi lam ni grub pa dang / 
99b7(mdo sde): bde ba yin gyis smon lam thob la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu dag pa 'am/ yongasu ma dag pa ji lta bu 'dod pa longs shig/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u
99b8(mdo sde): skar ma'i khyu mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol te// btsun
100a1(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ sems can 'dod chags chung ba rnams
100a2(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang chung ba rnams dang / gti mug chung ba rnams sems 'khrul pa ma mchis shing ma 'khrugs pa rnams dang / 'khon pa'i sems ma mchis pa rnams dang / phrag
100a3(mdo sde): dog dang / ser sna'i sems rnam par sbyangs pa rnams dang log par lta ba'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems la gnas pa rnams dang
100a4(mdo sde): dge bar sems pa rnams dang / dge ba yongs su tshol bar sems pa rnams dang / ngan song gsum gyi lam rnam par spang bar sems pa rnams dang / mtho ris
100a5(mdo sde): kyi lam gsum la brtson par sems pa rnams dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pa rnams dang
100a6(mdo sde): theg pa gsum po dag la brtson par sems pa rnams kyi slad du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
100a7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na// de'i slad du bdag
100a8(mdo sde): gi sug pa lag pa gnyi su glang po che gtso bo dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus de'i lag pa gnyi su glang po che gtse
100b1(mdo sde): bo thal kar yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa dag byung bar gyur pa mthong nas des smras pa/ khyed cag chung zad tsam zhig thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i steng / 
100b2(mdo sde): gi na mkha' la deng la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i char shin tu dri zhim bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sems can thams cad sang bar gyis shig/ de'i thig
100b3(mdo sde): pas sems can gang dag gi lus la phog gam/ gang dag gis dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag gis sgrib pa lnga spangs par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrib pa spangs par/ 
100b4(mdo sde): gyur cig/ gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tsom gyi sgrib pa spangs par gyur cig/ tshig de skad smras ma
100b5(mdo sde): thag tu glang po che de dag steng gi bar snang la 'di ltar/ mgyogs par 'dod ste/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa brkyang ba la bskum pa'am/ 
100b6(mdo sde): bskum pa las brkyang ba de bzhin du de ltar mgyogs par dong nas glang po che gtso bo dag gis ji skad sngar smras pa'i bya ba dag byas nas/ phyir mi ldog ste de'i mdun du 'khod do// 
100b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog shin tu yid dga' bar gyur pa dang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed ni ma
100b8(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa sgra snang zhes bya ba la gling bzhi pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sgra yang dag par bstsags
101a1(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che chen po'i gdugs mngon par 'dags pa'i 'od gzer zhes bya ba/ sangs
101a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i khyu mchog gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag
101a3(mdo sde): lngas mgo bos gtugs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ rdul dang rnam bral sems can rnam dag longs// khyod kyi sems can bye
101a4(mdo sde): mang lung bstan to// byang chub phyir ni rab dag la dam sbyong zhing // rgyal mchog sems can rnams kyi 'dren par 'gyur// de bzhin du sbyar te/ pra/ 
101a5(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u stong dang / bram ze'i khye'u bye ba phrag gsum po gang dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon
101a6(mdo sde): lam btab pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos lung bstan te/ tha ma ni sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug
101a7(mdo sde): tor can dang / thams cad skyob kyi bar dag tu 'gyur ro// bram ze'i khye'u lung bstan pa de dag thams cad las gang dag rig byed klog pa'i bram ze stong
101a8(mdo sde): zhig yod pa'i thu bo mang pos bla mar bkur ba khyab 'jug rlung zhes bya ba des gsol ba/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan parabla na med pa yang
101b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par gyur cig/ 'dod chags bango ba dang / zhe sdang bdo ba dang / gti mug bdo ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par
101b2(mdo sde): gyur cig/ bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong zhes bya ba des smras pa/ kye mkhan po khyab 'jug rlung 'dis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang
101b3(mdo sde): ldan par smon lam 'debs par bgyid lags mdun na 'don gyis smras pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas
101b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par byang chub 'thob par byed/ cing / sems can skyabs med pa rnams dang dbu gnyen med pa rnams dang / nyon mongs bdag gis gtso
101b5(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / lta bas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams kyi don byed cing skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur/ kha dang / sems can rnams skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar
101b6(mdo sde): byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba la rab tu 'god par byed cing / sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros tshim par byed do zhes grag ste/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas
101b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par smon lam 'debs par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po yin par snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal
101b8(mdo sde): ba/ khyab 'jug rlung khyod nam 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
102a1(mdo sde): gnyis pa la bab pa na shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 'das ba de na 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig rgyal mtshan
