102a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes bu dam pa khyod der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po zhes
102a3(mdo sde): bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// khyab 'jug rlung gis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta
102a4(mdo sde): de'i slad du gang gi tshe/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs bsod nams
102a5(mdo sde): brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa gnyis bdag gi spyi bor 'jog par gyu/ ra cig/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye 'u khyab 'jug rlung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
102a6(mdo sde): mgo bos gtugs pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' khyab 'jug rlung gi spyi bor zhabs gnyis bzhag ste bka' stsal pa/ snying rje'i
102a7(mdo sde): bsam pa shes rab rnon po longs// byang chub mchog phyir spyad pa spyod kyis la/ brtan pa nyon mongs 'ching ba dam chod cig/ khyod kyi phan pas snying brtse sangs rgyas
102a8(mdo sde): 'gyur// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te gsol pa/ 
102b1(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can 'dod chags dang / 
102b2(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang gti mug gi sems cha mnyam pa rnams dang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i bsam pa la mi gnas pa'i skye dgu che lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
102b3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gcig gis bye ma snyed 'das nas/ 
102b4(mdo sde): bskal bgrangs med pa gnyis la bab pa na/ 'jig rten gyi kha mas 'di ni mi 'jed ces bya bar 'gyur te/ ci'i phyir de mi 'jed ces bya zhe na/ sems can de dag
102b5(mdo sde): 'dod chags la mi mjed pa dang / de dag zhe sdang la mi mjed pa dang / gti mug la mi mjed pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba rnams la mi mjed pas de'i
102b6(mdo sde): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni mi mjed ces bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bskal pa chen po bzang po zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ci'i phyir bzang po zhes bya zhes na// 
102b7(mdo sde): bskal pa chen po bzang po de la/ sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug spyod pa rnams kyi nang du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
102b8(mdo sde): stong 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po byung zhing skye dgu lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
103a1(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ba rang 'jig ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
103a2(mdo sde): bar du 'gyur zhing / theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston par 'gyur te/ 'khor ba'i chu bos 'das pa'i sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag kyang sgrol bar 'gyur zhing / myangan las
103a3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i pha rol tu 'khod par yang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' skar ma skyong gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo
103a4(mdo sde): bos phyag byas nas langs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dra dag go/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u gnyis pa tam bu ru zhes bya ba yang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin
103a5(mdo sde): poche'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs kha 'khor ba 'jig gi rjes mtshams sbyor zhing / 'jig
103a6(mdo sde): rten gyi skye dgu tshe lo sum khri thub pa na/ sangs rgyas su 'byung bar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni bskal pa grangs med
103a7(mdo sde): pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad du bskal pa bzang po byung ba'i
103a8(mdo sde): tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi rje su mtshams sbyor zhing skye dgu'i tshe la sum khri thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gas
103b1(mdo sde): thub ces bya bar gyur te/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grag par 'gyuraro// des bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan pa thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs/ 
103b2(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ me tog dag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mthor zhing thal mo
103b3(mdo sde): sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshogasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ shin tu 'brel pa lags bsgrags rab snyan gsung ba po// ma 'khrul ma 'dres ma rnyogs dri
103b4(mdo sde): ma mi mnga' ba// khyad 'phags shin tu sdom brtson blo rab blo gros ldan// drang srong dam pa khyod mdzes bu ba gtso khyu mchog lags// yon tan brgyas bltam
103b5(mdo sde): yon tan mang po stsol ba khyod// thub mchog bde ba mardza dpa mi'i dam pas btud// srid pa gsum na khyod 'drir sems can gzhan ma mchis// deng khyod sems can
103b6(mdo sde): mang po byang chub lung lam bstan// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u kun gyis bsrungs shes bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar rin po che sna bdun gyi khri'u bzhag
103b7(mdo sde): ste/ rin thang 'bum gyi bshams pas bshams nas/ khye'u de la gser gyi lhung bzed rin po che sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang ba dang / gser gyi ril ba b+h+ring gar dang / rin po
103b8(mdo sde): tshe sna bdun gyi mchod sdong dag bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
104a1(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal bgrangs ma mchis pa gang ga'i klung gi byem snyed gnyis pa la baban
104a2(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po de la tshe 'grib pa dang / rtsod pa'i dus kyi mtshan ma byung ba dang / sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug bdo zhing nga rgyal dang / drag dog dang / ser sa
104a3(mdo sde): kun nas dkris pa rnams dang / sems can log par lta ba dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems kun nas langs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
104a4(mdo sde): sems yong su nyams pa dang / yang dag pa'i lta ba'i se dmas rnams par spangs pa dang / log pas 'tsho zhing mi dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa
104a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/ dam pa'i chos
104a6(mdo sde): nub nas/ 'jig rten long bar 'gyur zhing / 'dren pa ma mchis la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
104a7(mdo sde): rgya bar gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/ bram ze kun gyis bsrungs la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze legaso legs so// skyes bu dam pa
104a8(mdo sde): khyod kyis rtsod pa'i dus kyi mtshan ma byung zhing / skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa'i bar dang / 'jig rten long bar gyur cing 'dren pa med pa'i nang du smon lam btab pa ni rtogs pa che zhing ye shwa
104b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yin pas/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod mkhas mdzod snying rje rten ces bya bar gyur cig/ mkhas mdzod snying rje rten khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gcig/ 
104b2(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bskal pa bzang po byung zhing / skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ de bzhin
104b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'od srung zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' mkhas mdzod snying rje rten gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
104b4(mdo sde): rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de bzhin gshedags pa rin po che'i snying po la/ me tog dang me tog phreng / 
104b5(mdo sde): dang / spos dang / phye ma dag gis gtor nasatshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// mi mchog phan pa mdzad pa dga' ba bgyid pa skyed pa po// 
104b6(mdo sde): zhal 'dzum rab tu dgyes pa shin du snyan pa'i gsungs mnga' ba// gnas mkhyen mkhas pa phan pa mdzad pa stobs bcu rab mchog ldan// ye shes bsam gtan rnam par mthar
104b7(mdo sde): phyin bde gshegs khyod la 'dud// spyod pa mang po spyad pa zhal ni rnam rgyas pa// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag mang po// gzhal yas byang chub sla du lung yang bstan
104b8(mdo sde): ba mdzad// mi mchog bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bram ze'i khye'u bzhi pa bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med ces bya ba la
105a1(mdo sde): yang dag par bskul to// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gsol/ 
105a2(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po de la byang chub bar 'tshal mod kyi rtsod pa'i dus de lta bu 'ba' shig mi 'tshal te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung yongs
105a3(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das nas skye dgu'i lo khri thub pa na/ sems can sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang yang dag par sdom pa'i bsam babs pa rnams dang / nor bdun dang bral ba rnams/ 
105a4(mdo sde): dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ston par 'du shes par sems pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang / 
105a5(mdo sde): legs par spyod pa gsum dang bral ba rnams dang / nyes/ par spyod pa gsum po dag la brtson pa rnams dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pas sems rnam par dkrugs pa rnams dang / 
105a6(mdo sde): theg pa gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba de'i dus su ni/ sus kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa sgrub par rngo mi thog lags na/ skye dgu'i tshe lo stong thub pa na lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ sems can de dag
105a7(mdo sde): kyang che la brgya pa'i bar du 'gyur te// de'i dus na ni sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ming yang ma mchis na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba spyod pa rnams la sman kyang ci 'tshal/ re shig snyigs ma lnga
105a8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten che 'bri zhing lo brgya par gyur nas/ mtshon gyi bskal pa bar mnye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i dus na/ bdag lha rnams kyi nang nas babs shing sems can rnams
105b1(mdo sde): yongs su skyob par gyur cig/ mi dge baspangs nas dge ba la spyod par gyur cig/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar dag la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sems can
105b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyis yongs su spyong bar gyur cig/ theg pa gsum po dag la yang sbyong bar cig/ snyigs ma lnga ga yongs su spong bar gyur cig/ 
105b3(mdo sde): skye dgu'i tshal brgyad khril thub pa na/ bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar gyur cig/ 'did chags dang / ni snang dang gta drug
105b4(mdo sde): dang / ma rig pa dang / brag dog dang / ser/ sna chung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston cing / ga dpa gsum bdag la yang dag par sbyor bar gyur cig/ btsun/ 
105b5(mdo sde): pabacom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na de'i slad du btsun ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
105b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag de ltar lung bstan pa thob na/ theg pa gang gis myur du 'khor ba las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i nyan thos kyis
105b7(mdo sde): yang don me gnyer la/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yang don du mi gnyer lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa bram ze'i khye'u byang chub sems dpa'
105b8(mdo sde): le lo can rnams kyi dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ le lo'i dngos po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ni yun ring por 'khor ba 'dod de/ lta ba'i g.yangs dang / 
106a1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i btson ra sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
106a2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la la chog dman pa dang / srogs dman pa dang / yongasu gtong ba dman pa dang / smon lam dmin pa yin te/ ji ltan byang chub
106a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chog dman pa yin zhe na/ 'di la lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa ma bsdams shing / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can
106a4(mdo sde): rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing rgyu ba dang / thams cad yongasu mi gtong zhing kun la yang yongasu mi gtong la lha dang mi'i dpal dang / bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa
106a5(mdo sde): dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu mi len cing 'dul ba la rtog pa'i smon lam yang yongasu mi len pa yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag
106a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' le lo can ni yun ring por 'khor ba'i btson rar sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du thob par mi
106a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dang
106a8(mdo sde): ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa bsdams shing tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing rgyu ba dang / thams cad yongs su gtong
106b1(mdo sde): zhing kun la yang yongasu gtong la/ sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongasu thar par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje'i sems bskyed cing / sbyin par byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas
106b2(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / 'dul ba la rtog pa'i smon lam yongasu 'dzin par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
106b3(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par 'gyu ro// chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam nye bar ston par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
106b4(mdo sde): la mngon par brtson pa dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po gtong ba dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa mngon par dbasgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse ba
106b5(mdo sde): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhis ngoms mi myong bar gnas par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin bas ngoms mi myong ba dang / chos nyan pas ngoms mi myong
106b6(mdo sde): ba dang / bsgom pas ngoms mi myong ba dang / sems can rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos pos ngoms mi myong bar gnas par bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' mi zad pa'i gter bzhi po 'di dag
106b7(mdo sde): yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mi zad pa'i gter yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba dang / sems
106b8(mdo sde): can dbul po yongasu gzung ba mi zad pa'i gter yongasasu rdzogs par bya ba dag go/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bdag med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhi gang
107a1(mdo sde): zhe na sems can med pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims yongasasu dag pa dang / srog med pa'i byor ting 'dzin yong su dag pa dang / gang dag med pa'i phyir shes ra
107a2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir/ rnam par grol ba yong su dag pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag yong su rdzogs par bya'o// de dag gis byang
107a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing na mkha'i 'khor lo yang skor bar byed/ mi rtag pa'i 'khor lo dang / mi
107a4(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i 'khor lo dang / brjod du med pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par 'byin pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges dbar 'byed pa'i 'khor lo dang / bskor du med pa'i
107a5(mdo sde): 'khor lo yang skor bar byed do// bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med ba gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das te/ bskal
107a6(mdo sde): pa bzang po la bab nas ring po ma lon zhing snyigs ma lnga rab tu zhi ba'i dus la bab pa na skye dgu tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdo/ 
107a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// bram ze'i khye'u bgrod bya'i bu dri ma med kyis/ 
107a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / phye ma dag gis mchod
107b1(mdo sde): babyed pa la brtson zhing tshigasu bcad pas mngon par bstod pa// mgon po khyod kyi 'bral pa'i dbyes che mdzod spu gangs mdog mdzes// khyod ni gser gyi ri bo brtsegs pa 'dra zhing yid du mchi/ 
107b2(mdo sde): yon tan brgyas bltam bdag dus 'di gsungs 'gro na'ang bdag 'tshang rgya// thub pa khyu mchog 'jig rten sgron khyod la ni su mi 'dud// bram ze bdun na 'don rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis// bram ze
107b3(mdo sde): khye'u rig byed klog pa stong po thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/ ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang 'od srung dang / byams pa lung bstan pa de bzhin du/ 
107b4(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u rig byed klog pa seng ge dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du thams cad kyis kya rang bskal pa bzang po 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
107b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas thams cad kyang de bzhi na gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do// 
107b6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyi nub pa chung gang yin pa de la yang mdun na 'don gyis 'di skad du/ kye bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang ring du brtag tu ji yod/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen
107b7(mdo sde): po skyed cig ces yang dag par bskul nas/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang mngon par go bar byas so// sems can gang dag rga dang nad dang 'chi 'pho'i 'jigs pa sred pa'i klung du ltung ba dang / 
107b8(mdo sde): phung po rnams la zhen pa'i mi dge sred pa'i btson ra rab tu 'jigs par chud pa rnams// phan tshun gsod par byed pa'i nyon mongs dug 'thungs nas ni sdul bsngal rgya mtshor rab tu gnas// 
108a1(mdo sde): gti mug gis ni lam stor long ba bzhin du mi gtsang 'khrul 'khor dag na lakhyam par 'gyur/ log par ltal gnas pa
108a2(mdo sde): 'byung ba thams cad chung pa gsum na sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'bar/ srag chags sems cad 'gro balnga pa dag na dza lta lab ma bzhin dul bar// 'gra
108a3(mdo sde): badzinan nas kyi gnyams dungs di sems can rnamasan na rgyas pa/ yang ga shes ra na nam nur 'a gnyis sngam 'i byang chub na du dun byed// @
108a4(mdo sde): rnams sring pa mya sa'i sems can rnams kyi du ngas 'tshang ba grol bar ra byang chu ba da du mam
108a5(mdo sde): gzhal gyis shigagati mug bral ba rdos/ mig rnam par nyams pa rnams la lam gyi dam ba/ na par gyisa'akhar ba'i srid pa'i bcon pa
108a6(mdo sde): dgan bar rnams pa tshas kyi phung gyis rim gyis shig/ phan 'a byed ba byad nin myur du nye bar sang 'grub pa'i zhabs la gtugs pagyis// ra tha thams cad gru bstan la
108a7(mdo sde): shes ldan parab brtan 'dren pas sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byob// 'jig rten dag na sems can rnams kyi dadugs 'byin gyis la srid pa'i mtshalas sems can pon/ 
108a8(mdo sde): rnam par pa'i lam dang dbang po'i spongs dang byang chub lan 'ogan byed 'gyur bar gyis/ chos ldan chos kyi tshor ba rab tu ba ste sems can rnams kyi drug bsngal zhi bar gyis
108b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang des kyang smras pa/ mkhan po bdag ni 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i dpal mi 'tshal la/ nyan thos dang // 
108b2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang mi 'tshal te bla na med pa'i theg pa 'tshal ba lags kyis/ kye mkhan po yud tsam zhig gzhes la bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
108b3(mdo sde): pa la gson cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i rgya mtsho'i rdul de nas phyir byung ste/ rang gi bsnyen bkur ba bram ze'i khye'u lnga po dag la bos te smras pa/ kye khyem
108b4(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig/ de dag gis kyang smras pa/ bdag cag la gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
108b5(mdo sde): 'dun la dbul bar bgyi ba cung zad kyang ma mchis lags na dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsrungs pa bdag cag gi sa ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi
108b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis bsnyen bkur ba dang po lo zang spyod ces bya ba de la rin po che sna bdun gyi kha dog gi rgyan dag byin bsnyen bkur
108b7(mdo sde): gnyis pathang la spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rna cha byin/ bsnyen bkur ba gsum po chu la spyod ces bya ba de la ni/ rin po che sna bdun gyi khri byin
108b8(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur ba bizhi pa shugs kyi spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po che sna bdun gyi khar ba byin/ bsnyen bkur po lnga pa snying po spyod ces bya ba de la ni gser gyi ril pa b+h+ring gar byin nas smras pa/ 
109a1(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed cag deng la dngos po 'di dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
109a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems skyed cig/ de nas bsnyen bkur ba lnga po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong ste/ de ltar bkur ba'i dngos po de dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
109a3(mdo sde): la phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis bdag cag bskal pa bzang po de la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
109a4(mdo sde): 'gyur bar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
109a5(mdo sde): bstan du gsol rigs kyi bu snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin rnga 'i snying pos bram ze'i khye'u lo tang spyod spyod na/ bska
109a6(mdo sde): ba dbang po 'dil de bzhin gshegs pa brtan dbyangs shes bya bar 'gyur zhes byang chub tu lung bstan to// thang la spyang ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bde dab zla gros shes bya bar 'gyuraro// 
109a7(mdo sde): tshul spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa don bcas gsung zhes bya bar 'gyuraro// shugs kyis spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba dang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// bram
109a8(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u snying po spyod ni de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug bud ces bya bar 'gyuraro zhes byang chub tu lung bstan to// bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag bskal pa bzang / 
109b1(mdo sde): bor lung bstan ma thag tu mdun na 'don gyis yangabram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang la smras pa/ stobs chen shugs 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkad pa
109b2(mdo sde): dag long shig/ smon lam ji lta bu 'dod pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob shig/ sems can thams cad kyang chos kyi bcud kyis 'gron du gnyer cig/ brtson
109b3(mdo sde): 'grus brtan pos rang gi byang chub kyi spyad pa yang dang yang du ring du ma rtog shig ces lag pa nas bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u stobs
109b4(mdo sde): chen shugs 'chang de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngara'adadug ste gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po de la thub pa nyi ma mang nyung ji
109b5(mdo sde): snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur lags de bzhin gan gas pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bram ze'i khye'u bskal pa bzang po de la ni thub pa nyi ma stong rtsa bzhi
109b6(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i khye'u gsel ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bskal pa chen po bzang po de la rgyal ba nyi ma gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag gi tha mar bram ze
109b7(mdo sde): khye'u gces lag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug pud ces bgyi bar 'gyur
109b8(mdo sde): bde srid du yun ring por bdag gis brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang spyod pa dang / sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / zos pa dang brtson 'grus dang
110a1(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / bsod nams dang / shes rab kyi tshogs sna tshogs dag yang dag par bsdu zhing byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bskal pa
110a2(mdo sde): bzang po pa de dag thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lon par dang por bsod snyoms kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi sku gdung dag la yang
110a3(mdo sde): mchod par bgyi'o// de dag gi dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin par yang gyur cig/ sems can tshul khrims dang bral ba rnams ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin
110a4(mdo sde): tu'ajug pa dang / 'jud cing rab tu 'gong par gyur cigs dmas can lta ba dang bral zhing nyams nga ba thob par gyur pa/ rnams ni yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par
110a5(mdo sde): 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur ci / de bzhin du bsam pa dang bral ba rnams ni ya nga dag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu 'god par gyur cig
110a6(mdo sde): bzhin du cho ga dang bral ba rnams ni cho ga la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kyang nges par ston par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom
110a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag gi dam pa'i chos nub nas ring po ma lon par bdag gis 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang / dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'byung ba dang
110a8(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar bgyid par gyur cig/ mtshan gyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi chen/ sems can rnams srog gcod pa spong ba dang / yang dag pa'i lta 'i'i'abar la ra/ 
110b1(mdo sde): tu 'god par gyur cig/ sems can rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / lam ngan pa dag nas bton cing yang dag pa'i lam du 'god par gyur cig/ nyes par spyod pa'i mun pa 'jig
110b2(mdo sde): par bgyid par gyur cig/ legs par spyod pa'i snang ba ston par gyur cig/ 'jig rten na dus kyi snyig ma dang / tshe dang lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'i bar dag 'jig par
110b3(mdo sde): gyur cig/ mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na/ bdag sems can rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par
110b4(mdo sde): 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud par gyur cig/ bdag sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la sbyor bar bgyid pa na/ thams cad mu ge mun pa dang 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa
110b5(mdo sde): dang / g.yul shom pa dang / mkhon dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ sems can rnams kyi rgyud la nyon mongs pa'i me gdung ba dag zhi bar
110b6(mdo sde): gyur cig/ nad kyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na/ bdag gis sems can rnams snying por 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i chos drug yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par gyur cig/ bsdu ba'i dngos
110b7(mdo sde): po bzhi po dag la sbyor bar bgyid cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sems can rnams kyi nad kyi mun pa rnam par 'jig par bgyid par gyur cig/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud la nyon
110b8(mdo sde): mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i bar du gyur cig/ bskal pa bzang po las sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de ltar sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las yongasu thar par bgyid par gyur cig/ 
111a1(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bskal pa bzang po las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong rtsa bzhi 'byung bdag yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur nas/ dam
111a2(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par gyur pa na/ de'i 'od tu gdong bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ 
111a3(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong rtsa bzhi po dag gi sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam par bdag gis byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang de tsam du ring bar gyur cig/ de dag gi nyan
111a4(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed par bdag cig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du gyur cig/ bskal pa bzang po de la sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po de dag gis sems can
111a5(mdo sde): steng btul bar gyur pa'i sems can de skad cig bdagagis kyang btul bar gyur cig/ sems can ga/ ngadag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos kyi bslab pa
111a6(mdo sde): la 'khrul par gyur pa dang / lta ba'i g.yang sor ltung bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma gus pa'i sems dang / rab tu sdang ba
111a7(mdo sde): sems su gyur pa dang chos dang dge 'dun la 'khrul pa'i sems su gyur pa dang 'dod chags kyi sems dag dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs padag dang
111a8(mdo sde): mtshams med pa bgyid par gyur pa dag kyang bdag gis byang chub thob nas 'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'byin cing mi 'jigs pa'i khyim mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jud par gyur cig
111b1(mdo sde): du bdag yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bas par ma gyur pa de srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po yang bas par ma gyur cig/ bdag gi dam pa'i chos bas par gyur pa na
111b2(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po yang bas par gyur cig/ bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung gang lags pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing
111b3(mdo sde): mtshan re re yang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu gyur te gnas par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs
111b4(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag tu bzhud nasas/ ngas rgyas kyi sku re res kyang sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma
111b5(mdo sde): mchis pa rnams theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzi na du 'jug pa dang / 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na bar
111b6(mdo sde): gyi bskal pa zhig bar ma gyur pa der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag bzhud nas ji ltar sngar brjod pa de ltar sems can rnams yongasu skyob par gyur zhing slad kyis yid bzhin nor bur gyur nas/ sangs
111b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams rin po che dang bral bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu mchis shing rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang / gter dag kyang rab tu ston par gyur cig/ 
111b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sems can rnams dge ba'i spyod pa dang bral zhing nad kyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang tsan+danas mchog pa dang / sbrul gyi
112a1(mdo sde): rnying pa dang / dus kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag gi sras kyi char rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig/ spos kyi char de dag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi nyan mongs
112a2(mdo sde): pa'i nang rnams dang lta ba'i nad rnams dang / lus kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyi bar gyur cig/ de nas sems can de dag kyang bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dag la mngon pa
112a3(mdo sde): brtson par 'gyur zhing / mtho ras la gzhol bar yang gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub kyi spyad ba spyod pa na/ de ltar sems can rnams kyi \u0f7fsa
112a4(mdo sde): nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'gyid par gyur cig/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de ltar sa rangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa dag gi sems
112a5(mdo sde): can rnams yongasu skyob par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams
112a6(mdo sde): kyi sman du yang mi 'gyur blta na bdag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu ma mchis padag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems
112a7(mdo sde): can rnams la chos kyang ston pa de dag bslus par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par yang ma gyur cig/ btso// 
112a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das srog chags bye ba phrag mang po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing lung bstan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur pa de
112b1(mdo sde): dag kyang bdag gis thugs byung bar bgyis par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub kyi slad du yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor ba na sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang
112b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / dge ba'i sgra dang / dge ba'i chos bgyi ba'i sgra dag rna lam du grag par ma gyur cig/ gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs par mi 'gyur zhing
112b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi sman du yang mi 'gyur ba lta na bdag rtag tu mnar med par gtogs par gyur cig rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che
112b4(mdo sde): snying pos bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang la legaso da zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa legaso la gso// khyod ni sems can rnams kyi sman du
112b5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal dag las yongasu thar bar byed par yang 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod smra na gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med ces bya bar gyur cig
112b6(mdo sde): sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung
112b7(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lon
112b8(mdo sde): par rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i bar dag bzhin du bsod snyoms 'dul bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i bshes gnyen gtsug bud bzang po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam
113a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos nub pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
113a2(mdo sde): gsal mdzad ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa phyed du 'gyur// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po de dag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
113a3(mdo sde): ji snyed du 'gyur ba khyod gcig pu'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du 'gyur la/ sems can de snyed kyang 'dul bar 'gyur ro// yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang
113a4(mdo sde): srid du bskal pa chen po bzang po'i bskal pa zad par ma gyur dang de srid du dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyuradal de srid du sangs rgyas kyi sku dag kyang 'byung bar
113a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu spos kyi char pas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang / lta ba'i nad rnams dang / 
113a6(mdo sde): lus kyi nad rnams kyi bar dag kyang rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur la sems can rnams kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la rab tu 'god cing mtho ris la gzhol bar
113a7(mdo sde): byed par yang 'gyur ro// / bam po dgu pa// rigs kyi bu de
113a8(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de ni
113b1(mdo sde): slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gis bdag gi spyi bo la byug par gsol/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos
113b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa'i spyi bo la bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gis yongs su drug pa mdzad nas de na bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu
113b3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pa sems dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs shing rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs
113b4(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag byas nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bram ze rgya mtsho rdul gyis lha'i kashi ka'i gos bskonate/ smras pa/ 
113b5(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa leg so lag so// khyod kyis smonalam bzang po rabatab ste/ dbyin chad khyod kyis kha ba'i bsnyen bkur bya mi dgos kyis/ ji ltar
113b6(mdo sde): bde ba nyid du spyod cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di na snang ba dag da ltar bdag gis srog chags
113b7(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug go/ sems can chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis ni smon lam/ 
113b8(mdo sde): rgya che dgu btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba sha stag yongasu blangs te/ khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis rtsod
114a1(mdo sde): pa'i dus yongs su spangs pasabadag gis ni rtsod pa'i dus la bab par gyur pa na sems can rnams chos kyi bcud kyis mgron du gnyer
114a2(mdo sde): bar bya zhing / brtson 'grus brtan por bya ste/ bdag gis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
114a3(mdo sde): 'khor 'di dang / lha dang / dri za dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di yang bdag la thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs
114a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag la leg so zhes bya dab byin cing lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu na bzhugs
114a5(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis sa/ nga ge'i sgra sgrags pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin zhing
114a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang mdzad la pho nya dag kyang gtong bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang de thos shing pho nya de dag
114a7(mdo sde): kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / gang yang phyi ma'i dus na/ snying rje chen pod ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de lta bu'i rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi tshe
114a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can du smon lam gyi byang chub yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi mu ge'i dgon pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nang dag gis bangs par
114b1(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can rnams yongs slob par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad par 'gyur la/ sems can rnams la yang chos ston par 'gyur ba dang / bdag yongs su mya
114b2(mdo sde): ngan las 'das nas kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag 'das kyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du ma mchis pa dang / dpag tu
114b3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dag nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bdag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags brjod cing snyan pa dang / dbyangs kyang sgrog par 'gyur
114b4(mdo sde): la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du bang ngag gi smon lam gyi tshul yang rjod par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang snying rje chen pos yongasu
114b5(mdo sde): bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i smon lam mthong nas mtsha ga tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing de dag kyang sems can la snying rje chen po skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de nas de
114b6(mdo sde): dag kyang de lta bu dag nyid yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur zhing ji ltar da ltar bdag gis yongasu bzung ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can dag tu de dag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang/ 
114b7(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur ba dang chu bo bzhis 'das par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur zhing theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las
114b8(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lam gyi bar dag la 'god par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i smon lam gyis seng ge'i sgra sgrags par bya'o snyam mo// rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ 
115a1(mdo sde): sang rje chen pas yang su bsgos pa'i spyan lam de lta ga yang dag par bskye nas/ chamags drug pa gcig drug / de banag/ 
115a2(mdo sde): parin pa che'i snying po gal ba der song / yang de'i tshen lnga bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang ba dag gis namakha'i dkyil nas lha'i sil snyan byeg khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang ba
115a3(mdo sde): dag bkrol zhing me tog gi char rab tu phab nas tshig 'thun par smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa legaso legs// khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song la smon lam rab tu mchog ngag
115a4(mdo sde): shod la zung shig dang khyod ni nyon mongs pas dadakrugs pa'i 'jig rten du sems can rnams kyi sdug dbasngal ye shes kyi rgyas rab tu ni par byed par 'gyur ro/ 
115a5(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang thal mo sbyar te mngon du phyogs nas tshig 'thun par smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa leg so legaso// mkhas pa ra
115a6(mdo sde): mchog bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa bla mchog mnga' ba smon lam brtan por thob shig dang bdag cag kyang nyan par 'tshal lo// gang gi tshe mdun na 'dzin song ste/ 
115a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mdun na 'don gyis pus ma'i lhungs la btsugs pa dang / de'i mo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtogs gastong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
115a8(mdo sde): khams ji tsam pa de thams cad g.yos/ hUM rab tu g.yas/ 'gug rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg rab tu ldegag/ sil stan dag kyang ma
115b1(mdo sde): bkrol bar sgra 'khrol lo// ri dgas dang bya gag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrog so// shing ljon pa dag las kyang me tog dag 'bu'o// 
115b2(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams ma gtogs pa gang su dgas la rten cing gnas pa'i
115b3(mdo sde): 'byung po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug pa gang yin pa dag dang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu ma bcug pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang phan pa'i sems dang / 
115b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i sems dang kho na med pa'i sems dang / ro/ dag pa med pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sa dmas dang / ngo mtshar gyi sems dag tu gyur to// sems
115b5(mdo sde): can gang dag na mkha' la rgyu ba de dag kyang bram ze'i smon lamasgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba mnyan pa'i phyir/ na mkha 'al 'khod nas 'di ltar mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis
115b6(mdo sde): me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang ras bcos bu dag
115b7(mdo sde): gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur te/ de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi lha gang ji snyed pa rnams kyang bram ze'i smon lam nyan pa'i phyir/ 'dzam+bu'i gling du babs te
115b8(mdo sde): nam mkha' dkyil na 'khod cing / lha'i spos dgra los bu'i bar dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to// bram zes kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin
116a1(mdo sde): po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// bsam gtan dag gis rnam grol tshangs pa bzhin// gzugs kyis 'od gsal
116a2(mdo sde): brgya byin 'dra ba ste// rgyal po bzhin du nor 'bru rab gtong zhing // rin chen mchog mnga' thub pa tshong dpon bzhin// zhi ba sgrogs mdzad ri la seng ge 'dra// mi 'gul brtan pa/ 
116a3(mdo sde): lhun po 'dra ba ste// rgya mtsho bzhin du 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing // yon tan skyon la sa bzhin mtshungs par spyod// dri ma thams cad dad pa chu bzhin te// thub pa me ltar nyon mongs
116a4(mdo sde): nags rnams sreg/ rlung ltar gang la'ang chags pa mi mnga' zhing // thub pa lha ltar yang dag nyid kyang ston// klu ltar thub pa chos kyi char 'bebs shing // char pa
116a5(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gro kun ngoms par mdzad// pha rol mu ste gas 'joms pa seng ge 'dra// me tog bzhin du yon tan dri yang gtong // tshangs pa bzhin du snyan pa'i
116a6(mdo sde): tshigs gsung zhing // 'gro ba sdug bsngal grol mdzad sman pa bzhin// sems mnyam nye bar gnas pa ma bzhin te// 'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'dzin mdza' bshes 'dra// nga rgyal/ 
116a7(mdo sde): dgra 'joms rdo rje brtan bzhin te// thub pa mtshon bzhin srid pa'i khri shing gcod// zam pa'i shing bzhin 'gro ba sgrol mdzad cing // klu ltar thub pa mi shes rtsa rnams sreg/ thub
116a8(mdo sde): pazla ltar 'od bsil gtong mdzad cing // mi yi pad+ma kha 'byed nyi ma bzhin// 'bras bu mchog bzhi sbyin mdzad ljon shing 'dra// thub pa bya bzhin drang srong tshogs kyis bskor// rgyal ba
116b1(mdo sde): blo yangs rgya mtsho 'dra ba ste// 'gro bdag la sems mnyam cu shing bzhin// rmi lam bzhin du chos rnams stong rtog cing // 'jig rten rje su 'thun 'jug chu dang 'dra// thub pa mtshan
116b2(mdo sde): mchog mnga' 'thugs rje can// khyod kyis sems can byang chub lung yang bstan// sems can mang po mtha' yas khyod kyis btul// byang chub mchog rab tu ni bdag lung ston// 
116b3(mdo sde): drang srong chen po bden bzhed shes rab mchog/ bdag ni 'gro ba nyon mongs 'thab rtsod che// sangs rgyas byang chub lung ston dogs chod la// sems can brgya dag zhi bde'i lam du khod
116b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe 'dun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la tshigasu bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ de na
116b5(mdo sde): 'dug pa de'i mod la lha dang dri za dang mi dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des lag so zhes bya ba byin no// / mdun na 'don gyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
116b6(mdo sde): bdag gis srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal te/ de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che dgu dag yongasu
116b7(mdo sde): bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can yang bsam pa yongasu dag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / gdul sla ba dag yongasu bzung lag so// gang dag skar ma skyong la sogs pa bram zen
116b8(mdo sde): khye'u rig byed klog pa stong rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bzang por lung bstan te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gis kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal
117a1(mdo sde): spyod pa dag theg pa gsum po dag gis 'dul bar bgyid lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa shas che ba dang / rtsod par
117a2(mdo sde): dus kyi snyigs ma dag yongasu spangs pas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa la
117a3(mdo sde): skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang / log par lta ba rnams dang 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang / par mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / mar mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / 
117a4(mdo sde): dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa rnams dang / bgyi ba ma lags par bgyid pa rnams dang / bsod nams ma lags par bgyid pa rnams dang / 
117a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba rnams dang / legs par spyod pa gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba rna/ mas dang / de bzhin du lha dang mi rnams kyi dpal dang / 
117a6(mdo sde): 'byor pa dag la brtson pa rnams nye bar spyod pa gsum po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang bral ba rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad
117a7(mdo sde): kyis spangs pa rnams dang / mkhas pa thams cad kyis bor ba rnams dang / srid pa'i brtson rar chud pa rnams dang rgyun phyogasu bdas pa rnams dang / 'gyur byed kyi chu
117a8(mdo sde): klung du nub pa rnams dang / 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba rnams dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang ma bral ba rnams dang / mi dge ba'i bgyi ba thams cad ma btang ba rnams dang / sangs
117b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang / nyam nga ba chen po
117b2(mdo sde): thob par gyur pa rnams spangs lags te/ de'i tshe na bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad na/ mi'i tshe lo bcu thub par 'gyur ba thams cad skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa 'di dag
117b3(mdo sde): gis spangs shing bor bas/ de'i tshe srid pa'i dba' klong dang / 'khor ba'i 'khrul 'khor na skyob pa ma mchis pa dang skyabs ma mchis pa dang / dpung gnyen ma mchis pa rnams
117b4(mdo sde): dang / sdug bsngal gyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dgas ngas nas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bzang dgu yongs su bzung zhing shin tu dul ba dang / bsam pa yongs su dag
117b5(mdo sde): pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la lhag pa rab gyi ba bgyis pa'i 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung ba de lta
117b6(mdo sde): bu ma lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bram ze de bzhin te/ sems can bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam 'debs par byed cing
117b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang yongasu bzung ba rnams ngas kyang de nyid du lung bstan to// bram zes gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dper na/ shing
117b8(mdo sde): kang ku shi'i 'dab ma bzhin du snying 'dar zhing bdag gi yid ni shin tu skyo la bdag gi lus thams cad ni sha zang bar gyur cing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de'i tshe byang chub sems
118a1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyis spangs shing rtsod pa chen po'i dus kyi mun par 'bang ste thams cad kyis yongasu spangs pa'i sems can rnams bdag gi snying rje'i gnas su 'gyur ba lta na/ 
118a2(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa bzang po de la skye dgu'i tshe lo stong thub pa
118a3(mdo sde): na/ sdod cing bdag yun ring po de srid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo bar gyur cig/ bdag gi ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yun ring por smin par bgyi 'tshal ba'i
118a4(mdo sde): gdul ba rnams yongs su 'dzin pa la spo bar bgyi zhing pha rol ba tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa na 'dul ba rnams yongasu bzung bar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las dngos
118a5(mdo sde): bo'i mtshan ma yongasu btang ba de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs// zhes thos pas bdag gis de lta/ bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bgyi ste/ ji ltar tshe
118a6(mdo sde): rabs gzhan dag na slongs mo ba'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag 'chi bar 'gyur na yang de dag la yongasu gtong ba 'od lta bu dag yongasu gtong bar gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ zas dang
118a7(mdo sde): skom dang bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba dang / bldag pa dang / gos dang mal cha dang / stan dang gnas dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang byug pa dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi sbyin pa dang / gdug/ 
118a8(mdo sde): dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / nor dang 'bru dang / glang po che dang / rta dang shing rta dang / gser dang dngul dang / mgron bu dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be DUR+Ya dang dung dang / man shel dang byiru/ 
118b1(mdo sde): dang dngul can dang / sa le sbram gyi sbyin pa thams cad yang dang yang du yongasu gtong ba na/ bdag kyang 'di ltar mchog tu dga' zhing snying rje'i yid kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar sems can rnams la su
118b2(mdo sde): nas/ sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i don dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du btang ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ gal te yang gtang bar dka'
118b3(mdo sde): ba slong ba'i sems can dag mchis nas/ 'di lta ste/ bran dang bran mo dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / rgyal srid dang / mchis brang dang / bu dang bu mo dang / lag pa yongasu btang ba dang / rkang pa
118b4(mdo sde): yongasu btang ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang mig dang / lce dang lpags pa dang / khrag dang rus pa dang / lus dang srog dang nga/ mgo yongasu btang ba de lta bu'i yongasu gtong ba dag slong bar
118b5(mdo sde): bgyid na yang mchog tu dga' zhing / snying rje'i yid kyi 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar 'dul ba rnams la phan gdags pa/ 'i sla du/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig/ 
118b6(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang sprad par bgyi ste/ gang sngon chad nam yang sems can gang gis kyang de lta bu'i yongasu gtong ba yongasu btang bar ma gyur pa dang / sman
118b7(mdo sde): chad kyang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spang ba spyod pa gang yang de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba yongasu gtong bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu yongasu gtong ba dag
118b8(mdo sde): yongasu gtong bar gyur cig/ gang bdag tshe rabs gzhan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du sprad pa
119a1(mdo sde): spyod pa na yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par gyur cig/ bdag gis slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang lags pa rnams kyang yongs su
119a2(mdo sde): gtong ba'i tshul gyi yon tan la 'god par gyur cig/ nyon mongs pa'i g.yul rab tu zhi ba gang lags pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ de ltar bdag bla na med
119a3(mdo sde): bayang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spang ba spyod pa na/ rtag par tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs sna tshogs kyi dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yul
119a4(mdo sde): rnams la mi bzod pa ma mchis pa dang / bdag la so sor rtog pa'i bar gang lags pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ bdag de lta bu'i bzod bsgom
119a5(mdo sde): pabar gyur cig ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad dben pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas thams cad zhi bar sgom pa la brtson zhing / bla na med pa'i spyod pa las
119a6(mdo sde): slar mi ldog pa gang lags pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// 'du byed thams cad la phyin ci log spang ba'i slad du stong pa nyid la spyod pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gtan gyis/ 
119a7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa lags so// rang bzhin gyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ gang dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag
119a8(mdo sde): tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bdag tu sprob brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis spyod pa la ji ltar sngan chad byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du/ spyad/ 
119b1(mdo sde): baspyod pa 'gas kyang de ltar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad cing / slad kyis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
119b2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod par gyur pa dag kyang de ltar spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu la bdag spyod par gyur cig/ 
119b3(mdo sde): slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa rnams kyang tshul gyi yon tan la 'god par gyur cig/ bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas kyang slad ma'i byang chub
119b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'grub par gyur cig/ bla na med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du 'dzin par bgyi ba'i sladu
119b5(mdo sde): bdag sbyin pa la rlom sems ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig/ tshul khrims la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang bzod pa la rlom sems ma mchis pa dang / brtson 'grus
119b6(mdo sde): la blang ba ma mchis pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / shes rab la gnyis su ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can 'phags pa'i nor bdun
119b7(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa thams cad du bor ba rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang / log
119b8(mdo sde): bar lta ba rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs shing nyams nga ba thob pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag 'bras bu mi 'tshal bar spro ba brtan
120a1(mdo sde): pa'i stobs kyi shugs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa
120a2(mdo sde): don gzhag pa'i slad du bskal pa chen po bcur yang sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la spro bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang / yi dgas rnams dang / 
120a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang / mi dngul po rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la yang spro bar gyur cig/ ji ltar sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i sa bon 'jog pa ltar/ 
120a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la yang de bzhin du gyur cig/ chung pa stong pa lta bu dang sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul dab de lta bu dag yongasu 'dzin par gyur cig/ bdag gis
120a5(mdo sde): srid pa tha ma pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/ bgyid pa'i slad du skye ba gcig gis thogs shing dga' ldan gyi gnas nas dus la sdod cing mchis pa ma gtogs
120a6(mdo sde): par bskal pa'i mtha'i' bar du yang lha'i bde ba skye bdag don du mi gtor bar bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dgal
120a7(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bgyis nas bdag sangs rgyas re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag bgyid par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas re re las
120a8(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi yon tan dag rtogs par gyur cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzan
120b1(mdo sde): du stsol bar gyur cig de bzhin du bdag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par 'dzin du
120b2(mdo sde): stsol bar gyur cig 'jig rten na sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis na yang bdag gi drang srong gi brtul zhugs kyis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor bar gyur
120b3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin rnams dang / mngon par shes pa dag la yang sbyor bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can lta ba la chags shing dbang phyug chen po la dad pa rnams kyang dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs
120b4(mdo sde): kyi dge ba rnams la sbyor bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can sred med kyi bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi dam dang / tshangs pa'i bar dag la dad pa rnams kyang tshangs
120b5(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs kyis dge ba'i chos rnams la sbyor bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du na mkha' lding rnams la yang na mkha' lding gi gzugs dang brgya byin gyi bar la yang
120b6(mdo sde): brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi dge ba'i spyod pa dag la sbyor bar gyur cig/ sems can ltogs pa rnams la yang rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par bgyid par gyur cig/ sems
120b7(mdo sde): can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la yang rang gi lus dang srog gis yongs su skyob par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag yun ring po de srid du sems kyi rgyud tshig cing / 
120b8(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu nyams pa rnams kyi don du stobs po che'i shugs kyis spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag gis yun ring po de srid du 'khor bar sems can rnams kyi slad gtum pa dang / 
121a1(mdo sde): brlang ba dang / mi bzang ba sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal dganod par gyur cig/ bskal bgrangs ma mchis pa gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi
121a2(mdo sde): pabar dag 'das nas lhag ma bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab ste/ bskal pa bzang po la thug pa na/ gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'u skar ma skyong bla na me/ 
121a3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bgyi bar 'gyur ba/ de'i dus na bdag gos 'phags pa
121a4(mdo sde): rab kyi mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/ sa nas rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyal
121a5(mdo sde): lo bskor nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag mthong bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can sem sa kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
121a6(mdo sde): 'grogs pa rnams dang / nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong par bor ba rnams dang / mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / dam
121a7(mdo sde): chos spong ba rnams dang / lam ngan pa'i bar gyis bcom pa rnams dang / nyam nga ba thob pa gang dag dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing / 
121a8(mdo sde): btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can de dag bdag gis dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin tu stsol ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin
121b1(mdo sde): tu tshu la la 'dul zhing 'jud de rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon de yang blan med pa'i myangan las 'das pa la 'jog cing / ngan song nas/ 
121b2(mdo sde): las yongasu thar par bgyid par gyur cig/ shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs la sbyor bar yang gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i
121b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'bul bar yang gyur cig/ de'i chen bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang thob par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
121b4(mdo sde): dang bzod pa dag kyang thob par gyur cig/ sa gnon par yang gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can ded dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam yang
121b5(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du stsol cing slong du stsol bar yang gyur cig/ de dag kyang ji ltar 'tsham pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi na na tan bkod pa dag kyang 'dzin par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe
121b6(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po la bab ste/ rgyal ba nyi ma 'khor ba 'jig shar ba de'i tshe bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na sangs
121b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur cig/ de'i tshe na bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
121b8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lags pa'i drung du mchi bar gyur cig/ mchis nas kyang mchod pa sna tshog/ 
122a1(mdo sde): tshogs bgyid par gyur cig/ zhu ba yongasu zhu bar yang gyur cig/ rab tu 'byung bar yang gyur cig/ tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / ting 'dzin
122a2(mdo sde): dag la mngon par brtson par yang gyur cig/ chos kyi mchog ston par yang gyur cig/ de'i tshe sems can gang dag sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par
122a3(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams dang / lta ba'i lam du zhugs pa rnams dang / mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang / nyam nga ba chen po thob par
122a4(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can de dag la yang chos ston par gyur cig/ bdag 'dul ba de dag kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig/ nga rgyal ba'i nyi ma nub pa de'i tshe na bdag lhun gyis grub pas sangs
122a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya par gyur kyi bar du sems can rnams bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la sbyor bar gyur cig/ dus
122a6(mdo sde): de la bab pa na lha'i 'jig rten du mchis nas lha rnams la chos ston par 'gyur zhing 'dul ba rnams kyang rab tu 'dzin par gyur cig/ sems can rnams kyi tshe lo brgya nyi shu pa'i bar du 'gyur
122a7(mdo sde): ba na/ bde ba dang / dbang phyug dang rigs dang gzugs kyi dreg pas myos shing ser sna can du gyur te/ snyigs ma lnga'i mun par chud pa'i sems can 'dod chags bdo ba
122a8(mdo sde): zhe sdang bdo ba gti mug bdob/ nga rgyal bango ba/ sdig pa dang / phra dog dang / ser sna bdo ba/ chos ma lags pa la 'dod chags kyis chags pa/ chos ma lags
122b1(mdo sde): pa'i lo spyod tshol ba/ log par lta ba/ byin ci log tu mthong ba/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba par mi 'dzin pa dang mar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa
122b2(mdo sde): bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ bgyi ba ma lags par bgyid pa/ bsod nams ma lags pa khri ga 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi ldan pa/ bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos
122b3(mdo sde): po gsum po dag la mi brtson pa/ theg pa gsum ngon du mi gnyer ba legs par spyod pa gsum la mi brtson pa/ nyes par spyod pa gsum la brtson pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
122b4(mdo sde): mi brtson pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi laM la rtson pa/ phyin ci log bzhi so nyams pa/ rgud pa bzhi lag na so ba/ bdud bzhi'i dbang du mchis pa/ chu bo bzhis
122b5(mdo sde): ded pa/ sgrib pa lnga'i dbang du mchis pa'i sems can dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// dbang po drug gi dregs pas myos pa/ log pa brgyad la bzhugs
122b6(mdo sde): pa/ 'dod pa'i nyam nga ba thob pa/ bag la nyal kun nas slong ba/ lha dang mi'i dpal dang / 'byor pa don du mi gnyer ba phyin ci log gi lta ba can lam ngan pas
122b7(mdo sde): bcom pa/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa/ 
122b8(mdo sde): khwakhAltar mu tshor smra ba/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ dran pa nyams pa/ dge ba la smod pa/ shes rab 'chal pa/ thos pa nyung ba/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul 'chos pa
123a1(mdo sde): ser sna can/ phan tshun mi snyan pa brjod pa/ gcig la gcig mi gus pa/ le lo can/ dbang po mtshang ba/ nyam chung ba/ gos ma
123a2(mdo sde): mchis pa/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pa/ bsam pa dang dran pa'i snying po nyams pa/ nad sna tshogs kyis nyan pa/ nyon mongs par gyur pa/ mdog ngan pa/ mi sdug pa/ 
123a3(mdo sde): ba ma mchis pa/ khrel ma mchis pa/ gcig gis gcig 'jigs pa/ gang dag snga dro gcig la lus dang / ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa mang du spyod pa de dag la stod cing / zer ru/ 
123a4(mdo sde): tu lta ba'i sems can dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pa'i sems dang / 'dod dpa'i yon tan lnga la chums pa'i sems dang / sdang ba'i
123a5(mdo sde): sems dang / gnod sems kyi sems dang / kho na du 'dzin pa'i sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems dang / rnyog pa'i sems dang / rtsub pa'i sems dang
123a6(mdo sde): 'khrug pa'i sems dang / ma dul ba'i sems dang / gnod pa'i sems dang / rgod pa'i sems dang / chos ma lags pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems dang / khyad par la mi
123a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i sems dang phan tshun nongs pa rtsom pa'i sems dang / 'dzangs pa'i sems dang / gcig la gcig gsod pa'i sems dang / chos yongasu spangs pa'i sems dang / mi
123a8(mdo sde): brtson pa'i sems dang / chos rnams la nongs par brtson pa'i sems dang / mi dge bskyed pa'i sems dang / mya ngan las 'das bzhi pa mi tshol ba'i sems dang / sbyin gnas ma lags pa'i se
123b1(mdo sde): dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i sems dang / nad dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba la yid rton pa'i sems dang / kun tu sbyor ba thams cad kyis gnas
123b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang sgrub pa thams cad yong su 'dzin pa'i sems dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgyel bar bgyi ba'i sems dang / lta ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyi ba'i semos dang / phan tshun mi snyan
123b3(mdo sde): pa brjod pa'i sems dang / gcig gis gcig bza' ba'i sems dang / phan tshun 'che ba la dbang bgyid pa'i sems dang / zhe sdang yang dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang / gcig la
123b4(mdo sde): gcig kun nas mnar sems kyis sems dang / 'dod pa ngag gis ngoms mi myong ba'i sems dang / thams ca/ dad yongasu 'dzin cing 'jug pa'i sems dang / byas pa mi
123b5(mdo sde): gzo ba'i sems dang / gzhan gyi chung ma brna ba pa'i sem sa dang / gnod sems kyis 'tshe ba'i sems dang / smon lam ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can dag
123b6(mdo sde): kyang de'i tshe na 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// der sgra 'di lta bu dag phan tshun thos par yang bgyid de/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgra dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sgra dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
123b7(mdo sde): gyi sgra dang / nad kyi sgra dang / rga ba'i sgra dang / 'chi ba'i sgra dang / gsod pa'i sgra dang / mi khom pa'i sgra dang / rtag tu dgra bgyid pa'i dgra dang / khong sgo dang / khong sgril dang / 
123b8(mdo sde): 'ching ba dang / btson ra'i sgra dang / chad pa'i sgra dang / gnod pa'i sgra dang / mi snyan pa dang / bshe ba dang / spyo ba'i sgra dang / khyim 'bugs pa'i sgra dang / tshogs 'byed pa'i
124a1(mdo sde): sma dang / chom rkun gyi sgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi sgra dang / mu ge'i sgra dang / 'dod bal log par gsam pa'i sgra dang / brdzun du smra ba'i sgra dang / A
124a2(mdo sde): ngan gyi sgra dang / pra ma'i sgra dang / tshig rtsub po'i sgra dang / tshig khyal pa'i sgra dang / phra dag dang / ser sna'i sgra dang / kun tu 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / yongasu 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / ngar
124a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa'i sgra dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i sgra dang / 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa'i sgra dang / sdug pa dang bral ba'i sgra dang /  tshang gi sgra dang / gcig gis/ 
124a4(mdo sde): gcig 'khol zhing 'che ba'i sgra dang / mngal na gnas pa'i sgra deng / dring ba'i sgra dang / grang ba'i sgra dang tsha de'i sgra dang / bsgres pa dang gom pa'i sma dang / ngalas
124a5(mdo sde): dang chang par tshal ba'i sgra dang / zhing slas kyi sgra dang / ba 'i las sna tshogs kyis yongasu skyo ba'i sgra dang nangs tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sgra dag stesems
124a6(mdo sde): can de dag gcig la gcig sgra de lta bu dag thos par yang bgyid lagaso// de'i tshe na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ni/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu nyams pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen
124a7(mdo sde): yong su nyams pa/ snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de lta bu dag thos nas kun tu bltam par gyur te/ sems can de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa dag gis stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
124a8(mdo sde): bor bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
124b1(mdo sde): dang bral zhing mi dge ba dge ba dang 'grogs la/ mun khrod nas mun khrod du mchi ba'i sems can de dag ni/ de'i tshe na las kyi rkyen rab tu dam pos bskal pa bzang po la lo brgya nyi shu pa rnams su/ 
124b2(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur lags so// sems can de dag gi las kyi rkyen gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'jed kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can thams cad kyis yongs su spangs zhing dman pa
124b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ sa gzhi pa tsa can du 'gyur/ sa gzhi gor ma dang / gseg ma dang / rdul dang / ri rang rod can du 'gyur/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrul dang / gcan
124b4(mdo sde): na khro bo dang / bya gdugs pa dag gis kun tu bltam par 'gyur/ dus ma lags par rdul gyis 'khrigs dpa'i bser ma ldang bar 'gyur/ dus ma lags par ro
124b5(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / lan tsa dang 'dres pa dang / mi bas la ba'i char pa 'bab par 'gyur zhing / de ltar sa la la/ tog dang / sman dang rtsa dang shing ljon pa dang / lom
124b6(mdo sde): dang / me tog 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / nor rnams dang / sems can rnams kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa rnams kyang ngan pa dang / 
124b7(mdo sde): rnyog pa can dang / rung rung po dang / rtsub pa dang / dug dang 'dres par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gis 'tshal nas kyang / slar zhing rgya cher rtsub pa dang / gdug
124b8(mdo sde): ba dang / khro ba dang / gtum pa dang / brlang ba dang / 'jungs pa dang / gshe ba dang / gcig la gcig mi gus pa dang / 'jigs pa'i sems kyis
125a1(mdo sde): kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang / gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sha 'tshal ba dang / khrag 'tshal ba dang / ri dgas kyi dgas pa
125a2(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dang / mtshon cha thogs pa dang / srog chags 'gums pa la brtson pa dang / byad gzugs dang / rigs dang / rgyud dang dbang phyug dang / bstan bcos dang / yi ge dang / 
125a3(mdo sde): rta rtsal dang / mda' gzhu dang / mtshon cha thogs pa dang / 'khor dang / sar sna dang / dregs nges par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs ngan pa rnam pa sna
125a4(mdo sde): tshogs la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na dag 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu da smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dga' ldan gyi gnas nas
125a5(mdo sde): babs te/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs rgyud khyad par du 'phags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i rigs btsun mo dam pa'i khong du mngal na gnas pa nye bar 'dzin par gyur cig/ 
125a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe bdag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyid par 'gyur zhing steng du ni 'og min gyi gnam gyi bar gyi mthar thugs pa'i bar dang
125a7(mdo sde): 'og du ni gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thugs pa'i bar dag kyang snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur cig/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad na/ sems can gang dag sems can dmyal
125a8(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang lha dang mi rnamasu skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang snang ba de mthong zhing reg pa dang kun tu 'tshal
125b1(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ 'khor ba la rtog cing sdug bsngal gyis yid byung ba de dag kyang / mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal zhing / tha na nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i sems skyed par yang gyur cig/ 
125b2(mdo sde): dang por lam mchog gi sa bon 'di yang skyed par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad ston pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig gis bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar ston/ 
125b3(mdo sde): cing / sems mnyam par bzhag nas/ zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na gnas par gyur cig/ bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ yongs skyo ba'i sems can gang dag 'khor
125b4(mdo sde): las yongasu thar par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gi das bdag zla ba bcur ma'i mngal na nor bu'i snying po yang dag par ston pa la sems mnyam par bzhag nas skyil
125b5(mdo sde): mo krung gis mchis pa mthong bar gyur cig/ zla ba bcu po' des nas bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag pa ra bsags pa'i ting 'dzin gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i
125b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyis rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bgyid par 'gyur zhing / steng du ni 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang / 'og tu ni gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar
125b7(mdo sde): dag kyang / rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bgyid par gyur cig/ de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad du sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / mi rnams su skyes par gyur
125b8(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang rab tu sad pa bgyid par gyur cig// bam po bcu pa// bdag ma'i mchan khung g.yas pa nas mngon par 'byung ba'i tshe yang / thams cad dang ldan ni
126a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur cig/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad kyi sem
126a2(mdo sde): can rnams la yang dag par bskul bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon 'debs par gyur cig/ mya ngan las
126a3(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sa bon bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu skyed par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gi rkang pa'i mthil gyis sa la reg par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na
126a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thugs pa'i bar dag rnam dpa drug tu g.yos pa dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang
126a5(mdo sde): 'khrug par gyur cig/ de'i tshe na bdag gis gang dag skye gnas bzhir gtogs shing 'gro ba lnga la rten pa'i sems can tshul rten pa rnams dang sa la rten pa
126a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / nam mkha' la rten pa de dag thams cad rab tu sad par bgyid par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gi rgyud la ting 'dzin gyi myu gu ma skyes pa rnams kyang skyed par gyur cig
126a7(mdo sde): ting 'dzin gyi myu gu brtan par gyur pa rnams ni/ theg pa gsum po dag gi phyir mi ldog pa la 'god par gyur cig/ bdag btsas ma thag tu de'i modo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de'i
126a8(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po rnams dang bdud rnams dang brgya byin rnams dang / zla ba rnams dang / nyi ma rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / klu'i rtsa
126b1(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / rdzus te skyes pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang / lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po thams cad kyang
126b2(mdo sde): bdag la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mchis par gyur cig/ bdag btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur cig/ bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bsags
126b3(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gang lags pa de theg pa gsum po dag gis rab tu dang ba thob par gyur pa de ltar chos ston par gyur cig/ 'khor de na nyan thos kyi theg pa
126b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems can srid pa tham par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag pa dag gis 'dul bar gyur cig/ de na gang dag rang sang ngas rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis rnam par
126b5(mdo sde): snang byed me tog gi bzod pa thob par gyur cig/ de nag dag bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis/ rdo rje'i ting 'dzin rgya mtshan
126b6(mdo sde): 'khrugs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin desas gsum po dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag khrus bgyid par 'chal ba na/ de na klu'i rgyal
126b7(mdo sde): po chen po khyad par du 'phags pa gang dag mchis par gyur pa de dag bdag la khrus bgying bar gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis bdag 'khru bar mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis theg pa
126b8(mdo sde): gsum bdag gis ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de lta bu dag mngon par rtogs par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis bdag shing rtal 'tshal ba mthong bar gyur pa dang / rgya cher bgyid na
127a1(mdo sde): sems can gang dag gis bdag gzhon nu rtse bdag dang / gang gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / stan sna tshogs ston padag dang / brlab tu rung
127a2(mdo sde): ba dang / bud med rnams kyi gnas su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dga' ba dang / rtsed mos yid byung nas/ dgung phyed na mngon par byung ste/ rgyan dang / lhang lhub spangs nas yang dang
127a3(mdo sde): yang gos dmar po dang chos gos ngur smrig yongasu tshol ba dang byang chub kyi shing drung du nye bar bgrod pa'i slad du mchi ba mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la yang bdag gis bsod
127a4(mdo sde): nams thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ci nas kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis sems can ded gra 'dun pa drag cing brtson par gyur pa de ltar chos ston par gyur
127a5(mdo sde): cig de na gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par gyur pa'i/ sems can de dag thams cad kyis rnam par snang byed/ me tog gi ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig/ gang dag
127a6(mdo sde): gis theg pa chen po'i sa bon btab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ting 'dzin rgya mtsho 'khrugs kyi ting 'dzin thob par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin des sa gsum po dag las yang dag par
127a7(mdo sde): 'das par gyur cig/ bdag nyid kyis bdan bting ba bsdus te/ byang chub kyi shing drung du rdo rje'i gdan bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcas nas lus drang por bsrang ste mchis nas
127a8(mdo sde): bdag dbugs 'byung ba dang / dbugs rngub pa nye bar ni ba de lta bu'i mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan sgom par gyur cig/ bdag gdugs la lan cig bsam gtan las ldang bar gyur
127b1(mdo sde): cig langs nas kyang zasu til gyi 'bras bu phyed cig 'tshal bar gyur cig/ phyed ni slongs mo la stsol bar gyur cig/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du gtogs pa'i 'og min
127b2(mdo sde): gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi lha ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / bdag la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mchi bar 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad kyang bdag dka' ba spod pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba
127b3(mdo sde): de srid du yun ring por bdag de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyong par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de na gang dag gis nyan thos kyi theg par sa bon btab par gyur pa de dag gi rgyud la
127b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngar smras rapa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags pa dag kyang bdag gis 'dul ba'i srid pa tha mar gyur cig/ de bzhi/ 
127b5(mdo sde): du/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum
127b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid pa'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du gyur cig/ 
127b7(mdo sde): gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag gi bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ gling bzhi pa de na gzhan mu stegs can brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub ngan pa'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa
127b8(mdo sde): gang lags pa de dag la yang mi ma lags pa dag gis khyed cag dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/ ji ltar phyogs 'di na byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tham pa dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa dang / snying la yi/ 
128a1(mdo sde): la byed pa 'dogs shing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu spangs pa dang / ngag gi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs pa dang / de'i dbugs dbyung ba dang / dbus
128a2(mdo sde): rngub pa dag rab tu zhi ba dang / nyin gcig bzhin du lan re bsam gtan las langs nas zas su til gyi 'bras bu phyed za zhing de ltar bsam gtan sgom pa'i dka' ba spyad pa de ni mthu che ba yin de ni 'bras
128a3(mdo sde): bu che ba yin te/ de ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal te yid mi ches na deng la nyin gyis ltos shig tsA
128a4(mdo sde): sgo bar gyur cig/ de dag gis kyang dka' ba spyod pa de btang ste/ bdag dka' ba spyod pa mthong nas/  gang dag gis sems kyi rgyud la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sa bon
128a5(mdo sde): gyi myu gu gnas par 'gyur ba'i bar du ji ltar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig mi'i rgyal po rnams dang bkra khas pa rnams dang grong mi rnams dang / ldong gi
128a6(mdo sde): mi rnams dang / khyim na gnas pa rnams dang / rab tu byung ba rnams dang / grong khyim dang bcas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur zhing
128a7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ bud med gang bdag blta ba'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur ba de yang / de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma thob par 'gyur zhing / 
128a8(mdo sde): gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i bar du/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ ri dgas dang / bya gang dag gis bdag dka' ba spyod cing mchis pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag
