128b1(mdo sde): kyang / de dag gi dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus kyi tha ma thob par gyur cig/ ri dgas dang / bya gang dag nyan thos kyi theg par sa bon btab par gyur pa dag kyang bdag gis 'dul ba skye ba
128b2(mdo sde): gcig gis thogs par 'gyur zhing gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dag gi bar du ji ltar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ tshul de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas phra mo dag la yang brjod
128b3(mdo sde): par bgyi'o// de bzhin du yi dgas rnams la yang brjod par bgyi'o// ji srid du sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dbang du 'gyur zhing ngo
128b4(mdo sde): mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur ba dpag tu ma mchis/ gra dngas ma mchis pa de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la thar pa'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag skyil mo krung
128b5(mdo sde): gcig gis de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig/ ji ltar sngan chad sems can du bgrang ba gzhan mu stegs can dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang
128b6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi thegs pa pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po pasus kyang sngon de lta bu'i dka' ba ma spyad la/ slan chad kyang sems can du bgrang ba dang / gzhan mu stegs can su ya
128b7(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa rngo mi thogs pa de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa bdag spyod par gyur cig/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
128b8(mdo sde): ma thob pa de'i tshe skyes bu'i rtsal bgyid cing / bdud dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa pham par bgyid par gyur cig/ las kyi 'bras bu'i lhag ma dang bcas pa la gnas pa'i nyon mongs
129a1(mdo sde): pa'i bdud las rgyal zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ ci nas kyang bdag sems/ 
129a2(mdo sde): can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dgra bcom pa nyid 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa la yang chos ston par 'gyur
129a3(mdo sde): zhing sems kyi rgyud la dgra bcom pa nyid 'jog par gyur cig/ sems can gcig gi don gyi slad du yang bdag cho 'phrul 'bum phrag du ma ston par 'gyur zhing de'i sems kyi rgyud la yang dag
129a4(mdo sde): pa'i lta ba 'jog par gyur cig/ chos kyi don dang tshig 'bru stong phrag mang po dag kyang rjod par gyur cig/ ji ltar rngo thogs pa'i 'bras bu la yang 'jog par gyur
129a5(mdo sde): cig/ sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi nyan mongs pa'i ro bo ye shes rdo rjes 'joms par gyur cig/ theg pa rnam gsum rnam par dgod pas/ 
129a6(mdo sde): ston par gyur cig/ sems can gcig gi don du chos bston cing mi 'jigs pa'i go 'phang la rab tu dgod pa'i sladadu yang bdag dpag tshad brgya mang po dag tu sug pas mchi
129a7(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ bdag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dag dgag pa ma mchis par 'gyur zhing nyam chung ba dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / sems rnam par 'khrul pa
129a8(mdo sde): dang / mu tshor smra ba dang / spyi rdol can gyi sems dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems dang / nyon mongs pa mang pos dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / bud med
129b1(mdo sde): kyang bdag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ bdag la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mchis skye bo
129b2(mdo sde): mang po dag gis bstan pa rgyas par gyur cig/ lha rnams kyi bden pa mthong ba dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams kyang 'phags pa'i gso sbyong
129b3(mdo sde): yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la gnas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnasu skyes pa'i bar dag kyang tshangs par spyod pa la gnas par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub
129b4(mdo sde): 'thob pa na/ sems can gang dag rab tu sdang ba'i sem das kyis bdag la mtshon cha'am/ zhugs sam/ mdung ngam/ lag cha rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis 'debs
129b5(mdo sde): su mchi ba dang / tshig rtsub po dang / brlang po dag gis she zhing spro bar 'gyur ba dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu yang mi snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur
129b6(mdo sde): bdang / dug dang 'dres pa'i baba' ba dang / btung ba dag stobs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su mabs pa la gnas nas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par
129b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can dag sngon gyi 'khon gyis 'gum pa'i yo byad kyi spor bas bdag la tshig rtsub po
129b8(mdo sde): dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs dang / dug dang 'dres pa'i btung ba dag stsol bar 'gyur zhing khrag kyang 'byin par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag la bdag gis tshul
130a1(mdo sde): mas da sa pang/ nge 'azhi chen pa rnams pa pa na rnag dgagasas
130a2(mdo sde): ra tu dang par 'gyur 'de ltar chos ston par 'gyur zhing dge ba la sbyor bar yang gyur cig/ de ltar sems can dag kyang las kyi sgrub pa chags par 'gyur zhing sman ma kyang sdom pa na par
130a3(mdo sde): gyur sems can de dag gis pa sa dang / ba nga'i 'bras pa dang / 'ad chams dang bralang/ dag bzang pa la sgrub pa'i chos su yang mgyur tsa/ 
130a4(mdo sde): der bdag ga yas kyi 'bras bu yang yang su bas pa dang // mngar thugs pa dang byang bar gyur cig nga btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub tho nas kyang gdun
130a5(mdo sde): cog bzhin du bdag gi spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed sangs rgyas kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan snyam cu rtsag ta/ sa dang dpe byang bzang po brgyad cus lags pa/ 
130a6(mdo sde): brgyan pa dag sprul zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku de dag kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong bdag tu 'gying bar gyur cig/ stong pa ma lags pa dag tu yang 'gyed par gyur cig/

130a8(mdo sde): can gang dag mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams dang mi dge ba dang 'gros
130b1(mdo sde): pa'i bar dag dang / de na sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / theg pa
130b2(mdo sde): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag la bslab pa dag la 'dren par bgyid pa rnams dang / zhig ral du spyod pa rnams dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba rnams dang / sems kyi rgyud mig/ 
130b3(mdo sde): pa rnams dang dge ba'i lam rab tu nyams pa rnams dang / 'khor ba'i 'grogs dgon par zhug rnams dang / la ma ngan pas rnam par bcom zhing / nyam nga ba chen po
130b4(mdo sde): thob par gyur pa de lta bu'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig phra dag 'bum dag la chos ston par gyur cig/ sem sa can gang dag dbang phyug chen po la dad pa'i sems can de dag
130b5(mdo sde): la yang dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston paragyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du bdag gi bsngags pa rjod par yang gyur cig/ der sems
130b6(mdo sde): can rnams smon lam 'debs pa la brtson par yang gyur cigasems can de dag gis bdag gi bsngags pa thos nas/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'tshal zhing smon
130b7(mdo sde): lam yang 'debs par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag sems can de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe mdun du ma mchis sam/ chos ma bstan tam/ sems
130b8(mdo sde): rab tu dang bar ma bgyis na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te sems can de dag gum nas ngan 'gro
131a1(mdo sde): rnams su skye bar 'gyur ram pa bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma'i lus thob par ma gyur na/ bdag gi chos thams cad nyams par gyur cing bdag la smram
131a2(mdo sde): yang snang bar ma gyur cig/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag sgrub par yang rngo mi thogs par gyur cig/ gal te sems can gang dag sred med kyi bu la dad pa rnams dang / 
131a3(mdo sde): sems can de dag gum nas ngan 'gror ltung ba'i bar du gyur na/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag sgrub par rngo mi thog par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang sangs rgyas

131a5(mdo sde): nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi mtshan ma ni 'di lags te/ sems ca na de dag gi kha dog sa lta bur 'gyur ba dang / sha
131a6(mdo sde): gdong 'dra ba dang / bskyud ngas pa dang / dri mi bda' ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / che thung ba dang / nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyen pa dang / sems can de dag gi
131a7(mdo sde): yo byad rnams kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/ sems can de dag gi don du bdag de'i chen 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi gling bzhi pa ji snyed mchis par gyur pa
131a8(mdo sde): gling bzhi pa thams cad du dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'babatsang ma'i mngal du skye bston par gyur cig/ rgya cher bgyi na gzhon nu rtse bdang bza dang / las kyi gnas dang / 
131b1(mdo sde): dka' ba spyod pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khar lo bskor ba dang gling bzhi pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
131b2(mdo sde): mtha' dag nye bar ston par gyur cig/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sku gdung 'god pa'i bar dag nye bar ston par yang gyur cig bdag byang chub thob nas kyang tshig brjod
131b3(mdo sde): pas ston cing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni nyan thos kyi sde snod kyi chos bstan par 'chal bar gyur cig/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems
131b4(mdo sde): can gang lags pa de dag gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi tha dag pa pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i sems can gang lags
131b5(mdo sde): pade dag gis ni/ theg pa chen po'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ tshogs dang bral ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag la ni sbyin par
131b6(mdo sde): gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bsod nams dang bral zhing mtho ros kyi bde ba 'tshal ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi gtam gyi chos
131b7(mdo sde): bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ gcig la gcig 'jigs pa dang / rnyog pa'i sems dang rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni byams pa brjod pa'i chos bstan par
131b8(mdo sde): 'tshal bar gyur cig/ srog gcod pa rnams kyis ni snying rje bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ phrag dag dang ser snas zil gyis non pa rnams kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa'i
132a1(mdo sde): gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ gzugs dang gzugs ma mchis pa'i dregs pas myos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni btang snyoms
132a2(mdo sde): brjod pa'i gtam gyis chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi dregs pas myos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni// yang dag pa ma lags pa brjod
132a3(mdo sde): pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ theg pa chen po pa'i sems can rgod pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gis ni dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub
132a4(mdo sde): ba dran pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis ni rten cing 'brel dpar 'byung ba brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ 
132a5(mdo sde): thos pa nyung ba rnams kyis ni bskyed pa ma mchis shing thos pa 'dzin pa chud mi zab brjod pas chos bstan par 'cha/ la bar gyur cig/ lta ba ngan pa nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams
132a6(mdo sde): kyis ni stong pa nyid brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ rnam par rtog pa kun tu spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni mtshan ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tsha
132a7(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ smon pa ma mchis pa'i yongasu dag pa nyams pa rnams kyis ni smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams
132a8(mdo sde): kyis ni bsam pa yongasu dag pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ rnam par 'dres par spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyis ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa brjod
132b1(mdo sde): bas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ zad pa'i sbyor ba drod nyams pa rnams kyis ni bcos ma ma lags pa brjod pa'i chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ lhag pa'i bsam
132b2(mdo sde): ba shin du spangs pa rnams kyis ni rten pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos ston par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni// 
132b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i sems brjod pa dang / dge ba mi bskyed pa rnams kyis ni rnam par snang byed brjod pa dang / bdud kyi las la brtson pa rnams kyis ni/ stong pa nyid brjod pa dang / 
132b4(mdo sde): don dam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni mang / na par 'phags pa brjod pa dang / nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems nyams par gyur pa rnams kyis ni bral
132b5(mdo sde): ba brjod pa dang / lam mi mnyam par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ rnam par ldog par brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po la ngo mtshar du rtog pa'i sems dang
132b6(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams kyis ni ldog pa brjod pa dang / 'khor bas skyo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa dang / dge ba dang sa dang / ye shes ma rtogs pa rnams
132b7(mdo sde): kyis ni rmongs pa brjod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag gis chog par 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni thos pa brjod pa dang / gcig la gcig sems mi mnyam pa rnams kyis ni
132b8(mdo sde): 'od gzer thogs pa med pa brjod pa dang / las dka' ba la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni bya ba la 'jug pa brjod pa dang / 'khor gyis 'jigs par gyur pa nas
133a1(mdo sde): kyis ni seng ge'i tog brjod pa dang / bdud bzhis zil gyis non pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dpa' ba brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
133a2(mdo sde): zhing snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni 'od bkod pa brjod pa dang / rje su chags pa dang khong khro ba rnams kyis ni ro bo'i phung po brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos snang bas zil gyis
133a3(mdo sde): non pa rnams kyis ni rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan brjod pa dang / shes rab chen po dang bral ba rnams kyis ni sgron ma dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / gti mug gi mun par mchis
133a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis ni nyi ma'i sgron ma brjod pa dang zad pa'i nges pa'i tshig la brtson pa rnaMs kyis ni yon tan 'byung gnas brjod pa dang / bdag la dbu ba rngas pa lta bur
133a5(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sred med kyi bu brjod/ kha dang / blo g.yo zhing 'gyur ba rnams kyis ni snying ba dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / spyi gtsug daltar gda' ba rnams
133a6(mdo sde): kyis na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan brjod pa dang / sngon gyi dam bcas pa bor ba rnams kyis ni/ snying po can brjod pa dang mngon par shes pa nyams pa rnams kyis na rdo rje
133a7(mdo sde): tshig brjod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis na rdo rje'i snying po brjod pa dang / chos thams cad la smon pa rnams kyis ni rdo rje lta bu brjod pa dang / sems
133a8(mdo sde): can gyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni spyod pa dang ldan pa brjod pa dang dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni shes rab sgron ma brjod pa
133b1(mdo sde): dang / phan tshun du tshig brjod pa ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni sgra la 'jug pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi sku thob pa rnams kyis ni dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsgom pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gce
133b2(mdo sde): pa mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyis ni/ mig mi 'dzums pa brjod pa dang / dmigs pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni dgon pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo
133b3(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni 'khor lo dri ma med pa brjod pa dang / rgyu ma mchis pa'i rig pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ rigs pa la brten pa'i rje su 'thun pa
133b4(mdo sde): brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig pu zer zug lta ba rnams kyis ni/ legs par bgyid/ pa rnam par 'byed pa brjod pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad
133b5(mdo sde): kyi sa bon bskrun pa rnams kyis ni/ rgyan dang ldan pa brjod pa dang / tshig dang sgra rab tu 'byed par rdzo mi thog pa rnams kyis ni/ so so bsgrub pa brjod pa dang / 
133b6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrugs pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la yang dang yang du
133b7(mdo sde): 'jug pa rnams kyis ni brtan pa brjod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni mngon par shes pa brjod pa dang / shes rab spangs pa rnams kyis ni nyams
133b8(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / lam rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / namakha' lta bu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni/ ci yang
134a1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni yongasu dag pa la rab tu 'god pa brjod pa dang / 
134a2(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po yongasu ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni shin du yang dag par gzung ba brjod pa dang tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshol ba rnams kyis ni sbyor ba mnyam pa brjod pa dang / byang chub
134a3(mdo sde): kyiphyogs rin po che yongasu ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni rnam par gnas pas nges par 'byung ba brjod pa dang / shes pa ma bsgoms shing rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ 
134a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya brjod pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la ngo mtshar du sems pa rnams kyis ni sems ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / ji ltar thos
134a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni bskyed pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / phan tshun legs par smras pa la mi dga' ba rnams kyis ni
134a6(mdo sde): rab rib ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dang ba thob pa rnams kyis ni bsod nams che ba brjod pa dang chos kyi sgo'i char rab tu 'bab pas cho ga ma 'tshal
134a7(mdo sde): ba rnams kyis ni chos kyi sprin brjod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum rgyun chad par lta ba rnams kyis ni rin chen dkod pa brjod pa dang / shes pa nyams pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa
134a8(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni dpe ma mchis pa brjod pa dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / 'ching ba can thams cad kyis ni nam mkha'i sgo brjod pa dang / chos thams cad gzhan ma lags par sems pa rnams kyis
134b1(mdo sde): ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yongasu ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni/ 'jig rten gyi rig pa mngon sum du bgyi ba'i dngos po brjod pa dang
134b2(mdo sde): sngon gyi sangs rgyas la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa rnams kyis ni rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul brjed pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par chos kyi sgo gcig ston pa rnams kyis ni
134b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang / mdo sde thams cad la rnam par nges pa rnams kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du rnam par nges pa brjod pa dang / snying por 'gyu
134b4(mdo sde): bdang mthun pa'i chos drug yong su spangs pa rnams kyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sems kyi theg pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams
134b5(mdo sde): kyis ni/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ba'i rjes 'jug pa la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ni/ mngon par
134b6(mdo sde): shes pas rnam par rtse ba brjod pa dngade bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjesu 'jug pa la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ni/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa brjod pa dang / byang
134b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par mi brtson pa rnams kyis ni ye shes thob pa brjod pa dang / nye du la yang dag par ston pa rnams kyis ni thams cad kyi rjesu song ba brjod pa dang
134b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpo'i spyod pa lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni/ dbang bskur ba brjod pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongasu rdzogs pa rnams kyis
135a1(mdo sde): ni/ mchoms pa brjod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mi zad pa brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
135a2(mdo sde): 'dres pa mthob pa rnams kyis ni mi 'khrogs pa brjod pa dang / mnyan pa dang / blta ba don mchis pa rnams kyis ni smon lam brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
135a3(mdo sde): mngon sum du rje su rtogs par bgyi ba'i sladu rgyun 'khrugs pa rnams kyis ni/ rgya mtsho dri ma med pa brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni/ 
135a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgos pa mtha dab pa rnams kyis ni mtha' ma mchis pa dang / zug
135a5(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa brjod pasachos bstan para'atshal bar gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag g.yo ma mchis pa sgyu ma mchis pa/ 
135a6(mdo sde): drang ba drang ba'i rang bzhin can te thegs pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la tshig gcig brjod pas kyang chos kyi sgo
135a7(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / gzungs bdun khri lnga stong po yon tan de dag rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems
135a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams go cha chen po 'tshal bar gyur cig/ smon lam gyi khyad par bsam gyis mi khyab pas mngon par 'phags par gyur cig/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes
135b1(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / byang chub kyi yon tan dam pas brgyan par gyur cig/ 'di lta/ lus mtshan dang da'i byad rnams kyis brgyan par gyur cig/ ngag legs par smras pas/ 
135b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig/ ting 'dzin tshig ma mchis pa'i slad du/ thos pas brgyan pa dang / gzungs/ 
135b3(mdo sde): bskrad pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ dran pas brgyan pa dang / 'gro ba ngan pa khong du chud pa'i slad du yid kyis brgyan cing / mya ngan las 'das pas brgyan pa dang / dam
135b4(mdo sde): bcas pa la brtan pa'i sladadu/ bsam pas brgyan pa/ dang / dam bcas pa nyams su lon pa'i slad du / sbyor bas brgyan pa dang / sa nas sar 'phar
135b5(mdo sde): ba'i slad du lhag pa'i bsam pas brgyan pa dang dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong ba'i slad du sbyin pa sa brgyan pa dang / legs par thos pa khong du chud pa
135b6(mdo sde): dri ma mchis pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad la zhes 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bzod pas brgyan pa dang / 
135b7(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad nye bar bsags pa'i slad du/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyan pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'i slad du
135b8(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yongasu 'tshal ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag par skyob
136a1(mdo sde): pa'i rjes mchis pa'i sladu/ byams pas brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i slad du/ snying rjes
136a2(mdo sde): brgyan pa dang / chos thams cad la the tsom ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i slad du/ dga' bas brgyan pa dang / mthon dman gnyis pa dang bral ba'i slad du/ btang snyoms kyis
136a3(mdo sde): brgyan pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par brtse ba'i slad du mngon par shes pas brgyan pa dang long spyod mi bas pa'i rin po che'i lag pa thob pa'i slad du/ 
136a4(mdo sde): bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams na dad kyi spyod pa mngon par 'tshal ba'i slad du/ ye shes kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis chos
136a5(mdo sde): rtogs par bgyi ba la mkhas pa'i slad du blo sa brgyan pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gi snang ba thob pa'i slad du/ snang bas brgyan par gyur cig/ don dang chos dang
136a6(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'i sladadu/ so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan par gyur cig/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil
136a7(mdo sde): gyis mi non pa'i slad du mi 'jigs pas brgyan pa dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rje su thob pa'i sladadu/ yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'am
136a8(mdo sde): par thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pas sems can rnams la chos ston cing / chos kyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du/ 
136b1(mdo sde): snang bas brgyan pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad/ 'od kyis brgyan pa dang / byang bar lung ston pa'i slad du kun rjod pa'i tshe 'phrul gyis/ 
136b2(mdo sde): btsun pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rje su ston pa gsol ba'i slad du/ rjes su ston pa chos 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dam pa'i pha rol tu man
136b3(mdo sde): pa'i slangad du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang pa'i rjes zhugs pa'i sradu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs
136b4(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa dang / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes thob pa'i slad du chos kyi dbang phyug gis brgyan pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du 'gyid cing / thams
136b5(mdo sde): nad kyis mtshams pa'i slang du dge ba'i chos tham/ sa cad la nan tan snying por bgyid pas brtan par gyur/ cig/ thegs pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
136b6(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bdag la yang bdag gis tshig gcig brjod pas dge ba rnam par spong ba yang dag par bsags pa chen pos yang dag par tshim
136b7(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig/ chos kyi snang ba
136b8(mdo sde): chen po dang yang ldan par gyur cig myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngan par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar yang gyur cig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig
137a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gzhan dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po pa'i sems can gang dag/ 
137a2(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i bar gyi nongs pa dang bcas pa dang sems kyi rgyud tshig par gyur pa de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bdag gi sangs rgyas / 
137a3(mdo sde): kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa rtsub pa/ sdig pa 'tshal ba/ khra khro dang dmu rgod kyi rgyud can/ blo ldog pa kun 'dzin
137a4(mdo sde): pa'i rgyud can de dag la yang bdag gis sems dang skad brgyad khri bzhi stong dag ston par gyur cig/ sem sa can le lo can gyi bar dag la yang bdag gis chos kyi phu
137a5(mdo sde): po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rgya cher ston par gyur cig/ de na sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa chen bo bar gyur pa de dag la yang / bdag gis pha rol tu
137a6(mdo sde): phyin pa drug gi chos rnams rgya cher ston par 'gyur zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher ston par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par gyur
137a7(mdo sde): cig yang de na sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun cing bstan bcos la mngon par dga'
137a8(mdo sde): bar ma gyur pa de dag kyang bdag gis gsum la skyabasu mchi ba la 'god par 'gyur zhing slad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la yang sbyor bar gyur cig/ rnam par 'tshe ba la dga' ba rnams
137b1(mdo sde): ni/ srog gcod pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ 'dod pa mi bzad par zil gyis non pa rnams ni/ ma byin par len pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ chos ma lags pa la/ 
137b2(mdo sde): 'dod pas chags pa rnams ni/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ phan tshun brdzun gyi tshig smra ba rnams ni rdzun du smra ba spong ba la 'god par gyur
137b3(mdo sde): cig/ myos par 'gyur ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams ni/ chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa spong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag
137b4(mdo sde): nongs pa lnga po pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag ni danongs pa lnga po spong zhing dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la de 'god par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i
137b5(mdo sde): chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag ni/ bdag gis nyin zhag gcig tsam yang yan lagabargyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims la rab tu 'god
137b6(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni/ bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nye bar sbar
137b7(mdo sde): bar bgyi zhing / rab tu byung ba'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bcu'i tshangs par spyod pa la 'god par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams yongasu tshol bar 'tshal ba de dag ni// 
137b8(mdo sde): bdag gis dge ba'i chos rnams la nye bar bsgrubs nas tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / kun 'dzin/ 
138a1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyud can gyi bar de lta bu dag gi don du bdag gis don dang / tshig dang yi ge rnam pa sna tshogs mang ba dag gi tshe 'phrul rnams kyis chos ston
138a2(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag ma mchis pa dang / stong par ston par 'gyur zhing / bde
138a3(mdo sde): dadang / dge ba dang zhi ba dang / shis pa dang / 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ de ltar bdag 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / 
138a4(mdo sde): dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la chos ston par gyur cig/ gang dag rtsod 'tshal de bar 'gyur ba de dag la bdag gis chos kyis brtsad pa'i
138a5(mdo sde): bstan bcos rab tu ston par gyur cig/ gang dag dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par mi dga' ba de dag/ la bdag gis zhal ta bgyid pa'i las ston par gyur cig/ 
138a6(mdo sde): kha ton la mngon par dga' ba rnams la ni stong pa nyid kyi bsam gtan gyi cha gcig gis rnam par grol ba'i lam ston par gyur cig/ sems can re re'i don gyi slad du/ yang bdag
138a7(mdo sde): dpag tshad 'bum phrag mang po dag tu sug pas mchi bar 'gyur zhing / don dang tshig dang / yi ge dang thabs dang / cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag gis skyo ba ma mchis shing spro bar
138a8(mdo sde): bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dag la 'god par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis bdag gi tshe'i 'du byed ji tsam pa'i lnga cha 'dor bar gyur cig/ bdag
138b1(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe na/ rang gi sku gdung bdag nyid kyis yungs 'bru'i tshad tsam du gcog par 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du/ bdag na
138b2(mdo sde): slad kyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig/ bdag yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang lo stong du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur cig/ yang lo lnga brgyar ni dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs
138b3(mdo sde): brnyan gnas par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag bdag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams la rin po che rnams dang / rol mo'i sgra dag gi bar gyis mchod pa bgyid par spro ba
138b4(mdo sde): skye ba'i 'gyur ba dang / tha na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tsam dang / phyag gcig tsam dang / bskor ba gcig tsam dang / thal mo sbyar ba gcig tsam dang / me tog
138b5(mdo sde): gcig tsam gyi rgyus mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag tham/ sa cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ sems can gang
138b6(mdo sde): dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa la tha na bslab pa'i gzhi gcig tsam 'dzin par 'gyur ram/ ji tsam bstan pa bzhin du yang blangs nas gnas sam/ tshig bani
138b7(mdo sde): pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi bar dag kun chub par bgyid dam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang ston par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis thos nas sems rab tu dang bar 'gyur/ 
138b8(mdo sde): zhing tha na dam pa'i chos smra ba la me tog gcig tsam dang / phyag gcig tsam gyis mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ theg pa gsum dag
139a1(mdo sde): gis slar mi ldog par gyur cig/ ji tsam na dam pa'i chos nub ste/ chos kyi sgron ma ni gum/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni skyel bar gyur pa na/ bdag stsa
139a2(mdo sde): ba'i sku gdung de dag kyang gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i dog sa la lhags par 'gyur zhing / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na rin po ches phongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de dag nor
139a3(mdo sde): bu bai DUR+Ya tog gi blo gros shes bgyi bar gyur te/ zhugs ltar gda' zhing kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ de yang de nas mngon par 'phags te/ gong du 'og min gyi gnas mthar thug pa'i
139a4(mdo sde): bar du gnas nas/ me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'be bus par 'gyur zhing / me tog mnad rab dang / man dad ra ba chen po dang / pa ri ya tra ga dang / man 'dzu sha ka
139a5(mdo sde): dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / man brna dang / zla badz+ri med dang / 'dab brgya pa dang mang ba stong pa dang / kun tu
139a6(mdo sde): 'od dang / kun tu dri dang / shin tu mdzes pa dang / rtag tu 'bras bu rgyas dang / snying dang / mig mngon par dga' ba dang / skar 'od dang / skar mdog dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa
139a7(mdo sde): dri mtha' yas dang / me tog de lta bu dag gi me tog gi char chen po mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig/ me tog gi char de dag las kyang sgra sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste/ 
139a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'i sgra dang / 'phags pa'i gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i sgra dang / rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi ba
139b1(mdo sde): sdom pa sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / tshangs par spyod pa mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sgra dang / zhal ta bgyid pa'i sgra dang / klog pa'i sgra dang / nang du yang dag
139b2(mdo sde): 'jog go sgra dang / tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i sgra dang / mo sdug pa'i sgra dang / dbugs rgyu ba dang / rngub pa'i sgra dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sgra dang / 
139b3(mdo sde): yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang / na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang / zad par gyi skye mched
139b4(mdo sde): kyi sgra dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sgra dang / stong pa nyid dang mtsham ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / smon pa dam mchis pa'i sgra dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sgra dang / 
139b5(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang / rang sa ngas rgyas kyi theg pa'i sde snod mtha' dag gi sgra 'byung ba dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' dag
139b6(mdo sde): gi sgra dag/ me tog de dag las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis thos par gyur nas/ rang rang gi sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rje su dran
139b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing / sems can chen po dag dge ba'i chos thams cad la smon pa ma mchis par gyur nas/ de dag de nas babs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad kyang / dag/ 
139b8(mdo sde): ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang thos par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang sred med pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang / dga' ba/ 
140a1(mdo sde): dang / rtsed mo dang / yid bde ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gis
140a2(mdo sde): sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rjesu dran par 'gyur zhing / de dag lha'i 'jig rten nas babs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par
140a3(mdo sde): 'dzin du 'jug cing / rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me tog de dag kyang na mkha' la rin po che sna tshogs dag tu 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste/ dngul dang 'gron bu dang / 
140a4(mdo sde): gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rdul can dang nga / sa le sbram dang / rdo'i snying po dang / g.ya su 'khyil ba dang / de lta
140a5(mdo sde): bu'i rin po che'i char dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams/ cadu mngon par rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad na thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / 
140a6(mdo sde): rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang nad dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / tshig rtsub cing brlang ba dang / dug rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mad
140a7(mdo sde): thams cad du bde ba dang / nad ma mchis pa dang / zab mo dang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'ching ba dag ma mchis pa dang / lo legs pa dag kun du gnas par gyur cig/ sems
140a8(mdo sde): can gang dag gis rin po che de dag mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / long spyod dang / yongasu spyod pa'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par
140b1(mdo sde): gyur cig sku gdung de dag kyang slar gser gyi 'khor lo'o mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas par gyur cig/ 
140b2(mdo sde): bam po bcu gcig pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na yang de dag nor bu rin po che a nang rnyil dag tu kun nas gnas par 'gyur zhing
140b3(mdo sde): de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thugs pa'i bar du gnas nas/ 'di lta ste/ me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / pa ri ya tra ka dang / me tog mtha' yas kyi bar gyi ma
140b4(mdo sde): tog sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig/ me tog gi char de dag kyang ji ltar sngar smos pa'i dbar bzhin du blta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi
140b5(mdo sde): sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / sgra yid du 'ong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ yang sku gdu nga de dag kyang slar 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i
140b6(mdo sde): bar du kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na yang sku gdung de dag steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gyen du 'phags nas
140b7(mdo sde): me tog gi char gyi bar du sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ nad kyi bskal pa bar ma'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ ji ltar bskal pa chen po bzang po la/ bdag
140b8(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams ston pa'i mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing / 'dul ba bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi
141a1(mdo sde): ldog pa la 'god par 'gyur/ de bzhin du bskal ba chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag byung gi bar du yang bdag gi sdug du
141a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog par 'god par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub sems dpar gyur cing / bla na med pa yang dag
141a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa na/ gang dag bdag gis dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing rab tu bkod
141a4(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa de dag slad kyis gang gi tshe bskal pa
141a5(mdo sde): grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed 'das/ nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / ga tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dang gzhan
141a6(mdo sde): ngag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sha stag tu 'gyur te 'byung bar gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
141a7(mdo sde): 'dzin du skul cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can rnams dang / gang dag bdag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pas/ bla na med pa yang
141a8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang slad kyis bskol pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed byung zhing 'das par gyur
141b1(mdo sde): ba na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bdag tu/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
141b2(mdo sde): 'di skad du gang yun ring po na bskal pa bzang po zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ bskal pa babang po de la bab pa na/ rgyal ba nyi ma bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba
141b3(mdo sde): zhig byung bar gyur pa des/ bdag cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu btsud de rab tu bkod do// bdag cag ni sems kyi rgyud tshig pa mi dge
141b4(mdo sde): ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa/ mtshams med pa byedad pa/ log par lta ba'i bar du gyur pa yin na/ des bdag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du
141b5(mdo sde): bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pas na/ de'i phyir bdag cag da ltar thams cad mkhyen par gyur cig// rnam pa thams cad du chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
141b6(mdo sde): skor la/ 'gro ba'i 'khor lo zlog cing sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed pa yin no zhes bdag gi
141b7(mdo sde): bsngags pa rjod cing sgrogs la dbyangs kyang rjod par gyur cig/ gang dag byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las bdag gi bsngags
141b8(mdo sde): pa dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa thos par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na/ 
142a1(mdo sde): ltar rtsod pa'i dus la bab cing snyigs ma lnga byung bar gyur pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur ces
142a2(mdo sde): yongs su zhu bar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bsku
142a3(mdo sde): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul 'di yang ston par gyur cig/ byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang
142a4(mdo sde): ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / de dag kyang rgya chen dpo la mos par gyur cig/ de dag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par 'gyur zhing // 
142a5(mdo sde): de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su snyigs ma lnga dang nyon mongs pa'i snyiH/ sa ma bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis ba bgyid pa dang / mi dge ba'i bar dag kyang 'grogs pa'i
142a6(mdo sde): 'dul ba rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i smon lam yang 'debs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
142a7(mdo sde): kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang / nyon mongs pa bdo ba'i rtsod pa'i dus su smon lam btab pa bzhin du/ byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snying rje
142a8(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du de lta bu'i lung bstan pas lung ston par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag kyang / sems can byang chub don du byang
142b1(mdo sde): chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'di skad du yun ring po 'di srid cig na rgyal ba nyi ma mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de yongasu mya ngan las 'das
142b2(mdo sde): pa'i sku gdung rnams kyis de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams kyi don de lta bu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag mdzad de de'i sku gdung gi rnam par
142b3(mdo sde): 'phrul pa dag gis nged cag dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul nas/ nged cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pas dang
142b4(mdo sde): po sems bskyed cing / pha rol du phyin pa 'di dag la brtso na pa byas so zhes bdag gi sku gdung gi rnam par 'gyur ba'i da sngon gyi tshul dag ji ltar smos pa'i bar du rgya cher ston par
142b5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya man 'i rdul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i sna po'i spyan sngaralha dang dri za dang
142b6(mdo sde): mi dang bcas pa'i skye dgu thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i smon lam chen po lnga brgya po de dag btab nas des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
142b7(mdo sde): gal te de ltar bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang / zab mo dang / snyigs ma bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa na/ 'jig rten mdongs shing
142b8(mdo sde): 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / yongs su 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / lta ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mun par chud pa'i 'jig rten na/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang / sngar smos/ 
143a1(mdo sde): pa lta bu'i bar dag la bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / gal te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
143a2(mdo sde): pathams cad sgrub par rdordzothog pa ltan/ byang chub kyi srang du smon pa spang bar mi bgyi zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang zhing gzhan du yongasu bsngo bar mi bgyid ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das den
143a3(mdo sde): bdag gi nges po lag so// yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa 'das rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi 'tshal/ nyan thos kyi theg pa yang mi 'tshal/ lha dang ma'i 'jig rten gyi rgyal srid kyang mi 'tshal/ 
143a4(mdo sde): dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug kyang mi 'tshal/ 'dod dpa lnga'i yon tan gyi longs spyod kyang mi 'tshal/ lhar skye ba yang mi 'tshal/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang
143a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu dang na mkha' lding du skye/ ba yang mi 'tshal la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan du yongs/ su bsngo bar yang mi bgyid de/ gang yang bcom ldan 'das
143a6(mdo sde): kyis 'di skad du/ sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye/ thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur/ bsgoms pas ni 'bral bar 'gyuraro zhes kyang

143a8(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang bdag gis kyang sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / zos pa las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ngag bsgrubs pas na/ 
143b1(mdo sde): gal te bdag gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sems can gang dag gis/ sems can
143b2(mdo sde): dmyal ba mnar med pa rab tu rtsub cing drag pa'i sdug bsngal nyam su myong ba'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sladu/ yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des de dag de nas lngan
143b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mi thob pa thob par yang gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur zhing mchog nyid kyis yongs su
143b4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' bar yang gyur cig/ sems can de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu yongasu ma byas par gyur na yang / de'i slad du bdag dgum nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye
143b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gi lus kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab rdul snyed kyi ting 'dzin gyis kyang mi rtsolakha dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re re'i tshad
143b6(mdo sde): kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang ji ltar da ltar gyi lus gcig pu 'dis bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tsha
143b7(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag yang dag par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa mi bzang ba/ sangs rgyas
143b8(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag myong bar gyur cig/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snying dag na/ sems can gang dag mtsham/ 
144a1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mnar med pa'i bdag la gzhol ba'i las ngag yang dag par stsogs par 'gyur ba rnams dang / sems can gang dag bskal pa chen
144a2(mdo sde): po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu mtshams ma mchis pa las
144a3(mdo sde): kyis 'phen par 'gyur ba 'am/ kun nas slong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi don tu bdag las des sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas pa nyam su myong bar 'gyur zhing bdag
144a4(mdo sde): gi sems can dag ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig/ sems can de dag thams cad kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur// 
144a5(mdo sde): ba dang / 'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid kyis/ bdag sems can dmyal ba
144a6(mdo sde): las yongasu thar bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar gzhan dag na/ sems can rnams kyis de lta ba'i las kun nas bslang sa
144a7(mdo sde): 'phangs pa dang / myong bar 'gyur bar nges pas/ sems can dmyal ba rab tu tsha bar skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du cha ba dang / ngu 'bong chen po dang / ngu 'bod dang / bsdus gan
144a8(mdo sde): dang // miganag dang / yangasas kyi bar dag la yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du brjod par gyi'o// de bzhin du dung 'gra zla chags dag la yang brjod par 'gyu'o// de bzhin du gnon rjen
144b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gnod sbyin dbul po la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du grul brum dang / sha bra dang / namakha' lding dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// 
144b2(mdo sde): gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sems can rnams sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin du
144b3(mdo sde): sbyar te/ gang dag mi rnams kyi nang du 'on pa dang / long ba dang / lce ma mchis pa dang / lag pa ma mchis pa dang / rkang pa ma mchis pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag
144b4(mdo sde): tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang / mi gtsang ba za ba rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yang ba dag sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa dag tu skye bar gyur
144b5(mdo sde): cig/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub tu re bo de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba lta na/ 'khor bar sems can rnams yun ring po ji srid du khams
144b6(mdo sde): dang / skye mched dang / phung po yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i yun rings po de srid du/ bdag ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
144b7(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / srin po rnamasu mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu dag gis de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur cig/ ji ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i bar
144b8(mdo sde): gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di dag lta bu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gi dbang du gyur cig/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
145a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
145a2(mdo sde): kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur zhing / ye shesu 'gyur bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs
145a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag sgrub par rngo thog cing bdag bskal pa bzang po la skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
145a4(mdo sde): zhabs su ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du/ 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tu gsol/ de nas de'i
145a5(mdo sde): mod la de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du ba cas pa'i 'jig rten sa dang na mkha'i nges la gnas pa de dag
145a6(mdo sde): thams cad mchi ma rab tu 'dzag bzhin du yan lag lngas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis dran pa zab mo thob pa dang / sems can zab mo rnams la snying rje chen
145a7(mdo sde): po bskyed pa dang / smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa ni leg so leg so// lhag pa'i bsam pa des sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag par bkab cing / mtshams med pa byed
145a8(mdo sde): pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no// ji ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa'i
145b1(mdo sde): smon lam des na/ sems can rnams kyi sman dang / skabs dang dpung gnyen gyur bar shes so// sems can rnams sdug bsngal las rab tu bar bar bya ba'i smon lam bta' pa de bzhin du ltu
145b2(mdo sde): kyis bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par yang gyur cig/ rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa nyid kyang ngu zhing bram po
145b3(mdo sde): rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smras pa/ e ma'o mchog tu zab pa po// khyod ni bde la mi gnas te// khyod ni sems can snying rje ldan// khyod ni bdag gi mtshon ma yin// de bzhin
145b4(mdo sde): du sbyar te spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ sems da can chags pa dag la khyod ma chags// dbang po rta thul rnams las dbang rta thul// dbang po 'di rnams
145b5(mdo sde): la ni dbang mdzad de// gzungs dang ye shes kyis ni mdzod du 'gyu ra/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ mthu chen thob kyis smra sa pa/ sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams/ 
145b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i don du kun nas 'dus pa dag/ mchog tu dka' ba'i sdug bsngal chen po yi// khyod ni snying rje la ni ngu bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ brtson 'grus
145b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin brtan pa dang // mkhas 'a dang ni shes rab mchog/ phreng 'dri dang byug pa yis// de phyir khyod la mchod par 'os// byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i phyag rgyas smras pa/ snying rje
145b8(mdo sde): chen pos sems can la// de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin// khyod ni dus 'di zad nas kyang // mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjes gcod pa shes rab snang
146a1(mdo sde): pa'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras// ji ltar na mkhar rgya cheb// de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas// khyod kyis sems can 'dzags med lam// byang chub
146a2(mdo sde): spyod pa dag kyang bstan// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed shugs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par// sems can la brtse gzhan med de// gang phyir shes rab
146a3(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i mchog/ khyod ni yon tan kun dang ldan// spos kyi seng ges smras pa/ khyod ni ma 'ongs dus na ni// bzang la nyon mongs bdud kyi tshe// sems can sdug bsngal sgrol byed cing // 
146a4(mdo sde): khyod kyi grags dang snyan pa 'thob// byang chub sems dang 'akun tu bzang pos smras pa/ skye ba'i dgon par brtson gyur cing // log rgyus shin tu nyams ngab// sha za ba dang
146a5(mdo sde): khrag 'thung ba'i// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// mi 'khrugs pas smras pa/ ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs chud cing // nyon mongs 'dam du bying gyur la// mtshams med
146a6(mdo sde): bdag byed pa po// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// spos kyi glang pos smras pa/ khyod kyis ma 'ongs 'jigs mthong ba// ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor bzhin// dam pa'i
146a7(mdo sde): chos ni spong byed pa'i// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// rin po che tog gos smras pa/ ye shes tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang // snying rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// 'phags
146a8(mdo sde): la skur pa 'debs byed pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// 'jigs dang gdung bral gyis smras pa// khyod kyis ngan song gsum lam du// sems can sdug bsngal
146b1(mdo sde): rnams mthong ba// chang ba stong 'drar gnas gyur pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// lag na ud pa las smras pa/ khyod kyi snying rje ye shes dang // brtson 'grus kyis na
146b2(mdo sde): 'khor ba bcom// skye dang 'chi bas gzir gyur pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// ye shes grags pas smras pa/ nad mang dag gis nyen pa dang / nyon mongs rlung gis ngas
146b3(mdo sde): pa dag/ ye shes chu yis zhi byas te/ bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom// gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smras pa/ ji ltar khyod ni nyi ma bzhin// nyon mongs dra ba rab bcom ste/ 
146b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pad cing rnam thar pa'o// brtson 'grus debastan pa nged la med// ud pa la zla bas kyang smras pa/ ji ltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas// brtson
146b5(mdo sde): 'grus bstan pa yang dag mos// srid pa'i bcing bas rab bsdams pa// khams gsum po dag grol bar byed/ dri med dbang pos smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul
146b6(mdo sde): gyi// snying rje chen po dag bstan pa// snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba po// khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshalo// stobs chen shugs 'chang gis kyang smras pa/ nyon mongs ldan pa'i rtsod
146b7(mdo sde): dus che// byang chub gang dag khyod la rten// khyod kyis nyon mongs rtsad nas bcad// smon lam bstan pa 'grub par 'gyur// skar ma skyong gis smras pa/ ye shes mdzod dang
146b8(mdo sde): mtshungs 'dra ba// dri med smon lam btab pa yis// byang chub spyod phyir sems can gyi// sman dang rten du khyod 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs yang dag
147a1(mdo sde): par ston pa du zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal ma sbyar nas smras pa/ kye ma shes smon sems can rnams// nyon mongs na
147a2(mdo sde): rnams rnam par bcom// khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can// sems can sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad// rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang dri za dang / mi dang bcas pa
147a3(mdo sde): dag gis kyang / bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ don dang tshig sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshig su bcad ba dag gis mngon par bstod nas 'khod do// rigs
147a4(mdo sde): kyi bu gang gi tshe bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ de bzhin ga shegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa dang / de nas de'i mod las cher
147a5(mdo sde): g.yos par gyur cing / phyogs bcu'i kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis yang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu
147a6(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur gyi bar du gyur nas/ yang phyog/ 
147a7(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs
147a8(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston bdag tu yang snang ba chen po byung bar gyur cing / me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 
147b1(mdo sde): me tog man rab dang / me tog man rab chen po dang / 'od mtha' yas kyi bar gyi me tog gi char de lta bu'i dag rab tu ba par gyur to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
147b2(mdo sde): ngag chos nyan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan snga na 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sa g.yos pa de mthong nas/ sangs rgyas bcom
147b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing / me tog gi char chen po yang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni
147b4(mdo sde): gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags shes yongasu zhug so// / yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi khyim
147b5(mdo sde): snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bsug sa pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin kho che bsags paden/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
147b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis
147b7(mdo sde): yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gtog dang
147b8(mdo sde): zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
148a1(mdo sde): rnab pa 'di skad ces gas sa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du chen pagams dang / mchog gas chen bdag rab tu ba bar gyur
148a2(mdo sde): rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni gang lags de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag nub phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma
148a3(mdo sde): snyed 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcwa
148a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par ston pa'i smon la dam bkod pa'i ting 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod
148a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye kha phrag mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngu lung ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa'
148a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des/ smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing / snying rje chen po yongasu bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa'
148a7(mdo sde): rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa bshad pa dang / srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag gis byang chub tu smon lam btab cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon/ 
148a8(mdo sde): tan bkod pa dag kyang yongasu gzung ba dang / 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongasu 'dul ba'i bar gyi smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gi thams cad dang ldan pa'i
148b1(mdo sde): 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing chung pa 'dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan nang nyon mongs pa'i sgrub ba can dang mtshams med pa byed cing / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba' bar/ 
148b2(mdo sde): dang 'grogs la/ sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su gzungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
148b3(mdo sde): yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de spangs nas/ snying rje
148b4(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar zhing 'du dag nas/ de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par byed do// sem
148b5(mdo sde): can chen po yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to// gang gi tshe sems can chen po des/ bcom
148b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi
148b7(mdo sde): zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag g.yos shing me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub
148b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems
149a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sem/ 
149a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshang bar bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul dag bstan to// rigs kyi bu de/ 
149a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis yongasu zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug
149a4(mdo sde): pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongasu bzung ste/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i
149a5(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongasu bzung bar gyur/ pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje/ chen po dang ldan pa des/ yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub
149a6(mdo sde): tu sems skyed cing / yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas bka' stsol pa/ rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni da
149a7(mdo sde): gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems dang po bskyed do// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying
149a8(mdo sde): bo de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der deng la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
149b1(mdo sde): de yang nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshig gis dris la/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba skyes bu dam pa khyod la 'dri bar/ 
149b2(mdo sde): mdzad de/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di skur zhing leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying rje chen po brjod pas/ phyogs
149b3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sgras gang bar gyur te/ des na khyod kyis thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ming rab
149b4(mdo sde): tu thob pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni bya ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen/ dpo dang ldan pa phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod
149b5(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal ma tshan legs par 'dzugs par gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs
149b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang / yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / 
149b7(mdo sde): grags pa'i sgras kun du gang bar 'gyur ro// gang khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang
149b8(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod/ 
150a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ de la kha cig smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag ni phyis lung bstan/ 
150a2(mdo sde): ba thob par 'gyur ro// gang dag khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang / byis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi
150a3(mdo sde): bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas de dag khyod las brtsams
150a4(mdo sde): nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod lag so zhes kyang smros shig/ yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dung phyur phrags dgu dang / bye ba
150a5(mdo sde): phrag gnyis kyis tshig 'thun par gsol pa/ btsun pa brtse/ ma ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/ bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i
150a6(mdo sde): snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang la yan lag gsum gyis leg so zhes bgyi ba springs shing / me tog zla ba
150a7(mdo sde): mdog mdzes drim med pa 'di skur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lag so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba des bka/ 
150a8(mdo sde): stsal pal/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng la/ der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
150b1(mdo sde): de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas rin po che tog dang / zla ba tog gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba las me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa blangs ste/ byang chub
150b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'khar dung phyur phrag dgu dang bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen bstsags pa nas 'phags na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ glog bzhin du byang / 
150b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen bstsags pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi 'dzam+bu'i tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal 'dir lhags nas/ 
150b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhab sa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i
150b5(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na bram ze thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
150b6(mdo sde): dpa'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar cing bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla bas/ gang la me
150b7(mdo sde): tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag skur pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ 
150b8(mdo sde): bram ze la me tog phul nas 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rlabs khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur te/ skyes bu dam
151a1(mdo sde): gakyang la legs zhes bya ba yang snang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar shAr smras pa bzhin na// de bzhin du sbyar/ shar phyogs kyisangs rgyas kyin
151a2(mdo sde): tu med grangs med padag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams me teg zlab mang gi mdzes dris ming bdag zigs te/ sa sa rgyas kyi dang yang dag rtog tu lhags pa dang / rngam/ 
151a3(mdo sde): zil me tog dag sbyar ba dang / yan lag gsum gyis legs zhes bya ba spring ba yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin// de bzhin du lho phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas
151a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na / 'jig rten gyi khams ba gam gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgam gyis bsgyings
151a5(mdo sde): bde ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dang dbyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho nang gnas la
151a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' shig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos ston to// 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la/ gci
151a7(mdo sde): ni ye shes rdo rje'i tog ces bya/ gcig shos ni seng ge rdo rje rtog ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dpa
151a8(mdo sde): phyag rgyal po la yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dus tshor g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags shes
151b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med/ grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gnas byang chub sems dpa'
151b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med po dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog du lhag pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs
151b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de
151b4(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag/ de la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// de na byang chub sems
151b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ 
151b6(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan la sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab pa ci las gyur ces don de yongasu zhugs pa'i
151b7(mdo sde): bar du yang ji ltas smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na byang phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das bde na 'jig rten
151b8(mdo sde): gyi khams ngur smrig ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig theg pa chen po yang dag
152a1(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'bra shig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'bar shig gachos ston tu// den byang chub sems dpa' sems da / 
152a2(mdo sde): chen po gnyis la gcig ni mi g.yo brtan pa zhes bya/ gcig shos ni shes rab 'dzin ces bya ste/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la btsun pa bcom
152a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni gang lags shes yongasu zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar spros pa bzhin no// 
152a4(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe na 'og gi phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgya da 'das bde na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gti mug
152a5(mdo sde): mun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa/ kun nas lding ba'i 'jigs pa bral ba'i dbyangs shes/ bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po
152a6(mdo sde): dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la/ gcig ni rnam par snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/ gcig shos ni rnam par snang
152a7(mdo sde): byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na steng gi phyogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi 'bum 'das pa de na/ 'jig
152a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas shes bya ba/ sangs rgyas
152b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la'akhor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
152b2(mdo sde): gnyis shig 'khod pa la gcig ni rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrug pa zhes bya/ gcig shos ni byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par
152b3(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing me tog gi char
152b4(mdo sde): chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni gang lags shes zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
152b5(mdo sde): bu dag 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi 'bum 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ 
152b6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang zhing yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam
152b7(mdo sde): gyi yul bkod pa'i ting 'dzin gyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
152b8(mdo sde): lung ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pades smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing / snying rje chen po yongasu bsgoms
153a1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang
153a2(mdo sde): ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can
153a3(mdo sde): rnams kyang yongasu bzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can
153a4(mdo sde): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / dmatshams med pa byed cing mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dpa' grogs la sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongasu
153a5(mdo sde): bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang
153a6(mdo sde): mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pa la mchod pa bya ba spangs nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma dal
153a7(mdo sde): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas ste/ thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par byed do// sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
153a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to// gong gi tshe sems can chen po des bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i
153b1(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chen po dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu
153b2(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos shing / 'gul ba dang / me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
153b3(mdo sde): chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig
153b4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i
153b5(mdo sde): spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par byang phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul bstan to// 
153b6(mdo sde): ngom po bcu gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang
153b7(mdo sde): dag par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongasu zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs
153b8(mdo sde): ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang / 'khrug pa bango zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i dus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grags
154a1(mdo sde): par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongasu bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang
154a2(mdo sde): ldan pa des yun ring po ji srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / yun ring po ji srid cig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab
154a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni gdong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs
154a4(mdo sde): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / ting 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod
154a5(mdo sde): pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog deng la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje tshon
154a6(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa la nga'i tshig gi dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyed la dri bar mdzad de/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di
154a7(mdo sde): dag kyang skur zhing / leg so zhes bya ba yang byin to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
154a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu smrasgras gang bar gyur cing snying rje chen po'i sgra yang rab tu thob pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ni khyod theg pa chen po la
154b1(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan
154b2(mdo sde): legs par 'dzugs par gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
154b3(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang / grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig
154b4(mdo sde): 'bum phrag mang po grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs nga pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de/ rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams
