154b5(mdo sde): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las khyi ma ldog pa la bkod par gyur te/ de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zad nas smon lam gyis sangs rgyas
154b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongasu bzung ba dag dang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang snying rje'i 'od gzer dag gis kun du bkab par gyur to// gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
154b7(mdo sde): byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/ lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang phyis bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi
154b8(mdo sde): zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas nyid thob cing chos dang ldan pa'i chos
155a1(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ khyod nyid las brtsams cing bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des na skyes bu dam pa khyod leg so zhes kyang smros shig/ 
155a2(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
155a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang la yan lag gsum gyis leg so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing / me
155a4(mdo sde): tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i sladu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lag so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
155a5(mdo sde): pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na khyed cag dang la der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po
155a6(mdo sde): las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed pas/ yul yang dag
155a7(mdo sde): par 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas de la me
155a8(mdo sde): tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing me tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te/ skad cig
155b1(mdo sde): gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i langam+bu'i tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal du lhags te phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po gal ba der dong ngo // yang de'i tshan thams cad
155b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang ngag dang
155b3(mdo sde): lha rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis 'di ltar yongasu gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i 'tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ngam
155b4(mdo sde): 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du// de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang / theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang / lto 'phye
155b5(mdo sde): chen po'i bar dag gis yongasu gang zhing khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
155b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na dran
155b7(mdo sde): ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams thal mo sbyar te bsngags pa brjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
155b8(mdo sde): rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis gang la/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di
156a1(mdo sde): yin pa lta snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ bram ze de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes/ 
156a2(mdo sde): dri ma med pa de dag phul nas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas kyis/ khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur zhing
156a3(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod lag so zhes bya ba yang byin te/ yan lag gsum gyis leg so zhes bya ba brjod pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// me tog gang yin pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi
156a4(mdo sde): zhing stong pa dag tu char bzhin du rab tu bab par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dge ba'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun gyis gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
156a5(mdo sde): kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang // dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / snang ba'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang stobs kyi sgra dang mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / mngon par
156a6(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i sgra dang / 'gags pa med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams pa/ 
156a7(mdo sde): chen po'i sgra dang / snying rje chen po'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa rdob pa'i sgra dang theg pa chen po'i gtam 'da' shig gi smraste/ me tog gi char chen po dengag/ 
156a8(mdo sde): gis dge ba'i sgra de lta bus/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ chos zab mo la dbang thob pa/ gang das/ 
156b1(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gyis dbang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag tu lhags pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / smon lam/ 
156b2(mdo sde): gyi dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang ba de bzhin du
156b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag nas dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog 'dir lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub
156b4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dedag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying / po la mchod pa byas shing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la yang
156b5(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir gnas ji lta bu thob par 'khod do// rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtsu bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
156b6(mdo sde): po de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag gis mchod pa byas te/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ rigs
156b7(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ting 'dzin klog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting 'dzin des thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog rin po che sna
156b8(mdo sde): bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyur nas ri dang shing ljon pa rnams dang / rtsa dang shing dang sa bzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu snang ngo // sems can gang dag tshwa/ 
157a1(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus kha cig ni ser po/ kha cig ni dkar po/ kha cig na
157a2(mdo sde): bcod ka/ kha cig ni dmar po/ kha cig ni nag po/ kha cig ni skya bor gnas te/ kha cig gi lus ni rlung lta bur kun tu snang / kha cig ni me lta bur/ kha cig ni na mkha' lta bur/ kha
157a3(mdo sde): cig ni smig rgyu lta bur/ kha cig ni ri lta bur/ kha cig ni tshangs pa lta bur/ kha cig ni brgya byin lta bur kha cig ni me tog lta bur/ kha cig ni na mkha' lding lta bur/ kha cig ni seng ge lta bur
157a4(mdo sde): kha cig ni nyi ma lta bur/ kha cig ni zla ba lta bur/ kha cig ni ska/ da ma lta bur/ kha cig ni bya rgod lta bu dang / wa lta bu dag kun tu snang ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa'i sems
157a5(mdo sde): can de dag dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kun snang ngo // rigs kyi bu de na sems can dag gis ra nga rang gi lus ji lta bur mthong ba de lta bur sems can de dag
157a6(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po rin pa
157a7(mdo sde): che sna bdun gyi pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze ba la bzhugs par mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de na sems can gang dgas dang / na mkha' la 'dug pa 'am/ 'greng ba'i sems can re res kyang
157a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po 'di ltar mthong ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug ste/ thugs thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag gcig pu
157b1(mdo sde): las brtsams te chos ston to// snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos/ bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de la leg so zhes
157b2(mdo sde): bya ba byin te/ bram ze chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa rnams la phan par byed pa dang / 'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan
157b3(mdo sde): pa yin te/ legaso legaso// bram ze 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me tog gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig la/ kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / reg pa sna tshogs dang / mdab ma sna
157b4(mdo sde): tshogs dang / sdong bu sna tshogs dang / rtsa ba sna tshogs dang / sman gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod de/ de la me to dag kha cig gi kha dog dang / dris ni dpag tshad brgyar/ kha/ 
157b5(mdo sde): cig gis ni dpag tshad nyis brgyar/ kha cig gis ni dpag tsha sum brgyar lhang / lhan ner byed cing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ de na me tog kha cig gi kha dog dang / dris ni gling
157b6(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhang nge lhan ner byed la/ de na sems can gang dag mig med pa de dag gis/ me tog de'i dri bsnams na ni mig dag thob par 'gyur/ 'on pa rnams
157b7(mdo sde): kyis ni rna ba dag thob par 'gyur yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyis ni yan lag thams cad thob par 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi po dag gis bcos
157b8(mdo sde): bar gyur pa de dag gis/ dri de bsnams na ni nad thams cad las yongasu thar bar 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag myos pa dang / brgyal ba dang / spros pa dang / sems rmugs pa dang / 
158a1(mdo sde): sems rnam par g.yengs pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis/ me tog dag gi dri bsnams na ni dran pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/ 
158a2(mdo sde): tog gi zhing de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po mkhrang ba/ sra ba rdo rje las grub pa/ 'jam pa/ sdong bu ni bai DUR+Ya/ 'dab ma ni gser/ ze 'bru ni rdo'i snying po/ ze ba ni mu tig dmar po/ pang du ni dpag
158a3(mdo sde): tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong / rgyar ni dpag tshad 'bum yod pa gcig cig skyes par gyur la/ pad+ma dkar po de'i kha dog dang / dris phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab
158a4(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed dag tu khyab cing lhang nge lhan ner 'gyur la/ bram ze phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snying po de dag na sems can gyi khams gang
158a5(mdo sde): dag lus mi mthun pa dang / nad kyi nyen pa dang / yan lag nyam sa pa dang / myos pa dang / brgyal ba dang / smros pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa dang / 
158a6(mdo sde): sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsnams na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing dran pa yang thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
158a7(mdo sde): de dag na sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring po ma lon zhing lus ma zhig pa de dag gi ro la pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od gzer dag gis phog gam/ dris reg na ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang po 'thob par 'gyur/ 
158a8(mdo sde): zhing yang phyir langs te/ mdza' bshes dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas/ de dag thams cad bskyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor zhing ldan
158b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang de nas shi 'pho bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur la/ de dag der tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing / yun ring
158b2(mdo sde): por gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gzhan dag du skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na/ bram ze me tog gi zhing de ji lta bar theg pa chen po'i 'dus pa 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar
158b3(mdo sde): bya'o// ji ltar nyi ma 'char bar nye bar gnas pa'i dus na/ me tog de dag kha bye zhing rab tu rgyas par gyur nas/ lhang nge lhan ne zhing kha cig gi 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya/ kha cig gi 'phang
158b4(mdo sde): du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur nas/ sems can ma dpo de dag gi nad sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ de da ltar ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa
158b5(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa byung ba yin no// ji ltar nyi ma shar ba'i 'od gzu ra dag gis me tog de dag kha bye zhing lam me lhang nge lhan ni ra gyur nas/ nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams
158b6(mdo sde): kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar na/ skyes bu dam pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ thugs rje chen po'i 'od gzer dag gis sems can rnams la khyab par mdzad cing kha phye nas/ yang dang yang du
158b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad pa dang / khyod kyis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par
158b8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas/ nga la phul ba de dag thams cad kyis/ nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag yongs su bzung
159a1(mdo sde): ste/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dag yongasu bzung / khatsag gis ni yongasu ma dag bdag yong su bzung zhing / rang rang sa
159a2(mdo sde): smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas kyang lung bstan pa bzhin no// skyes bu dam pa gang dag gis nga'i thad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dag yongasu bzung ba de dag gis ni 'dul ba'i sems/ 
159a3(mdo sde): can bsam pa dag pa gdul sla ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yongasu bzung bas na/ de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen
159a4(mdo sde): po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no// de dag ni snying rje chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med bdag yongasu bzung zhi dra/ de ltar sems can tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
159a5(mdo sde): tshim par byas kyang nga'i sems skad cig gcig tsam ya/ nga 'gyod par ma gyur pa la ltos/ de rangs smon lam 'di lta bu yang btab ste/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang
159a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta na bdag gi bsam pa 'di yang yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ ji ltar bdag gis gling gcig tu rang gi lus
159a7(mdo sde): kyis sems can thams cad tshim par byas pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul med lhun po spos 'di'i gling thams cad du yang la stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du de lta bu'i lus 'byung bar gyur cig/ 
159a8(mdo sde): gling gcig tu lo khri'i bar du ji lta ba de bzhin du gling thams cad du yang rang gi sha dang khrag dang bags pa dang / mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang mchu dang lce dang skra dag gis sems can thams cad tshim
159b1(mdo sde): bar byas shing / theg pa gsum po dag yang dag par 'dzin du bcug par gyur cig/ mi rnams dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas thams cad dang / gang dag sha gning / 
159b2(mdo sde): khrag 'thung ba so so'i gnod sbyin rnams dang / tha na gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi bar de dag kyang bdag gis tshim par byed par gyur cig/ ji ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu rang gi lus
159b3(mdo sde): kyis sems can thams cad tshim par byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang rang gi sha dang khrag dang pags pa dang / mig / 
159b4(mdo sde): lde'i bar dag dang / de lta bu'i lus kyis bskal pa chen dpo gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang dang ngag de lta bu'i lus thob nas/ rang gi lus dang srog gis
159b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams tshim par byed par gyur cig/ gal te/ bdag sems can rnams tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi lus de lta bu dag yongasu gtong bar mi byed dam/ ji ltar
159b6(mdo sde): bdag re zhing sems pa'i bdag gi smon lam de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur na/ gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs te
159b7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
159b8(mdo sde): bar ma gyur cig/ bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra zos par ma gyur cig/ chos kyi sgra yang mi thos/ dge 'dun gyi sgra yang mi thos pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yang
160a1(mdo sde): ma thos/ bdud kyi dpung pham pa'i sgra yang mi thos/ mi 'jigs pa'i sgra yang mi thos pa nas/ 'khor ba na dge ba'i sgra'i bar yang thos par mi 'gyur/ 
160a2(mdo sde): zhing rtag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po na gnas par gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu yang btab bo// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling thams cad kyi gling re rer yang de lta
160a3(mdo sde): bu'i lus ngag yongasu btang zhing / rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byas pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i gzhan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed dag tu yang de lta bu'i
160a4(mdo sde): lus ngag yongasu btang ste/ rang gi sha dang khrag gis sem sa can rnams tshim par byas so// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe dngas rgyun ma chad par mig dag yongasu btang ba gang yin pa de dag gi
160a5(mdo sde): phung po yang 'dzam+bu gling 'di nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i mthar thugs pa'i tshad tsam du gyur te/ de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i lus yongasu gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ltos/ 
160a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus yongasu gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bsdus pa yino// sems la byung ba dag la 'jug pa ma yino// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// 
160a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu tshol ba ma yin te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa de dag yongasu 'dzin pa'i byang
160a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag gis ni snying brtse ba spangs pa yin no// gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag yongasu spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag
160b1(mdo sde): ni ye shes dang / bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin// gang dag ji ltar bdag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas spangs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa/ bud med rnam par
160b2(mdo sde): spangs pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
160b3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongasu spangs pa/ theg pa/ 
160b4(mdo sde): chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos ston par gyur cig/ bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang tshe ring por gyur te/ yun ring du gnas shing bskal pa mang por bsam pa dag pa dang / 
160b5(mdo sde): gdul sla ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces smon lam de lta/ bu 'debs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ des na ye shwe
160b6(mdo sde): dang bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa yang ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya'o// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste/ 
160b7(mdo sde): sor mo lnga las 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dag rab tu bkye'o// 'od gzer de dag tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i phyogasu dong ste/ 
160b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams snang bar byas nas/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha bo can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can de na mi rnams ni/ tshe lo bcu pa/ mdog ngan
161a1(mdo sde): pa/ mi sdug pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste/ khrun ni mthe bo'i tshad tsam mo// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
161a2(mdo sde): skam la dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i khrun yang rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams kyi khru gang dang / mtho bo tsam gyi rnams kyi khru gsum dang / sor bdun gyi tshang
161a3(mdo sde): tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos ston to// rigs kyi bu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ 
161a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong nas / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasra pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ 
161a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med pa 'das pa na/ de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan
161a6(mdo sde): sngar dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing
161a7(mdo sde): brdung de rab tu bkod do// sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar/ bsam gtan ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab ste/ 
161a8(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu dag pa dag yongasasu bzung ngo // kha cig gis na yongasu mdag bsdigs me lnga dang ldan pa dag yongs su bzung ngo // de nas sems can tshan
161b1(mdo sde): bodes nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing bzhag ste/ rab tu gnas par byas nas/ de rangs de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags
161b2(mdo sde): par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab bo// 
161b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa des kyang ngal lag so zhes bya ba byin nas/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de na gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i dge ba'i bshes
161b4(mdo sde): gnyen skyes bu dam pa des/ snyigs ma lnga shin tu bdo zhing nyon mo dngas pa dang / rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shin tunyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu bzung zhing 'dul ba'i
161b5(mdo sde): sems can mtshams med pabyed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nyams nga bar zhugs pa dag/ smon lam
161b6(mdo sde): gyis yongasu bzung nas/ skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
161b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang leg so zhes po nya btang ste/ snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar ming btags so// nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen phan pa mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
161b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de/ da ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe bo'i tshad tsam du mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon te/ 
162a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des/ mthe bo'i tshad tsam gyi mi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis/ skye dgu tshe lo bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i/ 
162a2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// des dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs
162a3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ pho nya dag btang ngo // des dang po gang dag
162a4(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa'i bar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de/ da rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas
162a5(mdo sde): pa bzo zhing rjes su dgongs pa de dag gis kyang / de bzhin ga gas pa de la me tog dag bskur ro// bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhong
162a6(mdo sde): rab tu dang bdag na/ sems can tshe ring ba bsam pa yongasu dag pa/ bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar
162a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu ngan pa snyigs pa lnga dang ldan pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe
162a8(mdo sde): zung dus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po lhag par mdzad cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos ston pa la ltos/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas
162b1(mdo sde): kyi zhing shin tu ngan cing sdigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongasu 'azung zhing / sman lam khyad par can
162b2(mdo sde): btab pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan to// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas yongasu spangs pa
162b3(mdo sde): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas yongasu spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa rnams yongasu bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
162b4(mdo sde): dag yongasu bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni me tog lta bu zhes bya ste/ gang dag shin tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsku dad pa rnams kyi nang du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par
162b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag ni/ pad+ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ma yin no// bram ze bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ 
162b6(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongasu dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan
162b7(mdo sde): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smon pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/ 
162b8(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog lta bu rnams shes bya'i pad+ma dkar po lta bu yang ma yin la/ sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ bram ze 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub
163a1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khar 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu ma dag pa yongasu bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sa/ 
163a2(mdo sde): can nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongasu bzung ba lta bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po ni
163a3(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu ma dag pa smon pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongasu ma dag pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang
163a4(mdo sde): byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang / byang chub thob nas che ha cang yang mi thung ba zhig par mar sgrub par smon pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag/ 
163a5(mdo sde): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma dkar po
163a6(mdo sde): rnams shes bya'i/ me tog lta bu rnams shes mi bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams shes kyang bya'o// bram ze 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyod ni da
163a7(mdo sde): ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sman sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi nang du/ dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snying rje pad+ma dkar po lta bur
163a8(mdo sde): skyes pa yin no// gang gi tshe khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongasu bzung zhing snyim
163b1(mdo sde): ma lnga 'do ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag kyang skyes bu dam pa khyad legs zhes bya ba
163b2(mdo sde): byin te/ pho nya dag kyang btang nas/ khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btag so// 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyod la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// 
163b3(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig 'das nas/ lhag ma bskal pa grangs med pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ 
163b4(mdo sde): bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad deraskye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub cing / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jig rten ldongs pa
163b5(mdo sde): 'dren pa med pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing / sems can lam ngan pas bcom pa/ nyam nga ba chen ba thob pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur
163b6(mdo sde): pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nas ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bus gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa nas
163b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te/ 'gro ba'i 'khor lo ni bzlog/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni bskor dbang bsgyur ba'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud ni bcil te/ phyogs/ 
163b8(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu sgras khyab par byas nas/ khyod kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang
164a1(mdo sde): lhan cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur// 
164a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe na ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dbag med ces bya bar 'gyur zhing bskal ba tshad med ba dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du// snying rje chenas
164a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa khyod kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya nyi shu thub ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkra thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ yongan
164a4(mdo sde): bcu rtsa lngas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa'i yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos lo stong
164a5(mdo sde): lhag par gnas par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang / lus skyes pa'i sku gdung rnam sa kyang rang gis smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdza
164a6(mdo sde): pa mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te/ sngar ji skad smos pa de bzhin du yun ring por sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe na gnas 'gro zhes bya ba na/ bram ze zhig
164a7(mdo sde): yod pa des 'di skad ces smras// skyes bu dam pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag kyang brtag tu bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing / byams pa dang 'thun
164a8(mdo sde): pa'i yo byad sbyor ba dang / 'grogs par byed par gyur nas/ khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ khyad srid pa tham par gyur na/ bdag khyod kyi phar gyur cig/ skyes bu dam pa bdag khyod
164b1(mdo sde): kyis byang chub thob pa'i sprin bdag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing / khyod kyi bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ gzhan yang de na rgya mtsho'i lha mo shin tu dul ba'i blo zhes
164b2(mdo sde): bya ba des kyang smras pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag ces bya ba nas/ khyod kyis srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ bdag khyod skyes pa'i mar gyur cig/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis
164b3(mdo sde): byang chub thob na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig/ rgyu skar gyi lha mo chu lha spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ de dang de dag ces bya ba nas khyod srid pa
164b4(mdo sde): tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa na/ bdag khyod snun pa'i ma ma bye dad pa'i mar gyur cig/ khyod kyi byang chub thob nas bde dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston
164b5(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ brgya byin mu khyud can zhes bya ba dang / gzha na yang brgya byin pha rol sems shes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/ kye snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dag
164b6(mdo sde): ces bya ba nas/ khyod kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ bdag cag shes rab dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa nyan thos zung du gyur cig/ gzhan yang brgya byin spyad spod lta mdzes tshogs// 
164b7(mdo sde): shes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang khyod de dang de dag ces bya ba nas/ srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pa'i bur gyur ci// gzhan yang ri'i rtse'i lha mo des pa king shu ka zhes bya ba
164b8(mdo sde): des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag kyang tshe rabs de dang de dag tu khyod kyi btsun mor gyur cig/ khyod kyis byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
165a1(mdo sde): tu lung bston par gyur cig/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mdzes spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub rtsa
165a2(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la byams pa dang 'thun pa'i yo byad kyis grogs byed pa'i bran nyid du gyur te/ khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ khyod srid pa rnam par gyur pa
165a3(mdo sde): la yang bdag bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis byang chub can kyang chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par gyur cig/ khyod kyis chos bstan pa
165a4(mdo sde): bdag gis dang por 'bras bu dang bcas par byed par gyur cig/ chos kyi bcud kyang 'thub bar gyur cig/ 'chi ba med pa yang rtogs par gyur cig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i
165a5(mdo sde): phyir/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar yang thob par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de na lha dang klu dang / lha ma yin/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i
165a6(mdo sde): spong ba'i rjesu 'jug pa'i phyir smon lam btab ste/ 'dul ba dag kyang nye bar bkod do// de nas 'tsho ba ba mi 'gyur 'jigs byed ces bya ba gcig cig 'dug pa des smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po bdag
165a7(mdo sde): kyang khyod la yo byad mang po dag gis grogs byed par gyur cig/ bdag bskal pa dpag tu med pa dag tu khyod la 'bras bu dang bcas par spyod cing nye bar 'tsho ba'i nye dur gyur cig/ rtag tu dngos pa
165a8(mdo sde): bslang ba'i don du khyod kyi drung du nye bar 'gro bar gyur cig/ mal cha dang / stan dang / bgo ba dang / glang po che dang rta dang shing rta dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khyim dang bu dang / 
165b1(mdo sde): bram dang / ga dang khrag dang bags pa dang / rus pa dang / lag pa dang rkang ba dang / lde dang / rna ba dang sna dang mag dang / man dag slong bar gyur cig/ bram pa chen po bdag de ltar khyad kyi sbyin pa'ang
165b2(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa'i grogasu gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi grog su yang gyur cig/ bram ze chen po bdag de ltar khyod byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grog su gyur cig/ 
165b3(mdo sde): nam khyod kyis byang chub thob pa na/ bdag kyang khyod kyi nyan thos kyi gnas thob par gyur cig/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'dzin par gyur cig/ rje su chos ston par gyur cig/ khyod kyis
165b4(mdo sde): bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ste/ ngan par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu dram ze snying rje chen po dadang ldan pas de thos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
165b5(mdo sde): snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas/ 'tsho kha pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed bos te smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nga'i bla na med pa'i spyod pa'i grog su 'gyur ba ni
165b6(mdo sde): legaso leg so// khyod tshe rabs khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa'i bar du nga la dngos po slong ba'i phyir nam 'ongs pa'i de'i tshe/ ngas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sbyin par bya ste/ khyod la yang
165b7(mdo sde): bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar gsol/ 
165b8(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod
166a1(mdo sde): pa'i che/ gal te bdag gi mdun du spangs ma pa gang dag mchis nas/ zas spong bar bgyid cing / tshig 'jam po 'am/ tshig rtsub po'am/ 'as
166a2(mdo sde): pa'i tshig gam/ tshig gsal bas slong bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems
166a3(mdo sde): bskyed par gyur tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas/ sbyin pa stsol bar gyur na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na bcum
166a4(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bad dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
166a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sem sa ma dang bas sbyin pa stsol tam/ sbyin pa de yang len pa po la dang / 
166a6(mdo sde): bas/ sbyin par 'gyur zhing chung za bar 'gyur ram/ gal te tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam zhig dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na/ bdag gos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
166a7(mdo sde): rnams bslus par gyur cig/ gal te skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig len pa po'i dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyur na/ bdag kyang mnar med par mchi bar gyur cig/ zas la
166a8(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du slongs mo pa gang dag bdag la gos dang / mgo'i bar dag slong bar 'gyur zhing / tshig 'jam po 'am/ tshig rtsub po 'am/ brnyas tshig gam/ tshig gsal bas mgo'i bar
166b1(mdo sde): dag slong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis spongs mo pa la sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam zhig khro ba'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ ma dang pa'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ 
166b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas mgo bo'i bar dag yongasu gtong bar gyur na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur pa nas/ bdag mnar med par 'chi
166b3(mdo sde): ba'i bar du gyur cig/ smin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims nas/ shes rab kyi bar dag yongasu gtong ba la yang brjod par bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying
166b4(mdo sde): bo des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skye das bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i sems kyis
166b5(mdo sde): smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang dri za dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis
166b6(mdo sde): kyang thal mo sbyar te 'khod nas/ de la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rje chen po la gnas pa'i yid kyis smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa lagaso leg so khyod ni
166b7(mdo sde): snying rje chen por 'gyur ba dang / 'thun pa'i chos drug gi sems can rnams yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ji ltar smin pa len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur/ 
166b8(mdo sde): 'jigs byed des smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam bta'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan/ 
167a1(mdo sde): pa des/ ji ltar 'tsho ba ba mi 'gyur 'jigs byed kyis smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khrab ni slong gis kyang sman lam de lta bu dag btang
167a2(mdo sde): pa thos pa dang / de nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bltas te/ mchog tu dga' ba'i/ 
167a3(mdo sde): yid kyis smras pa/ a la la bdag chos kyi mu ge dang / zad pa'i dus dang / nyon mongs pa chen pos dkrugs shing rtsod pa'i dus na/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten mgon med pa'i ded dpon
167a4(mdo sde): dang / snang ba byed pa dang / sgron ma byed pa dang / byis pa sku bas med pa/ ldongs pa rnams kyi lam ston par 'gyurd ba dang / 'di ltar bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pas/ che
167a5(mdo sde): rabs gzhan dag tu gang dag bdag gi mgo len par 'gyur ba dang / mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / pags pa dang rus pa dang khrag dang / kha zas kyi
167a6(mdo sde): bar dag len par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa'i grogs byed pa de lta bu dag rnyed pa ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang / 
167a7(mdo sde): ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan gyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu ma mchis/ 
167a8(mdo sde): grangs ma mchis pa de dang de dag nas/ byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du bdag gi drung du slongs mo ba gang dag nye bar mchi bar 'gyur zhing yun ring po de srid kyi bar du zas sam/ skom dag blangs
167b1(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang / bdag gi sug pa nas tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam gyi ston pa blangs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 
167b2(mdo sde): gal te 'khor ba las yongasu thar bar mi bgyid dam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa chen pos lung ston par mi bgyid na/ bdag gis gang dag da ltar phyogs
167b3(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
167b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de nga bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/ byang chub sems
167b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la la gso zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rje ltar sngon de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rtse 'dzin gyis de bzhin
167b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od zer gyi spyan sngar dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i smon lam 'di lta bu btab ste/ skyes bu dam pa des smon lam ji ltar/ 
167b7(mdo sde): btab pa de bzhin du bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu lhag pa snyed du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas/ 'di nas shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
167b8(mdo sde): phrag 'bum 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gzer so sor rtog pa zhes bya bar/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
168a1(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dang daphyug/ 
168a2(mdo sde): yang dag mtho zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur cing / lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
168a3(mdo sde): dbyingasu zhugs so// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul
168a4(mdo sde): ni lo stong du gnas par gyur to// dam pa'i chos nub nas dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang lo stong dug nas par gyur to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin
168a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyu/ ga yang dag mtho yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'id ma pa'i chos kyi tshul dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs ba/ 
168a6(mdo sde): gnas pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma gang dag tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa mi mthun par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi nor 'phrog pa dang / ngo tsha med pa
168a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / chos kyi mchod pa gcod par byed pa/ ngo tsha med pa dang 'dres pa rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi gos dang / zas dang mal
168a8(mdo sde): dang stan dang / nad kyi gsol sman dang / yo byad gcod cing gang zag gir yongasu bzung ste/ bdag spyang par byed pa'am/ khyim pa la sbyin par byed pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa
168b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho nges theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis lung bstan to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang su dag bcom ldan
168b2(mdo sde): 'das de'i bstan pa la ngur smrig dmar po dgos pa thams cad kyang / theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par lung bstan to// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
168b3(mdo sde): bsnyen ma gang su dag snga ma kho na bzhin du ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang ston par 'du shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa yod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des theg pa gsum po dag gis
168b4(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa de bzhin du/ skyes bu dam pa da khyod kyis kyang / byang chub kyi spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa leg so leg so// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
168b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar gas la pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni 'di
168b6(mdo sde): lta bu lags te/ ji srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spad pa spyod pa nas/ byang chub kyi mthar thugs pa'i spad pa spod pa'i bar du/ bdag gis sems can gang dag sbyin pa'i
168b7(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du stsol bar 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'god par 'gyur ba'am/ tha na dge ba'i rtsa ba sgra'i
168b8(mdo sde): rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam la sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag las/ sems can 'ga' tsam zhig bdag gis theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod par ma gyur na/ 
169a1(mdo sde): bdag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
169a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bla na
169a3(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes thob nas kyang / sems can gang dag bdag gis bstan pa la chos gos ngur smrig bgos par gyur pa las/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung bar gyur pa 'am nyon mongs pa can gyi lta ba la zhugs
169a4(mdo sde): par gyur pa 'am/ dkon mchog gsum la 'khrul par gyu/ dar cing / nongs pa dang bcas par gyur pa'i dge slong dang da/ dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma gang dag skad
169a5(mdo sde): cig gcig tsam bdag la ston pa'i 'du shes sam/ gus pa'i sems bskyed par gyur pa'i sems can de dag las btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis tha na sems
169a6(mdo sde): can 'ga' tsam zhig spangs shing / theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par ma gyur na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par 'gyur ba nas
169a7(mdo sde): bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar du gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob pa'i chos gos ngur
169a8(mdo sde): smig dmar po lha dang mi rnams kyis gus par bgyid pa dang / bla mar bgyis pa dang / ri mor bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ba mthong ma thag tu ngur smrig mgul na thogs par
169b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum po dag gis phyir mi ldog par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang bral zhing bkres pa dang / skom pas gnod par gyur pa
169b2(mdo sde): rnams dang / tha na gnod sbyin dbul po rnams sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gang dag tha na chos gos ngur smrig sor bzhi tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bza' ba
169b3(mdo sde): dang btung ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing / bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ lha 'am gnod sbyin nam srin po 'am klu 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ namakha lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto phye/ 
169b4(mdo sde): chen po 'am/ grul bum 'am/ sha ba 'am mi 'am/ sem das can gang dag phan tshun zhes 'gras shing khon btsugs mang por gyur pa rnams dang / phan tshun 'gyed cing g.yul ngor
169b5(mdo sde): zhugs te g.yul sprod par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang / bdag gi chos gos ngur smrig rjesu dran par gyur na/ sems/ can de dag snying rje'i sems dang / 'jam pa'i sems dang / 
169b6(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang la su rung ba'i semasu gyur cig/ sems can gang dag g.yul ngo 'am/ 'gyed pa 'am/ 'thab pa'am/ rtsod pa'i nang du bsrung ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba dang / gus par
169b7(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du ngur smrig gi dum bu 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khrul pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba ma mchis par gyur cig/ 
169b8(mdo sde): g.yul ngo dang 'gyed pa dang / zab mo dang / rtsod pa de dag las kyang legs par yongasu thar par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi chos gos ngur smrig dmar po 'phags pa'i
170a1(mdo sde): yon tan lnga po de dag dang ldan par ma gyur na/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams smras par 'gyur ba nas/ bdag gis sangs
170a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs par bgyid par rngo mi thog pa dang / bdag gis chos rnams bskrad par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par rngo mi thogs pa'i
170a3(mdo sde): bar du gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes/ 
170a4(mdo sde): tshig tu brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad da kyang las kyi sgrib pa bas par 'gyur zhing mthar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba bla na med pas yongasu mya
170a5(mdo sde): ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba lag so// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po des phyag g.yas/ pa brkyang ste/ phyag gi mthil gyis byang chub sems dpa' stong
170a6(mdo sde): rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi smon lam ni dge ba/ bzang ba/ rab tu gtan la bab pa yin te/ legaso legaso// skyes bu dam pa khyod ni de
170a7(mdo sde): bzhin du 'phags pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i ngur smrig dmar pos sems can rnams nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro// kye rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
170a8(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams kyi phyag sor ring pos yongs su bkab cing / phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i mthil gyis byugs pa dang / lung bstan cing legs/ 
170b1(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba byin pa des mchog tu dang ba skyes nas/ tshe lo nyi shu lon pa lta bu'i tshad tsam du gzho nur red do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang dri za dang / mi
170b2(mdo sde): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur cing / me tog dang rol mo'i sgra dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang
170b3(mdo sde): ldan pa la mchod pa byas te/ bsngags pa dang / tshig su bcad pa sna tshogs kyis bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'khod do// theg pa chen po'i mdo snying rje pad+ma dkar po las lung bstan pa'i
170b4(mdo sde): le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi pa'o// / bam po bcug sum pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying
170b5(mdo sde): rje chen po dang ldan pa des yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po nA 'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug
170b6(mdo sde): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la gus pa dang bcas pas yongasu zhus pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam
170b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ting
170b8(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag
171a1(mdo sde): pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'ag rigs kyi bu mo tshogs ji lta bu dang ldan na brtan pa
171a2(mdo sde): gnas pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa ji lta bus ni brgyan pa lags/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos
171a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyi zhu ba bzang / spobs pa dge ste/ snying rje chen po dang
171a4(mdo sde): ldan pa khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams la phan pa byed
171a5(mdo sde): pa dang / gces spras byed pa rgya chen po skyes pa yin te/ legs so legaso// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad
171a6(mdo sde): par bya'o// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa ni// / 
171a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rje su zhugs pa yin no// rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ des ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgyas 'debs par byed do// seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes
171a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ de la gnas nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse bar byed do// zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar
171b1(mdo sde): byed do// zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting yid kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin
171b2(mdo sde): thams cad khong du chud par byed do// phyag rgya rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par lta bar byed do// chos kyi dbyings rnam par song ba'i ting 'dzin
171b3(mdo sde): gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par nges par 'gro bar byed do// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan
171b4(mdo sde): 'dzin par byed do// rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ti 'dzin thams cad mi phyed par byed// chos la 'jug pa'i phyi ga rgya'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la phyag rgyas
171b5(mdo sde): 'debs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyal po shin tu brta/ na pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams// cad la rgyal po nyid du rab tu gnas par byed do// 'od gzer
171b6(mdo sde): 'gyed pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la 'od gzer 'gyed par byed do// stobs kyi brtson 'grus kyi ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la stobs dang
171b7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus byed do// yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad las gyen du 'phags par byed do// nges pa'i tshig ston pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni
171b8(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig la 'jug pa la 'jug par byed do// tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni ting 'dzin thams cad kyi ming gi rje su 'jug par byed do// 
172a1(mdo sde): phyogs la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la rnam par lta bar byed// chos thams cad rab tu 'byeng ba'i ting 'dzin
172a2(mdo sde): gyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba rje su rtogs par byed// phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dzin par byed do// chos
172a3(mdo sde): thams cad la dben pa'i tingange 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin las dben pa'i chos nyid la rjesu 'jug par byed do// brjed pa med pa'i tinge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi brjed par
172a4(mdo sde): byed do// chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba'i ting 'dzin gyi das ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la mi g.yo ba nyid/ du gnas par byed do// chos thams cad yang dag par
172a5(mdo sde): 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gyis ni ting 'dzi na thams cad sdud cing yang dag par 'du bar byed// chos thams cad la rlom sems med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis
172a6(mdo sde): ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i rlom sems med par byed do// nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la na mkha' ltar khyab par
172a7(mdo sde): byed do// chos thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par byed do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams
172a8(mdo sde): cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad kyi bcud 'dzin par byed do// rin chen rgyal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis
172b1(mdo sde): ni/ yo byad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par ston par byed// 
172b2(mdo sde): rnam par snang ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad lham me/ lhan ne lhang nger byed do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam
172b3(mdo sde): par 'byed par byed do// tshol ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad tingange 'dzin gyi chos rnams nam yang tshol bar mi byed do// gnas la rten pa med pa'i ting 'dzin
172b4(mdo sde): gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la gnas pa'i chos nam ya/ dang yang dag par rje su mthong bar byed do// nam mkha'/ lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad na mkha
172b5(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid lta bur snying po med pa nyi du yang dag par rje su mthong bar byed do// sems med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos
172b6(mdo sde): rnams spong bar byed do// gzugs mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni gzugs kun tu snang bar byed do// dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la sgron ma
172b7(mdo sde): bzhin du byed do// chos thams cad mu med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la ye shes mu med par ston par byed do// glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin
172b8(mdo sde): thams cad la shes pa mu med pa ston par byed do// 'od thams cad byed pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la 'od byed pa'i sgo nye bar ston par byed do// khams kyi
173a1(mdo sde): mtha'i ting 'dzin gyis naM/ ting 'dzin mtha' med pa thams cad rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir nye bar ston par byed// ting 'dzin dag pa dam
173a2(mdo sde): pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin gyi chos rnams la stong pa nyid rjesu thob par byed do// lhun po ltar bkra ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad gsog nyid du kun tu ston par byed do// 'od
173a3(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel bar byed do// chos thams cad kyi brda'i ting 'dzin gyis ni ting 'dzin thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid yang dag par ston par
173a4(mdo sde): byed do// dga' ba byed pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni da ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dga' ba rab tu thob par bya // chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam par rtse ba'i ting
173a5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la da ba nyid mi dmig sa bston par byed// glog 'gyur ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi zad pa nyid ston par byed
173a6(mdo sde): do// chos thams cad la rnam par g.yeng ba med cing rdul dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad kyi shes pa rdul dang bral ba nye bar ston par byed// mi zad pa dang ldan
173a7(mdo sde): pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni ting 'dzin thams cad zad pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa ma yin pa yang dag par ston par byed do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing rnam par dag par
173a8(mdo sde): ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad mig yor lta bur ston par byed// gzi brjid yod pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ye shes 'bar bar byed do// zad
173b1(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad pa med pa dang / nyams pa med par ston par byed do// mi g.yo ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la g.yo bar mi byed/ 
173b2(mdo sde): 'gul bar mi byed 'phro bar mi byed do// rnam par 'phel ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la shes bya rnam par 'phel bar yang dag par rje su mthong ba/ 
173b3(mdo sde): byed do// nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la 'od gzer gyi sgo dag 'gyed par bye// zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la snang bar byed
173b4(mdo sde): snang bdag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la dasas yang dag par rig pa bani rab tu thob par byed // bya ba dang mi bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ bya ba dang ma bya ba'i byab
173b5(mdo sde): byed cing ye shes tog kyang yang dag par rje su mthong bar byeng// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cadanges par 'byed par byed cing/ gang la 'byed pa yang yang dag par
173b6(mdo sde): rjes su mi mthong bar byed do// sems gnas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ sems g.yo bar mi byed/ 'gul bar mi byed/ snang bar mi byed cing gnang par 'gyur ba yang med la/ de 'dasaman
173b7(mdo sde): 'di ni sems yin no// snyam du yang mi sems par byed// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la snang ba yang dag par rje su mthong bar byed do// rab tu gnas pa'i
173b8(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas pa nyid kyis rab tu gnas par byed// rin chen brtsegs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni ting 'dzin thams cad la rin po che bcen
174a1(mdo sde): pa lta bur kun tu snang bar byed do// chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la phyag rgya 'debs par byed cing / chos
174a2(mdo sde): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ mnyam pa nyid la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong bar byed do// dga' ba spong ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la dga'
174a3(mdo sde): baspong bar byed do// chos kyi sgron ma'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la yi ge mi mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed// yi ge dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la yi ge
174a4(mdo sde): gcig kyang mi dmigs par byed do// dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la dmi dgas pa rnam par gcod par byed do// 'gyur ba med pa'i
174a5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la 'gyur ba mi dmi/ gas par byed do// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la phan 'dogs pa mi dmigs
174a6(mdo sde): par byed do// gnas med par rgyu ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la gnas mi dmigs par byed// rab rib dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod
174a7(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rjesu mi mthong zhing / mun pa'i yul las yang dag par 'da' bar byed// yon tan thams cad kyi tshog su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la
174a8(mdo sde): bsags pa spong bar byed do// sems med par gnas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la sems shes bya ba mi dmigs par byed// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting
174b1(mdo sde): 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad rtogs par byed do// dran pa rnam par 'phro ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la spobs pa grangs med pa thob par byed// de byed pa'i shes pa
174b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed// ye shes tog gi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ khams gsum thams cad las
174b3(mdo sde): yang dag par 'da' bar byed// shes pa nyes par gcod pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad rnam par gcod pa yang dag par rje su mthong bar byed do// ye shes rnam par 'phro ba'i ting
174b4(mdo sde): 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phro ba nyid darje su thob par byed do// gnas med pa'i ting 'dzin dgyis ni/ chos thams cad gnas gyur pa med pa nyid yang
174b5(mdo sde): dag par rje su mthong bar byed do// bkod pa gcig pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos 'ga' yang gnyis su yang dag par rjesu mi mthong bar byed// 
174b6(mdo sde): rnam par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi rnam par bsgrub pa yang dag par rje su mthong bar byed do// srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rnam par sel ba thams cad du/ 
174b7(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la nges par 'byed pa'i ye shes 'jug cing / gang la 'jug pa 'ga' yang mi rnyed par byed// brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa'i
174b8(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyis ni sgra dang brda thams cad kyis rje su 'jug par byed do// sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad yi ge dang bral bar yang dag par
175a1(mdo sde): rjesu mthong bar byed do// ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis na ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzi brjid kyis pa/ 
175a2(mdo sde): me lhan ne lhang nger byed do// ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la yongasu dag pa'i mtshan nyid ston par byed do// mngon
175a3(mdo sde): par shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la mngon par rig pa med pa yang dag par rje su mthong bar byed do// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
175a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos dang ting 'dzinathams cad la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang lnga na par byed do// sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu spong
175a5(mdo sde): ba'i tingange 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la gnas pa med pa yang dag par rjesu mthong bar byed do// khyed rgyu mi zad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad
175a6(mdo sde): la zad pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong bar byed do// gzungs kyi gzhi'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad 'dzin cing yang dag pa nyid dang / log pa nyid
175a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rje su mi mthong bar byed do// 'gag pa dang 'gal ba rab tu zhi ba'i tingange 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad dang 'thun pa dang 'gal bar yang dag par rje su mi mthong bar byed// 
175a8(mdo sde): 'od dri ma med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni ting 'dzin thams cad la 'dus byas kyi dri ma dang bral ba yang dag par rjesu mi mthong bar bye // snying po dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad
175b1(mdo sde): la snying po med pa mi dmigs par bye// zla ba nya ba dri ma med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la yon tan yongasu rdzogs par byed do// bkod pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting
175b2(mdo sde): 'dzin thams cad la bkod pa chen po dang ldan par byed// snang ba thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed do// ting 'dzin mnyam pa nyid
175b3(mdo sde): rnam par snang bar byed pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la rtse gcig pa nyid rab tu thob par byeda'o// nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par
175b4(mdo sde): 'du ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ ting 'dzin thams cad la nyon dmongs pa med par byed do// rlung gi gnas kyi ting 'dzi dan gyis ni/ chos thams cad la gnas mi byeda'o// de bzhin nyidas
175b5(mdo sde): gnas shing sems med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las mi ldog par byeng // lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting 'dzin gyis ni/ chos thams
175b6(mdo sde): cad la 'jig tshogs mi dmigs par byed do// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jigs pas na mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la ngag gi las mi dmigs par
175b7(mdo sde): byed do// na mkha' ltar chags pa med la rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos thams cad la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa nyid rje su
175b8(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur te/ de ni thegs pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
176a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo sdud pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sems can thams cad/ 
176a2(mdo sde): yongasu smin par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i tshogs
176a3(mdo sde): ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs ni/ dgos pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems
176a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs ni/ cang shes kyi sems su byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshogs ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad yongasu shes
176a5(mdo sde): bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos/ pa'i tshogs ni spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs ni sems
176a6(mdo sde): can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs ni shes thogs pa med par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni sems
176a7(mdo sde): lasu rung bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lcags mthong gi tshogs ni the tsom dang bral bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs ni zhe 'gras
176a8(mdo sde): pa'i sems med par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs ni/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la skyo ba med par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
176b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs ni chos kun dga' la dga' zhing dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi tshogs ni rje su chags pa dang / kho khro ba spong bar/ 
176b2(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos mnyan pa'i tshogs ni sgrib pa spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'i tshogs ni yongasu
176b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa thams cad spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa'i tshogs ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las byas pa chud mi za bar byed par 'gyuraro// 
176b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnam das kyi blo gros kyi tshogs ni blo rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// byang
176b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i tshogs ni/ don gyi rnam pa rjesu rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// bya chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshogs
176b6(mdo sde): ni/ lus dang tshor ba dang / sems dang chos rjes su rtog bye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spong ba'i tshogs ni/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / 
176b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thams cad sgom par byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs ni/ lus dang sems yang ba nyid du byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub
176b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyis dbang po'i tshogs ni/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongasu rdzogs par byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshogs ni/ nyon mo/ 
177a1(mdo sde): thathams cad 'jams par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag ga tshogs na chos kyi ngo ba nyid rje su rtogs par byed/ 
177a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi tshogs ni/ lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byeng bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i chos
177a3(mdo sde): ni/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong zhing mtho su skye bzo par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis so yang dag par rig pa'i tshogs ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bcom
177a4(mdo sde): gcod par byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ston pa'i tshogs ni/ shes pa gzhan la rag ma las par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
177a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshogs ni/ yon tan tham sa cad kyi sgra yin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sem sadapa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshogs ni/ 'dzag can
177a6(mdo sde): thams cad la mi slu bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs ni/ tshogs thams cad mthar phyin par byed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag
177a7(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa'i tshogs ni/ khyad par du 'gro bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i tshogs ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos sgrub par byed par 'gyur/ 
177a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsdu ba'i dngos po'i tshogs ni/ sems can thams cad yongasu smin par byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yong su 'dzin
177b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs ni dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni
177b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yong su rdzogs par byed par
177b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo yang dag par sdud pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yino// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin
177b4(mdo sde): po che'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po lta rnam par gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' se dmas dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa bos te bka'
177b5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen chen po mi 'jigs pa'i rgyan ji lta bus brgyan na/ bzod pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur
177b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ don dam pa mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'bad pa don yod pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems dang / khams gsum pa thams cad dang / sems can thams
177b7(mdo sde): cad la yongasu 'dzin pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni/ dge sbyong gi chos mi 'jigs pa chen po zhes bya ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang gi sems chos thams cad la na mkha'
177b8(mdo sde): dang lag par mnyam pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa'i rgyan yin no// ji ltar na bzod pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa dang / bdag
178a1(mdo sde): med pa dang / snying dza dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / yang byung ba dang / btang snyoms dang / gang zag med bca
178a2(mdo sde): dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba'i sems nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / zhi ba'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa dang / bzod pa'i sems nyid dang / brtson 'grus dang / dben pa'i sems
178a3(mdo sde): nyid dang / bsam gtan dang / nges par sems pa'i sems nyid dang / shes rab dang / rgya che ba'i sems nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / dran pa med pa dang / yid la byed pa
178a4(mdo sde): med pa'i sems dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / skye ba med ba dang / 'gag pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i sems
178a5(mdo sde): nyid dang / dad pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / dran pa dang / rang 'byung gi sems nyid dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug par byed pa'i sems
178a6(mdo sde): nyid dang shes rab kyi dbang po dang / dadang po med/ ba'i sems nyid dang / stobs dang / mi rdzi ba'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bla rab tu 'byeng ba'i sem
178a7(mdo sde): nyid dang las pa'i sems nyid dang shi ba'i sems nyid dang / lhag mthong dang / rmongs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa dang / shin tu yongasu shes
178a8(mdo sde): pa'i sgom pa'i sems nyid dang / sangs rgyas yod la byed pa dang / mun pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / chos yid la byed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang
178b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun yid la byed pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / sems can yongasasu smin par bya ba dang / gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i sems nyid dang / dam pa'i chos yongasasu 'dzin
178b2(mdo sde): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyebyar med pa'i sems nyid dang / zhing yong su dag par byed pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid dang / mtshan yongasasu rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtshan
178b3(mdo sde): med pa'i sems nyid dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i sems nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa dang / 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i sems nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan
178b4(mdo sde): dang / khams gsum gyi snying po len pa'i sems nyid dang sems can thams cad la bdud tshar gcad pa'i sam des dang / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i
178b5(mdo sde): sems nyid dang / byang chub dang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i sems nyid dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / chos thams cad skor ba med pa'i sems
178b6(mdo sde): nyid dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa dang / 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyis sems nyid kyi chos de la gang rje su rtogs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rab tu rtogs par bya ba phra rab
178b7(mdo sde): tsam yang mi dmigs shing / rnam par smin pa med pa'i chos la mos par byed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ gang dag phyogs bcu nas sngon gyi tshul gyi ting 'dzin gyi sgo
178b8(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la lhags pa'i byang chu sems dpa'
179a1(mdo sde): sa ya phrag drug dang / bzhi 'bum po de dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ 
179a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
179a3(mdo sde): po gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra
179a4(mdo sde): rab snyed kyis ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung dgi bye ma snyed kyis ni/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa dang / tshogs
179a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag yo ngasu rdzogs shing / rnam par dag pa'i ye shes khong du chud par gyur to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
179a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de yang mchog tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba des gzhon lo nyi shu lon pa lta bur red nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'o zhabs ring du 'brang bar
179a7(mdo sde): gyur to// rigs kyi bu rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa de yang bu stong dang / khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri dang gzhan yang srog chags bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ mngon par
179a8(mdo sde): byung zhing rab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims dang thos pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / nges bdag gis mngon par brtson par byas par gyur to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
179b1(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i thad nas/ mthar gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam gyis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong blangs shing kun chub par byas so// rang
179b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam gyi chos kyi phung po dgu khri lung mnos shing blags te/ kun chub pa'i bar du byas so// de bzhin du bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i gtam la yang lus dran pa nye bar gzhag
179b3(mdo sde): pa'i gtam 'bum yang lung mnos shing blags te kun chub par byas so// tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gtam 'bum dang / chos dran pa nye bar
