204b4(mdo sde): 'khod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus de 'di snyam da du sems te gA bdag gis dri za'i bu gtsug phud da lnga pa la gsol ba btab ste/ dri za'i bu gtsug bud lnga pa
204b5(mdo sde): des dbyangs snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du bstod na ni/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bsam ga ta na dang / ting 'dzin dag las bzhengs par 'gyur snyam nas/ 
204b6(mdo sde): de nas brgya byin ko'u shi kas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas pi bang blangs te/ glu dang rol mo'i sgra yid du/ 
204b7(mdo sde): 'ong bas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa lnga brgya bsngags pa brjod do// rigs kyi bu dag gang gi tshe dri za'i bu gtsug pud lnga pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa brtsam pa dang / 
204b8(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub de dbyangs snyan rnam par snang byed tog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting 'dzin nges 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed na gang dag rdzu
205a1(mdo sde): 'phrul che ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang lha ma yin rnams dang / na mkha' lding rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / 
205a2(mdo sde): dri za rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad der 'dus par gyur nas/ gang dag dbyangs la dad pa de dag gis ni dbyangs thos nas rab
205a3(mdo sde): tu dad par gyur to// gang dag bsngags pa dang / snyan pa la dga' ba de dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la shin du dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba
205a4(mdo sde): dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / gus pa skyes te rab tu dang bar gyur to// gang dag gling bu'i sgra la dag/ 'a ba de dag gis ni gling bu'i sgra thos nas rab tu dang bar gyur
205a5(mdo sde): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ sa la'i phug gi sgor gzigs pa/ dang / brgya byin nye bar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das
205a6(mdo sde): la nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gang du mchis par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des bka' stsal pa/ gnod sbyin dag ji snyed lhags pa rnams 'khod cig/ de na
205a7(mdo sde): sa la'i phug der ji ltar gnod sbyin gang ga'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag zhugs te 'khod pa de ltar sa la'i phug de rgya che bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des 'khor de dag la/ 
205a8(mdo sde): 'di ltar chos bstan te ji ltar 'khor de na gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dag 'khod pa de dag gis ni nyan thos pa'i theg pa'i gtam thos shing / de dag las dung phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag dgus rgyun/ 
205b1(mdo sde): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'khor de na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig thos so// de na dri ba'i bu gtsug phung
205b2(mdo sde): lnga pa la sogs pa khrag khrig phrag bco brgyad ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par gyur to// gang dag gis theg pa gsum po dag tu sems ma skyed pa
205b3(mdo sde): de dag las kha cig gis ni der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag las kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems bskyed do// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi thag
205b4(mdo sde): par sems bskyed do// der brgya byin ko'u shi ka de yang 'jigs dpa las yongasu grol zhing tshe lo stong du nur nas/ bla na me dad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la/ 
205b5(mdo sde): gnas par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de na de lta de ltar go skabs yangs pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
205b6(mdo sde): yang 'di ltar rgya che ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ni sus kyang tshad gzung ba'am grang bar mi nus// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sems can yong su smin par/ 
205b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yang rgya che ba yon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtha' ni sus kyang gzung bar ma nus so// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku yang / 
205b8(mdo sde): rgya che ba yin te/ de'i spyigatsug blta ba'am/ sku'i mtha' ni sus kyang tshang gzung bar mi nus so// gal te ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa de dag bam/ 
206a1(mdo sde): cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i khong du zhugs par gyur cing de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar gyur tam/ sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spur/ 
206a2(mdo sde): sgo gcig tu zhugs zhing 'byung bar gyur kyang / de dag gi cher na lha'i mig gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spu'i sgo gcig gi mtha' yang bri ba 'am/ gang bar tshad bzung bar mi nus te/ 
206a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i sku ni de ltar rgya che ba yin// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ phyogs
206a4(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po ji snyed pa dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi da zhing mi mjed bzhin du sems can rnams kyis yongasu gang
206a5(mdo sde): bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du zhugs par gyur kyang de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
206a6(mdo sde): des sngon dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa na/ smon lam de lta bu btab pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma
206a7(mdo sde): snyed dag lta zhog gi/ rigs kyi bu dag gal te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung stong gi bye ma snyed po de ltar rgya che ba dag 'di lta ste dper na/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed
206a8(mdo sde): bzhin du sems can rnams kyis yongasu gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du zhugs par gyur kyang de dag thams cad de na rgyu bar 'gyuraro// 
206b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon dang po sems bskyed pa na bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir smon lam de lta bu btab pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni sangs
206b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni ji skad smos pa'i chos bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags pa
206b3(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag long la/ nub phyogs log su rang rang gis ji ltar mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der deng shig/ nga'i tshig/ 
206b4(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs bde 'am zhes kyang snyun gsol cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po des me tog zla
206b5(mdo sde): ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs te/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' gsang bsgrags dang / byang chub sems dpa' snang / ba'i 'od gzer la byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
206b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du deng shig/ de na srog chags nyi khris kyang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de
206b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchis lag so// de bzhin
206b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa ji med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du deng shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon tan rgyal po
207a1(mdo sde): de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang bsgrags dang / snang ba'i 'od gzer de gnyis byang chub sems dpa' tshe khro dang lhan cig/ 'grogs te/ 
207a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun du rgyas pa de nas 'phags pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril so sor 'khod nas/ 
207a3(mdo sde): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di nas shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas
207a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing sa ya phrag dgu dang / tshig 'bum 'das pa de na/ 2'jig rten gyi khams me tog kun du rgyas pa zhes bgyi ba ma chis te/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med gzi brjid yon
207a5(mdo sde): tan rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa sgrogs shing 'di skad
207a6(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing / byang chub sems
207a7(mdo sde): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ des nga thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing gzhag ste rab tu gnas par byas so// de'i tshig gis ngas/ 
207a8(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa des nga dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzhag pa nas// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni/ 
207b1(mdo sde): chos bani pa de dag gis khyad par du 'phags pa yino// zhes ci skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag skad gsungs te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di
207b2(mdo sde): dag kyang bskur zhing bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs bde 'am zhes kyang snyun gsol lag so// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi
207b3(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa'i gdan yang g.yos shing byang chub sems dpa' gang dag der 'dus par gyur par de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i gdan g.yos pa mthong ste/ yongasu
207b4(mdo sde): zhus pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o// de'i tshe na shar bya// dgas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya byang chub sems
207b5(mdo sde): dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongasu zhu ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang phya ga bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i
207b6(mdo sde): phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad 'dir lhag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
207b7(mdo sde): mtshan dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu bsgrags pa dag/ mthar phyin ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lho phyogs logs kyi yongasu bsgrags pa brtsams te/ rigs kyi bu ngas
207b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba zhig yod/ 
208a1(mdo sde): bde na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de yang
208a2(mdo sde): ngasngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod pa na/ ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas/ ji skad sngar smras pa'i bar
208a3(mdo sde): ngag bzhin no// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzam bu'i 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang phyug rnam sgrogs zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing lhun po rab gnas shes
208a4(mdo sde): bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i dbang phyugs la dadabang po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan dbang po'i bgam zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng
208a5(mdo sde): ge bsgyings pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhi nga nor bu bzhir bkod ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bus rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / 
208a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od 'gyed yang dag bsags shes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsgyings pa yang dag bsags shes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing lha'i zla ba zhes bya ba na/ 
208a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsan+dan gyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar cho ga grags pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri
208a8(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams stobs sa la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rtogs pa shes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i
208b1(mdo sde): sgra dbyangs rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtsod med ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i thigs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zla bsgrag
208b2(mdo sde): shes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par sgrogs zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba zhes bya/ 
208b3(mdo sde): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen khyu mchog ces bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rin chen ngos shes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen ljon shing 'bras bu dpag tu med
208b4(mdo sde): rin po che zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi/ sprin sgra dbyangs dbang phyug zla ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du/ lho phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
208b5(mdo sde): dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gi gdan dag g.yos shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad de bzhi na gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsngags pa dang / snyan pa
208b6(mdo sde): dang grags pa brjod par mdzad pa dang / de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
208b7(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa la yongasu zhu ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags pa'i bar du ji skad/ 
208b8(mdo sde): sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro// yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig 'bum
209a1(mdo sde): phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing blo gros nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ri bo zhes bya ba
209a2(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston par gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de yang nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing / spyad pa spyod pa na/ ngas thams cad kyi dang por bla na
209a3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa nas/ ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhong rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs
209a4(mdo sde): ba 'od gzer mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs mkhyen mdzod ces bya ba dang / ba bla grags pa dang / kun du snying po dang / tshangs pa'i me tog
209a5(mdo sde): dang sku mchog rnam par gnon dang / chos kyi shugs kyi/ sgron ma dang / lhun po phrag med pa sgra dbyangs rnam par/ grags pa'i rgyal po dang tshangs pa'i dbang po dbyangs dang / 
209a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du nub phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa gang dag gi mtshan dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas yongasu bsgrags pa de dag gi gdan dag
209a7(mdo sde): g.yos shing de'i tshe na nub phyogs logs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi pho nya byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag chos mnyan pa'i bar gyi phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa
209a8(mdo sde): dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir lhags shing 'khod pa'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng dang de bzhin du 'og dang / 
209b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du shar lho dang / de bzhin du lho nub dang de bzhin du nub byang dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs rnams yang snga ma bzhin du sbyar te brjod par bya'o// yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
209b2(mdo sde): pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs logasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi
209b3(mdo sde): zhing rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sa la'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te
209b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de yang nga sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur/ dar cing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ngas thams cad kyi dbang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
209b5(mdo sde): byang chub dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar dag yang dag par 'dzin pa nas thams cad kyi dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan
209b6(mdo sde): 'das bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag gi thad du phul nas/ der dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo// gang gi tshe de'i mtshan yongasu bsgrags pa
209b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe/ gang na g.yos pa nas/ kha dog dang dbyibs dang / dad pa dang gzugs dang / sgra skad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dad ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
209b8(mdo sde): thub pa de bzhin du mthong zhing chos kyang thos so zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro// 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' gnyis la gcig ni/ 'khrug med rtse mo zhes bya ba
210a1(mdo sde): dang gcig shos ni sangs rgyas yang dag 'dod ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bus la'i rgyal ba
210a2(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bos te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du deng la/ nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa
210a3(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa la sun mi mnga' 'am/ thug bde 'am/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol cig/ de gnyis kyi gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis thams cad
210a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi sa dang / nam kha' thams cad yang dag par gang bar rjesu mthong ste/ de nas dang na mkha' la sems can 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang
210a5(mdo sde): ma mchis na/ bdag cag gang du gnas par bgyi lags / de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa/ rigs/ kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad na/ go skabs med do zhes
210a6(mdo sde): de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bdag gis go skabs yangs pa yin te/ sngon gyi smon
210a7(mdo sde): lam gyis gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / theg pa gsum gyi chos bstan pa las brtsams te chos ston par mdzad pa dang / bslab pa gsum gyi sdom pa ston par mdzad pa dang / rnam par
210a8(mdo sde): thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag ston par mdzad pa dang / sems can ngan song gsum po dag las 'dren par mdzad pa dang / zhi ba'i lam gsum po dag la rab tu 'god par mdzad pa'i phyir/ 
210b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de'i thugs rje dang / bstan pa la 'jug pa ni yangs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma
210b2(mdo sde): lon pa'i dus shig na/ 'dul ba'i sems can la gzigs shing / ri brag mi mnyam pa'i dbus na gnod sbyin dbang po'i mig ces bya ba'i gnas sa la'i phug na/ rnam par grol ba'i
210b3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / bde ba nyamasu myong zhing skyil mo krungs gcig gis zhag bdun las 'da' bar mdzad cing bzhugs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sa la'i phug thams cad khyab par gyur/ 
210b4(mdo sde): te/ de na gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab par/ dam gyur pa'i go skabs ni za na sor bzhi tsam gyi gtos kyang med do// zhag bdun po de 'das pa dang / phyogs cu nas
210b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i
210b6(mdo sde): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi ri de gang yin pa de log su mngon du phyogs te 'khod pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni ji skad smos pa'i chos bzhi po de dag
210b7(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dag las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad smos pa bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med
210b8(mdo sde): pa 'di dag long la/ lho nub kyi phyogs log su rang rang gi ji ltar mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der deng shig nga'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la snyun mi mnga'
211a1(mdo sde): 'am/ thugs bde 'am zhes kyang snyun gsol cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdung bral mngon par 'phags pa rnam thos kyi bu sa la'i rgyal po des
211a2(mdo sde): me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug med rtse mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yang dag 'dod la byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal
211a3(mdo sde): to// rigs kyi bu dag nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du dang shig/ de na srog chags nyi khris kyang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
211a4(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du mchi lags so// 
211a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du deng shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' de
211a6(mdo sde): gnyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par rgyal ba de nas 'phags pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir
211a7(mdo sde): phyin te/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la so sor 'khod do// so sor 'khod nas kyang de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de
211a8(mdo sde): gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs logs zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing
211b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs bde 'am/ zhes kyang snyun gsol lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du ji skad sngar smos pa bzhin du sbyar ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa bdud
211b2(mdo sde): kyi gnas rnam par 'joms pa'i gdan yang g.yos te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi gnas rnam par 'joms
211b3(mdo sde): pa'i gdan g.yos pa mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la yongasu zhus pa nas/ ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag bzhin no// de bzhin du de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i
211b4(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rnam par gnon pa chen po'i 'od gzer dang / pad+ma dam pa dang / tsan+dan dang / lhun po'i rgyal po dang / rgya mtsho dang / skar ma'i snying po
211b5(mdo sde): dang / rnam par gnon pa'i ye shes dang / byang shar gyi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med grang sa med pa'i bar dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag
211b6(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yongasu zhu ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag
211b7(mdo sde): thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad 'dir lhags pa dang / de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'dus/ 
211b8(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad kyi sems can re re'i lus kyang dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam du gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad thams cad de lta bu'i sems can dag gis kyang khyab par gyur to// 
212a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sa dang / namakha' thams cad sems can de dag gis khyab par gyur te/ gang du sems can dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i ga
212a2(mdo sde): skabs ni tha na mig sman gyi thur ma gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang med do// sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mthong ba ma gtogs par na mkha' stong
212a3(mdo sde): pa mthong du zad kyi gcig gis gcig ni ma mthong ngo // de dag gi mig lam du ri rab dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / ri rnams kyang snang bar ma gyur to// 'jig rten gyi bar dag
212a4(mdo sde): kyang mi snang / lha'i gzhal med khang rnams kyang mi snang ste/ da/ 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo la thugs pa'i bar dang / de'i steng gi sa gzhi yang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur to// 
212a5(mdo sde): de na bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin mkha' khyab chos sel shin tu spangs pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / des me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag kyang bcom
212a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi sku'i sgo thams cad du zhugs te/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi khongasu chud par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo // sems can de dag gi
212a7(mdo sde): sems dang sems las byung ba dag kyang gzugs la kun du lta ba'i yid la byed pa dang bral zhing / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i sgo 'ba' shig tu nges par rtogs te/ de yang 'di lta ste dper na// 
212a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bskyed mos tshal lta bur rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dang / lo ma sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i skyed
212b1(mdo sde): mos tshal dag mthong ngo // shing ljon pa ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dpung rgan dang / mu tig gi chun po sna tshogs kyis
212b2(mdo sde): brgyan pa de dag mthong ba dang / sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag bskyed mos tshal de ltar 'dong ngo snyam nas/ gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi khongasu chud par gyur
212b3(mdo sde): pa'i sems can de dag thams cad las sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa na/ spyod pa rnams
212b4(mdo sde): ma gtogs pa sems can lhag ma thams cad de bzhin gshe gas pa de'i spu'i sgo dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du zhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
212b5(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul de dag slar bsdus te bzhengs pa dang / de nas/ sems can de dag gis gcig mthong nas smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs byang
212b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ kye sems can dge bdag cag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs par shes bzhin gyis som shig/ de nas sems can de dag
212b7(mdo sde): gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phyi nang bcas par mthong zhing ji ltar bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs te 'dus par gyur pa rang rang gi mngon gsum du gyur nas// de dag
212b8(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs shing sus 'dir bcug snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i
213a1(mdo sde): 'khor rnams la smras mngon par go bar byas te smras pa/ khyed cag nyon cig/ 'di nani de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'drum/ 
213a2(mdo sde): yin te/ gang gi phyir bdag cag la phan pa mdzad pa ston pa chos ston par mdzad kyis/ de'i phyir khyed cag sems can thams cad kyi soms shig/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams
213a3(mdo sde): kyis thal mo sbyar ba btud pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad bstan to// de la bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba'i 'dam las bsgral
213a4(mdo sde): ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzud pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzud pa dang / thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi rang byung gi ye shes yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'o// / 
213a5(mdo sde): de la bsam gtan la gzud pa'i sems bskyed pa yongasu ba sngo ba rnam pa bcu ste/ 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i dngos po yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la
213a6(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i sems kyis gnas pa dang / sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba'i phyir/ gru chen po yang dag par grub pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log las yongs su thar
213a7(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir/ mgrol bar grol pa'i go cha dang / chos la bdag med par so sor brtag pa'i phyir/ seng ge'i sgra chen pos mi skrag pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam
213a8(mdo sde): dang mig yor lta bur rtogs pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i go cha dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po yongasu dag pa la gnas pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi
213b1(mdo sde): khams thams cad snang bar brgyan par byed pa'i go cha dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yong su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs cu yongasu bsgrub pa'i go cha dang / 
213b2(mdo sde): skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa'i go cha dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ji ltar thos pa'i chos sgrub pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
213b3(mdo sde): pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag ma lus par 'thob pa'i go cha dang / spros pa med pa ste/ de dag ni bde ba spyod pa'i chos thams cad la gzud pa rnam pa bcu'o// mtshan nyid med pa'i sgo yongasu
213b4(mdo sde): shes pa rtogs pa'i spyod pa dang / chos thams cad bdagade med par yid la byed pa dang / sems skye ba med pa dang // 'gag pa med par rtogs pa gang yin pa ni phyir mi ldog
213b5(mdo sde): pa'i sa yin te/ de la ni 'jug pa dang / ldog pa chad tsa rtag pa med pa dang / gdeg pa med pa dang / gzhag pa med pa yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na
213b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khong par zhugs pa'i sems can gang+gA'i klung dung phyur phrag brgyad kyi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// 
213b7(mdo sde): der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa snyed po de dag gis ni gzungs dang / bzod pa rnam pa sna tshogs thob par gyur nas/ thams cad
213b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spu'i sgo dag nas phyir thon pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs
214a1(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khar dang / sku'i chad brtag pa'i phyir/ phyogs bcur rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu dngango // de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
214a2(mdo sde): shar phyogs logasu dang ba dang / shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing dngag tu med grangs med pa dag 'das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub po'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor na
214a3(mdo sde): nyamaso pa med cing / der yang tshig dang don dang / yig 'brurnam pa sna tshogs kyi ska dag de bzhin du thos te/ ji skar de bzhin gshegs pa shIH thub pa'i spyan ldan 'jug pa'i/ 
214a4(mdo sde): chos thos pa de bzhin du de'i chos thos so// gzhan yang den de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sku yang skyes pa 'am/ bri bar mi mngon zhing / de bzhin gshegs
214a5(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan zos dag gis khyab pa snang ste/ de bzhin gshegs/ pa shAkya thub pa'i spu'i sgo gcig na yang byang chub sems
214a6(mdo sde): dpa' dang / nyan thos dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'jug cing 'byung bar snang ngo // de bzhin du spu'i sgo gnyis pa nas/ spu'i sgo thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang 'jug cing
214a7(mdo sde): 'byung bar snang ste/ phyogs cu'i bar du yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i khong par zhugs par gyur pa de dag kyang
214a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i spu'i sgo dag nas phyir 'thon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
214b1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la don dang / tshig dang yi ge dang / 'bru dang sgra dang / brjod pa sna tshogs dag gis bstod cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan 'khod do// de nas/ 
214b2(mdo sde): de'i mod la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa sna tshogs kyi char dag rab tu phab ste/ lha'i sil snyan
214b3(mdo sde): dag kyang rab tu bsil nas/ lha'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / na bza' dang / ras bcos bu dang / rgyan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir
214b4(mdo sde): brtson par gyur to// de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig das med yang dag 'dren ces bya ba de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ 
214b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ban+d+ha na pa bcom ldan 'das lung bstan pa chen po'i mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa
214b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po pa zhes bya ba dang / mang po 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang
214b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lam du sgrol ba zhes bya ba dang / ting 'dzin gyi rtogs pa lo 'jug pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas
214b8(mdo sde): kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba dang / rgya mtsho lta bu zhes bya ba dang / bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / snying rje pad+ma dkar po zhes kyang bya'o// yang gsol
215a1(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 
215a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigasu bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid ba de bsod nams ji snyed cig skyed par 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal ba/ ngas ngo'i bsod nams
215a3(mdo sde): sngar yang smras te/ da yang mdor bsdus te brjod par bya'o// gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang tha na tshigs
215a4(mdo sde): bcad pa gcig tsam yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa dang / gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa na/ tha na bri sa te 'chang bar byed na/ de bsod nams ches mang du skyed
215a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bskal pa/ chen po bcu'i bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i ba sod nams kyi phung po ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
215a6(mdo sde): zhe na/ lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa dang / gnod sprin dang / klu dang dri za dang grul bum dang / 
215a7(mdo sde): yi dgas dang / sha za dang mi 'am ci dang / lha ma yin rnams dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sdang ba'i sems rab tu dang bar bya ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / thab mo dang / 
215a8(mdo sde): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / dus ma yin pa'i char pa dang / 'chi ba dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 
215b1(mdo sde): mu ge thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bde bar bya ba dang / lo legs par bya ba dang / nad med pa tshogs par bya ba dang / skrag pa rnams 'jigs pa med cing bde bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs
215b2(mdo sde): nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar par bya ba dang / theg pa gsum po dag gi lam yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / 
215b3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa thob par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug par bya ba dang / bdud bzhi gzhom par bya ba dang / byang
215b4(mdo sde): chub kyi phyogs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi phyog
215b5(mdo sde): dang ldan par bya ba dang / 'khor mang por bya ba dang / mi 'jigs pa'i grong khyer gyi gnasu 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i phyir ro// ngas
215b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i lag tu gtad par bya// su zhig lnga brgya pa tha ma la nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar 'gyur zhing / chos ma yin pa lhur len pa'i sems can rnams dang / 
215b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong rnams kyi rna lam du sgrogs par 'gyur/ chos ma yin pa la chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams dang / 'dod pa mi bzad pas zil gyis non pa rnams
215b8(mdo sde): dang / chos log pas yongasu dkris pa rnams dang / sems can yongasu ma smin pa rnams kun du skyo ba med par 'gyur zhigu snyam dgongs pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom
216a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi yongasu rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ 'khor de na gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po zhes bya ba zhig kyang 'dug go/ 
216a2(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnod sbyin gyi drang srong bsod nams lhun po de khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
216a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung la/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yul gzhan du song ba'i bar dag gi rna lam du rab tu stsos/ 
216a4(mdo sde): shig/ de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sems skyed du chug shig/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhi/ na du bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das smon lam gyis
216a5(mdo sde): bskal pa chen po brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'das pa nas/ gnod sbyin gyi drang srong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag gis sems can bgrang
216a6(mdo sde): ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag la rab tu bkod cing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la yang rab tu bkod lags te/ bdag gis sems can gang dag lnga brgya tha ma
216a7(mdo sde): la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / gang dag 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigasu bcad pa tsam gyi bar dag 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag kyang bdag nyid kyis yong su smin par bgyid
216a8(mdo sde): lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ 
216b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa snying rje pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs// 
216b2(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin ma tri dang / shI len dra bo d+hi dang / prang dzA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sde la stsogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa// 
216b3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA ruN+Da puN+Da ri ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ snying rje chen po pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ 
216b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bya/ ngag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer na gyang rnams nye bar
216b5(mdo sde): gnas pa shing sa la'i tshal na bzhug so// de na bcom ldan 'das yongs mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
216b6(mdo sde): dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de nub kyi nam gyi thun tha ma la yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bas/ khyod kyis shing sa la zung gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ba'i
216b7(mdo sde): gzims mal chos shig/ kun dga' bo 'dus byasu btags pa thams cad legs par bcom pa'i shin tu yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bas nga yongasu mya ngan las 'da' 'o// kun dga'
216b8(mdo sde): bongs sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ ngas gnas med pa'i chos zhi ba rab tu zhi ba/ mchog gya nom pa/ zab pa mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba brtag mi nus
217a1(mdo sde): ba ma brtags pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ mkhas pa dang 'dzangs pas rig pa/ phul du phyin pas 'phags pa'i bdud rtsi ni brtan kun
217a2(mdo sde): dga' bo ngas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa dge slong ngam/ bramo ze 'am/ bdud dam lnga 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan gang gis kyang chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba lan gas
217a3(mdo sde): du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyisu bskor ba ni bskor/ ngas chos kyi rnga bo che ni brdungs/ ngas chos kyi dung chen po ni bus/ ngas chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po ni bsgreng / ngas chos kyi mar me chen
217a4(mdo sde): po ni bus/ ngas mun pa chen po ni bstsal/ ngas stong gsum ni snang bar byas/ ngas gru chen po ni bcas/ ngas stegs chen po ni btsugs/ ngas zam pa chen po ni btag/ 
217a5(mdo sde): ngas pha rol tu 'dod pa mang po ni bton/ ngas thar pa'i lan/ ni yang dag par brtan/ ngas chos kyi char chen po ni phag/ ngas lha dang mi rnams ni tshim par byas/ ngas gdul
217a6(mdo sde): ba rnams ni btul/ ngas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni skrag par byas/ ngas mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad ni tshar bcad/ ngas bdud kyi stobs ni bcom ngas bdud kyi gnas ni
217a7(mdo sde): g.yo bar byas/ ngas seng ge'i sgra ni bsgrags/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ni byas/ ngas skyes bu dam pa'i las ni mthar phyung / ngas sngon gyi yid ma ni yongasu rdzogs par byas/ ngas
217a8(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul ni byin gyis brlabs/ ngas nyan pos chen po rnams las byed du ni btsung / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyan mi chad par bya ba'i byang / ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems
217b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams lung ni bstan zin te/ kun dga' bo mya ngan las 'da' ba ma gtogs par byas bya ba nga la med do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rnam
217b2(mdo sde): pa de lta bu de zos nas/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ mi dga' zhing mya ngan chen po'i zug rngu zug par gyur nas/ rab tu ngus te mchi ma zag bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
217b3(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' zhing / bde bar gshegs pa rab tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' ste/ 'jig rten gyi mag rab tu myur bar
217b4(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyur/ rab tu myur bar 'jig rteni mgo na ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa dang / yongs dasu 'dren pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas yang btso/ 
217b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' sprul pa/ kun dga' bo chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig/ smre sngags ma 'don cig/ gang gnas pa dang byung
217b6(mdo sde): ba dang / 'dus byas pa dang / bsams pa ni rab tu 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas mi 'jig par ga la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med do// kun dga' bo ngas thog ma nyid du khyad/ 
217b7(mdo sde): la dga' ba dang / sdug pa dang yid du 'ong ba rnams dang tha dad du 'gyur zhing 'gyes par 'gyur// bral bar 'gyur/ bye bar 'gyur ro zhes ma bstan tam/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis
217b8(mdo sde): nga la byams pa'i lus phan pa dang / bde ba dang gnyisu med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / mi mthun pa med pas bsnyen bkur byaso// kun dga' bo gang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'khor du bcas pa
218a1(mdo sde): dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyasu bcas pa la bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la yud tsam
218a2(mdo sde): zhig bsnyen bkur byas pa de/ de bas 'bras bu shin tu ches/ kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan ma byed cig/ smre sngags ma 'don cig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur/ 
218a3(mdo sde): byas pa ni don che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / rgya che ba dang / bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba dang / bdud rtsi la 'bab pa dang / bdud rtsi'i mthar 'gyur ba nas/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
218a4(mdo sde): bar du 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mchi ma phyis nas/ smre sngags 'don cing shing sa la zung gi debar du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas man/ 
218a5(mdo sde): ba'i gzims mal bcas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing sa la ga la ba der gshegs nas/ shing sa la zung / gi bar du se ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal to// gang gi tshe de
218a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shing sa la zung gi bar du seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni shing dang / rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / 
218a7(mdo sde): sman dang nags tshal tha na sor bzhi tsam po yan chad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gang du de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba de log su gzhol/ 'dud rab tu 'dud cing mngon par 'dud par
218a8(mdo sde): gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na klung ngam/ 'bab chu 'am/ chu mig gam mtsho'am/ lteng ka'am khron pa 'am/ rdzing ngam pad+ma dkar po 'bab pa ji snyed yong pa
218b1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pas mi 'bab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bya mang ba dang / ri dgas mang po sna tshogs ji
218b2(mdo sde): snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sgra mi 'byin par 'khod cing mi za mi rgyu bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od ngam/ skar
218b3(mdo sde): ma'i gzugs sam nor bu 'am/ me 'am srin bu me khyer gyi 'od ji snyed pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi mngon mi snang ste/ lam mer ma yin/ lhan ner ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin par
218b4(mdo sde): gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham das na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i mi ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhi bar gyur/ mi
218b5(mdo sde): 'bar bar gyur mi tsha bar gyur/ mi tshig par gyur/ yongasu mi gdung bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong na na po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang sems can dmyal ba chen
218b6(mdo sde): po'i me de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi zhing bsil bar gyur to// de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig de dang yud tsam de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba
218b7(mdo sde): thob par gyur to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/ gcig la gcig gnod sems med/ rnam par 'che ba
218b8(mdo sde): med/ rnam par 'gro 'tsham pa med cing gnod pa byed pa med par gyur to// gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyang bkres pa dang skom pa med par gyur to// sems can thams
219a1(mdo sde): cad kyang skad cig de dang yud tsam de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bde ba dang / lus dang sems tshim pa dang / sdug bsngal rgyun chang ba dang / bde ba dang / 
219a2(mdo sde): yid bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang
219a3(mdo sde): khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / btang zung dang / btang rung chen po dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / gangs ri dzi snyed yod pa dang / gzhan yang ri nag po rnams dang / thams cad dang
219a4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sa chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po khor yug gi 'obs kyi mthas gtugs pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg
219a5(mdo sde): rab tu ldeg par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang de'i tshe mi ldang bar gyur to// de'i tsheskad cig de dang yud tsam de na sems can thams cad kyang
219a6(mdo sde): las byed pa rnams btang bar gyur te/ gnyid med chos pa med/ sgrib pa med rtsom pa med cing cang mi 'dzer bar gyur te/ sgra chung ca co chung zhing yid mi g.yeng bar gyur to// bcom
219a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha
219a8(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi rang rang gi gnas rnams mog mog por gyur te/ 'od med
219b1(mdo sde): gzi med par gyur par shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar glo g.yas pas mnal ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang klu dang / gnod
219b2(mdo sde): skyon dang / dri za dang lA ma yin dang namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad ra
219b3(mdo sde): rang gi stan dang / skyes mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor dang bcas par spro zhing yid byung bar gyur
219b4(mdo sde): to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'a na tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po gang dag zil gyis gnon cing / zil gyis mi non pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang
219b5(mdo sde): sbyar ba 'di snyam du sems shing / bdag cag gis sem sa can 'di dag byasabadag cag gis sems ca/ na 'di dag sprul/ bdag cag gis 'jig rten byas
219b6(mdo sde): bdag cag gis 'jig rten sprul to snyam du de ltar shes pa'i tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa de dag kyang rang rang gi stan
219b7(mdo sde): la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to// rang rang gi thams cad dang ldan pa yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mog mog por gyur par shes so// de bzhin du tshangs pa gzhan thams cad kyang sangs/ 
219b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi gnas rnams mogo mog por gyur par shes te/ rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to// 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po
220a1(mdo sde): dang / gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas rnams la mi dga' bar gyur to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshangs
220a2(mdo sde): pa chen po de 'di snyam du gang gis bdag rang gi gnas la mi dga' bar gyur pa de su'i snga ltas yin snyam du semaso// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa des/ stong gsum gyi
220a3(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan pa la bltaso// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de la bltas nas 'di snyam du gang stong gsum gyi stong chen
220a4(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i byed pa po'i dbang phyug bad dag po dbang sgyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de do nub mya/ 
220a5(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ gang gis bdag rang gi sgra na la 'dug par mi dga' ba dang / gang gi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag
220a6(mdo sde): snang bar gyur pa 'di ni de yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba'i snga ltas yin/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin no snyam du sems te/ de mi dga' zhing yid dung zhes byed de/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ 
220a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'khor mang pos yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ myur ba myur bar rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
220a8(mdo sde): gyi khams tshangs pa lhag ma lus par gyur pa dang / ma 'dus pa dang / tshangs pa de las gzhan pa ji snyed yod pa de dag 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par dul bar gyur/ 'phag
220b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos la gnas par gyur to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
220b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par 'gyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gas
220b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa khyod ni tshangs pa/ tshangs pa chen po zil gyis gnon cing zil gyis mi non/ kun
220b4(mdo sde): shes pa dang ldan pa brgya phrag cu la dbang sgyur ba yin te/ ra bdag gis sems can rnams byas/ bdag gi sa sems can rnams sprul/ bdag gis 'jig
220b5(mdo sde): rten byas/ bdag gis 'jig rten sprul to zhes de snyam du sems shing / de skad zer zhe na 'den nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
220b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa mang ngo // bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa khyod sus byas sus sprul/ de nas tshangs pa chen po cang mi smra bar gyur to// tshangs pa chen po de cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang / 
220b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa gang gi tshe bskal pas bsregs pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'bar rab
220b8(mdo sde): tu 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur par 'gyur pa'i dus de dang / tshe de 'byung ba de tshangs pa khyod nyid kyis byas sam khyod kyi sprul tam
221a1(mdo sde): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gangs chen po 'din chu'i phung ba la rten/ chu yang rlung larten/ rlung sang namakha' la na / 
221a2(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad drug khri brgyad stong yod cing mi 'jigs pa de la ji snyam du sems/ 'di khyod kyis byas shing khyad kyis sprul tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bdeb
221a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gzhal med khang na lha'i bu dag lam me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin zhing gzhal med khangs rnams stong par 'khod
221a4(mdo sde): pa'i dus de dang tshe de 'byung ba de la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa da de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom
221a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ gang sos ka dang / dbyar dang ston dang / dgun dang / dgun smad dang / dpyi da kyi dus tshigs de dag la khyod ji snyam du sems/ de dag kyang
221a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang chu 'am me long gi/ 
221a7(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor ram/ 'bru mar dang mar gyi snod dam/ nor bu dang shel rnams kyi nang ngam/ de las gzhan pa'i snod dag pa rnams la gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba 'di lta ste/ shing
221a8(mdo sde): ljon pa dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhal med khang snang ba 'am/ grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal snang ba 'am/ glang po che dang / rta dang rnga mo
221b1(mdo sde): dang / ba lang dang bong bu dang / lug dang yi dgas dang / bya rnams snang ba 'am/ zla ba dang nyi ma dang / skar ma'i tshogs snang ba 'am/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa
221b2(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku snang ba 'am/ sa dang ri dang / rlung snang ba 'am/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de las gzhan pa'i sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa
221b3(mdo sde): snang ba de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa g.yangs
221b4(mdo sde): dang / ri dang ri'i 'bab chu dang / rdzing rnams na dung dang / rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang / glu gar dang ri dang / bya dang mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sgra'i brag cha dang / gang de dang 'thun pa'i sgra
221b5(mdo sde): brnyan 'byung ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyi/ sa sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// 
221b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi rmi lam na gzugs sna tshogs mthong ba dang / sgra sna tshogs thos pa dang / dro sna tshogs snom pa dang / ro sna tshogs myong ba dang / reg bya sna
221b7(mdo sde): tshogs reg pa dang / chos sna tshogs shes pa dang / dga' ba dang rtsa ba sna tshogs myong ba dang / mchi ma byung ba dang / ngu ba dang 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba mthong ba 'am/ 
221b8(mdo sde): myong ba 'am/ shes pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// 
222a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'jigs pa dang mi dga' ba dang / myangan dang / smre sngags 'dzin pa dang / grang ba dang / chab dang / 
222a2(mdo sde): bkres pa dang skom pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ 
222a3(mdo sde): tshangs pa gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi mdzes pa 'am/ mi sdug pa 'am/ long spyod che ba 'am/ long spyod chung ba 'am/ dbul ba 'am/ bsod nams che ba 'am/ tshul khrims bzang ba'o// 
222a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ shes rab bzang ba 'am/ shes rab 'chal ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam
222a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka 'asprul pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'ja/ gas pa 'am/ skrag pa'am/ gnod pa 'am/ rnam par 'tshe
222a6(mdo sde): ba 'amarnam pa tho 'tsham pa 'di lta ste/ mtshon cha dang mo dang / chu dang rlung mar dang / dug dang gcan zan khro bo dang / dgra dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa 'am
222a7(mdo sde): gzhan gnod pa byed pa'i 'jigs pa sna chags de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
222a8(mdo sde): ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa sems can rnams kyis nang rnam pa sna tshogs rlung deng mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / dus dang / khams mi mthun
222b1(mdo sde): pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa dang / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa las gyur pa 'di lta ste/ mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus na ba dang / sems can rnams kyi/ 
222b2(mdo sde): yid la gdung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// bka'
222b3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang mu ge dang / chu dang 'brog dang / sbrul dang chom rkun dang / dgon pa dang mtshon cha dang / nad dang bar gyi bskal pa de dag tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis
222b4(mdo sde): sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// bka da' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'bral ba'i
222b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pha ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang grogs dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / bu pho dang chung ma dang / bu mo dag dang bral
222b6(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal
222b7(mdo sde): pa/ gang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs yang ba'i las la sbyor ba/ skra dang phabs dang / rgya skyegs dang / 'khor lo 'tshong ba 'am/ rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba
222b8(mdo sde): dang / 'brog dgon par 'jug pa'am/ phyogs sna tshogasu skyes 'debs pa 'am/ zhing gi las rgya cher byed pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i bya ba sna tshogs de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod
223a1(mdo sde): kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lagaso// bka' stsal ba/ tshangs da
223a2(mdo sde): gang sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba las rnam pa sna tshogs yang dge ba las rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par len pa sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / 
223a3(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang mi'i rgyu las byung ba rnams dang / gang sems can rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / legs par spyod pa rnams dang / 
223a4(mdo sde): gang 'jig rten mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sems can rnams la mi phan pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / dganod pa dang ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gyur ba
223a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa/ 
223a6(mdo sde): dang / brnabs sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba de rnams kyang tshangs pa khyod kyi byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin
223a7(mdo sde): nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi gnod byed kyi sdug bsngal 'di lta ste/ mgo bcad pa 'am/ 
223a8(mdo sde): lag pa dang / rkang pa dang rna ba dang / sna gcad pa 'am/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad gcad pa 'am/ mer bsreg pa dang / 'bru mar gyis gtor ba dang / srog dang dbral ba dang / 
223b1(mdo sde): ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pas gdab pa dang / bsad pa dang bcing ba dang / go rar gzhug pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyeng pa de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod
223b2(mdo sde): kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams 'dod pa'i rgyu la 'i khrim
223b3(mdo sde): la log par spyod pa dang / sring mo la log par spyod pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la log par spyod pa dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad la lhag par spyod pa de dag kyang tshangs pa
223b4(mdo sde): khyod kyis bya shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems
223b5(mdo sde): can rnams kyi gnod par byed pa sna tshogs byed dang / ro// langs dang / rig sngags dang sngags dang / sman dang / 'byung po dang / gdon 'bebs pa dang / gang de las
223b6(mdo sde): gzhan pa dug spor ba dang / gang sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba dang / srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / srog 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas
223b7(mdo sde): shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ gang rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten
223b8(mdo sde): thams cad du spang du mi rung ba'i 'jig rten gyi chos 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang
224a1(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa dang / mi rtag pa'i chos nyid dang / zad pa'i chos nyid dang / 'gyur ba'i chos nyid dang / mdza' ba dang / dga' ba
224a2(mdo sde): thams cad dang / tha dad du 'gyur ba dang / mang par 'gyur ba dang / bral bar 'gyur ba dang / bye bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / 
224a3(mdo sde): khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
224a4(mdo sde): dang gti mug dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / bgal shal dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / kun du sbyor ba na dmas dang / de las gzhan pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams
224a5(mdo sde): sna tshogs 'jug pa gang gis sems can rnams chags par 'gyur ba dang / sdang bar 'gyur ba dang / nges par 'gyur ba dang / las mngon par 'du bya ba
224a6(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed pa de dag kyang / tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
224a7(mdo sde): ma lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa gang 'di sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan 'gro rnam pa gsum po gang na sems can
224a8(mdo sde): rnams gnod byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin
224b1(mdo sde): sa / bcom ldan 'das ma lagasas/  sku / ma pa 'byung ba gas sa/ 
224b2(mdo sde): dang nags tshal rgyan gnas pa dang / mang la gnas pa'am/ mi rtag ga shing dang / 'bras du tsho gang dang / spos kyi shing rnam pa sna chags sam/ dang ra ba dang kha ba dang lan/ 
224b3(mdo sde): rma dang / skur ba dang / cha ba dang / bska pa'i rol khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs yi du 'ong ba dang yi mi 'ang ba mngon par 'grub pa gang sems can rnams la phan pa dang / gnang ba/ 
224b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de liji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag dkyis byis shing khyod kyi sprul pa dang khyod kyis byir gyis bsgrubs pa yin nas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
224b5(mdo sde): 'das ma lags// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pagad 'gro ba lnga pa dag na yong su 'khor bar skye bdang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'dun pa dang / 'byung ba / 
224b6(mdo sde): 'jig pa 'di dag dang / tshangs pa gang sems can ma rig pa'i skabs/ sreng pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa/ kun du rgyu ga tsang 'khor ba de dag gi sngon gyi mapa' mo mngon pa
224b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor ba'i lam rgyung ma chang pa gang na lta dang bcas pa dang / mangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'ding po dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang bcas pa'i skye gu zags
224b8(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa lA ba/ du bu 'dzings pa lta bu 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar gyur pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pa ma pas sa 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing kha ra la las 'gyu
225a1(mdo sde): ba mi shes pa de dag la ji snyam du sems/ tshangs pa de dag khyod kyis byas shing khyod kyis sprul pa dang / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin nam
225a2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ma lag so// bka' stsal pa/ 'o na tshangs pa khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar ngas sems can 'di dag byas/ ngas sprul/ 
225a3(mdo sde): ngas byin gyis brlabs/ ngas 'jig rten byas// ngas sprul/ ngas byin gyis brlabs snyam sems/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ma 'tshal ba rtag tu lta bar gyur pa
225a4(mdo sde): ma spangs pas phyin ci log tu gyur pa lags te/ @ma ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rtag tu ma thos pas/ sems can
225a5(mdo sde): rnams bdag gis bgyis bdag gis sprul/ 'jig ste/ na bdag gis bgyis 'jig rten bdag gis sprul ces/ bgyi ba sdig pa can gyi lta bar gyur pa 'di lta bur gyur to// 
225a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid bdag zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten 'di sus bgyis/ 'jig rten 'di sus sprul/ sems can
225a7(mdo sde): rnams sus bgyis/ sus sprul/ bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i mthu lags/ sus byin gyis brlabs/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa de la
225a8(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa 'jig rten ni las kyis byas/ las kyis sprul to// sems can rnams ni las kyis byas las kyi rgyu las byung / las kyis rab
225b1(mdo sde): tu phye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rna rje na shwe ba'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs mang dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis
225b2(mdo sde): skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid
225b3(mdo sde): pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar
225b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' shig 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / tshangs pa ma rig pa 'gags pa nas sku dag bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'gags pa'i bar du
225b5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ tshangs pa las dang chos kyi kun tu sbyor ba rna mas yod na/ sems can rnams 'byung bar snang ba dang / las dang chos kyi kun du sbyor ba dang bral bas 'byung ba med
225b6(mdo sde): par snang ba ma gtogs par 'di la byed pa po 'am/ bye du 'jug pa 'am/ nye bar gzhog pa po gang yang med do// tshangs pa de ltar 'jig rten 'di las zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa zad pa dang
225b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zad pa dang / sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang / nges par byung ba dang / rnam par zhi ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// tshangs pa de la las gang
225b8(mdo sde): yin pa de zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dang bral ba dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa de rnam par zhi ba dang / nub pa ma gtogs par yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ci zhig
226a1(mdo sde): yod de/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos nyid de lta bu dag 'byung // dena'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs bsangs/ 
226a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba med na/ chos de lta bu rab tu ston pa mi 'byung gi/ tshangs pa gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe zhi bar bya ba'i
226a3(mdo sde): phyir khong du chud par dka' ba zab pa zab par snang ba/ chos rnam pa de lta bu dag yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ de thos pas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni skye ba las yongasu grol bar
226a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ sems can rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngag sa 'don dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni 'khrug pa'i bar dag las yod/ 
226a5(mdo sde): su grol bar 'gyuraro// tshangs pa de lta bas na 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad ni mig yor lta bu/ mi rtag pag/ yo ba/ mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin pa/ zad pa dang
226a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i chos can zhes tshangs pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis de bstan cing yang dag par bshad de rnam par phye zhing gsal bar mdzad do/ 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabaso// 
226a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na yang 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mig yor lta bu'o zhes bya ba de nyid byin gyis brlabs
226a8(mdo sde): yin no// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'du byed thams cad mig yor lta bur ma gzigasu zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skad cig zang cig yud tsam yang 'du byed
226b1(mdo sde): thams cad rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha lta bur mi ston pa zhig na/ tshangs pa gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang / brag cha lta bu
226b2(mdo sde): dang / mi rtag pa dang / g.yo ba dang / 'gyur ba'i chos can du mkhyen pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang mig yor dang / brag cha lta bur ston to// de la mkhas// 
226b3(mdo sde): pa de'i mtshan ma mthong ba dag yod de/ de'i mtshan ma mthong nas rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang dmigs pa'i mtshan ma des 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par khong du chud cing g.yo ba dang 'gyur ba'i chos can na
226b4(mdo sde): zhes rnam par 'byed do// 'du byed thams cad ni 'jig cing 'gyu ro// dus dang tshig dang dus tshigs kyis kyang 'jig dgo/ skad cig dang thad cig dang phyod tsam dang / yud tsam
226b5(mdo sde): dang zhag dang nyi ma dang / zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang / lo dang lo brgya dang / bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya dag kyang la jig par 'gyuraro// me'i phung po chen po yang 'bar nas sha
226b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// chu'i phung po chen po yang bab nas mi 'bab bo// rlung gi phung po chen po yang langs nas mi ldang ngo // sa'i phung po chen po yang byung nas med par 'gyur ro// ra la phung ba chen
226b7(mdo sde): pa yang byung nas med par 'gyur ro// ri'i phung po chen po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / lhun po dang lhun po chen po dang / de las gzhan pa ri nag po dag kyang byung nas med par
226b8(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// nyi ma bzla dang skar ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dag kyang byung nas/ lam mer ma yin/ lhan ner ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin zhing slar ltung ngo // lha yul ba lha'i gzhal med khang
227a1(mdo sde): bzang po dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro// grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal 'di dag dang / shing ljon pa dang / nags chal dang / bsgred mas tshal dang / 
227a2(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba 'di dag kyang byung nas 'gag par 'gyur// lha dang mi 'di rnams kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang 'pho ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu 'dzangs shing mkhas pa'ang
227a3(mdo sde): dag kyang mtshan ma de mthong nas/ kye ma'o 'du byed 'di thams cad mi rtag go 'jig go// 'du byed 'di thams cad med par 'gro'o 'gyur// 'du byed 'di thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// 
227a4(mdo sde): snyam nas skyo bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu 'dzangs shing mkhas rab 'di dag rgyu de dang rkyen des khyim nas kyi Ta rab tu 'byung ngo // de dag dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu byung / 
227a5(mdo sde): nas kyang / 'du byed thams cad mig yor lta bu dang / rmi lam/ lta bu dang / brag cha lta bur rig ste/ mtshan ma de dang / dmigs bde dang / rkyen des byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
227a6(mdo sde): chu'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang / skar ma'i gzugs snang ba de dag mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas btams pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i
227a7(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis btams pa'am/ bdag gi blos brtags pas/ 'du byed thams cad rmi lam dang / mig yor dang brag cha lta bur rtogs nas/ dad pas khyi gyi na par rab tu byung ste/ 
227a8(mdo sde): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems
227b1(mdo sde): dpa'i theg pa pa bzod pa dang po thob pa dang / bzod pa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa dag yod do// 
227b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyis chos bstan pa 'di nyid 'jig rten du byung ste/ de thos pas sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
227b3(mdo sde): pa dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang / ldan pa dang / theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa 'di ltar 'di yang sangs rgyas
227b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi byin gyis brlabasu rig par bya ste/ tshangs pa gang dgis skyes bu mkhas pa dag gis 'du byed 'di dag/ ni sdug bsngal ba g.yo ba mi brtan pa zad pa dang 'gyur ba'i chos
227b5(mdo sde): can te/ rmi lam dang mig yor dang / brag cha lta bu'o// zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma de mthong nas/ yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang / sangs
227b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byin gyis rlab so// sngon spyad cing sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i sems can sngon yongasu smin par byas pa dag gis chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/ 'du byed 'di dag thams cad ni mi
227b7(mdo sde): rtag pa/ 'du byed rnams ni 'jig pa ste/ 'du byed thams cad ni rmi lam dang brag cha lta bu'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la mos par 'gyur/ mngon par dang bar 'gyur/ 
227b8(mdo sde): sems can gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par gyur pa 'am/ khyim par gyur pas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yongasu bzung bar gyur
228a1(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang rgyu de dang rkyen des 'di ltar 'du byed rnams mi rtag pa dang / 'du byed rnams sdug bsngal ba dang / 'du byed rnams 'jig pa dang / 'du
228a2(mdo sde): byed rnams rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha lta bu'o zhes 'du byed rnams de lta bu'i tshul du rtog par 'gyur te/ rgyu de dang rkyen des dad pas khyim nas khyim med pa rab tu byung nas/ 
228a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs nyid dang / sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i rkyen gyis byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
228a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byin/ gyis rlabs dang / 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin/ par rig par bya'o// tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
228a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin te/ tshangs pa 'di ni nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
228a6(mdo sde): grangs med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med grangs med pa bskyed de/ tshul khrims dang / dka' thub dang / tshangs par spyod
228a7(mdo sde): pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i dka' ba spyad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yongasu dag par 'gyur ba dang / 
228a8(mdo sde): dus dang tshod snod ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba nye bar bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu bzung ngo // yongasu spyad so// ngas sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang / don spyad pa
228b1(mdo sde): dang don 'thun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can rnams yang dag par bsdus te/ de dag nga'i smon lam nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes nas ngas chos bstan par
228b2(mdo sde): shes so// nga'i chos bstan pas 'dul bar yang 'gyur te/ brgya byin rnams kyi ma yin/ tshangs pa rnams kyi ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi ma yin no// tshangs pa rnam gra
228b3(mdo sde): 'dis kyang de 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yin gyi/ brgya byin rnams kyi ma yin/ tshangs pa rnams kyis ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ 
228b4(mdo sde): kyis ma yin/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa can dang / kun du rgyu rnams kyi ma yin par rig par bya'o// de nas dmi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'bum phrag bcu'i bdag po
228b5(mdo sde): pa de dang de las gzhan pa'i tshangs pa rnams skyo zhing yid byung / bar gyur te/ tshig 'di skad ces ji tsam du sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa
228b6(mdo sde): ngo mtshar to// ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa de 'tshar to zhes smraso// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa de de bzhin gshegs
228b7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la rmad du 'dzin par gyur te/ ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtha' yas pa
228b8(mdo sde): ngo mtshar to snyam mo// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshangs pa chen po de bcom ldan 'das kyi slob mar khas blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu song su
229a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas par
229a2(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes bcom ldan 'das la bka' lung yang nod par gyur to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
229a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin/ 'di ni nga'i
229a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin te/ tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyod la gtad kyis khyod ci nas kyang nga'i rjesu 'jug par gyis
229a5(mdo sde): la/ dge ba'i lam 'di dang / dge ba'i tshul 'di dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang cha sa kyi tshul/ dge 'dun gyi tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chang ba
229a6(mdo sde): gyis shig/ nga ni 'di'i skyes bu tha ma'o// tshangs pa bu'i thu bo gzho nu thugs las skyes pa/ zhal nas skyes pa/ chos las byung ba/ chos kyis sprul pa
229a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po'i don 'dod pa phan pa 'dod pa/ bde ba 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba 'dod pa
229a8(mdo sde): 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji ltar ngas gnas pa bzhin du chos kyis gnas 'gyur gyis/ ji ltar ngal rjesu 'thun
229b1(mdo sde): par byed pa de bzhin du de la rjesu 'thun par gyis shig/ ci nas kyang khyod kyis dge ba'i lam 'di dang / dge ba'i tshul 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang / chos kyi tshul dang
229b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi tshul 'di rgyun mi 'chad par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa ji tsam du dge ba'i tshul 'di lta bu 'di rgyun mi chad pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang / chos kyi
229b3(mdo sde): tshul dang dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang mi'i tshul dang thar pa'i tshul nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul gyi
229b4(mdo sde): bar du rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro// tshangs pa de lta bas na ste/ rang gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa rgyas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyod la gtang ngo // tshangs
229b5(mdo sde): ba khyod la bka' stsal pa ni 'di yin/ rjesu bstan pa ni 'di yin gyis khyod kyis 'di bzhin dugyis shig/ nga ni 'di'i skyes bu tha ma'o// de'i tshe stong
229b6(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa chen po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa'i chos la mngon par dul bar gyur te/ tshangs pa chen
229b7(mdo sde): po de gcig pu ni ma gtogs so// tshangs pa chen po stong gi tshangs pa de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i chos la btul zhing bzhag par gyur to// tshangs pa'i le'u ste dang po
229b8(mdo sde): rdzogs so// / bam po gnyis pa// de'i tshe bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das la dad cing dang ba chen po
230a1(mdo sde): thob par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgra bos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal
230a2(mdo sde): bdang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ skyo zhing yid byung la spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas myur ba myur bar rings pa'i tshul du/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin na/ 
230a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bdud kyi bu ded dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
230a4(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gsol ba 'tshal na/ sman par bgyi ba'i slad du yongasu mya ngan las mi 'dar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
230a5(mdo sde): rten la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang sman pa dang / 
230a6(mdo sde): bde ba'i slad du bzhugasu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ha cang myur du long ba dang / mig ma mchis pa dang / ston pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dren pa ma mchis pa dang / dpung gnyen
230a7(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis pa dang / rten ma mchis par mi 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi bu ded dpon la 'di
230a8(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// ded dpon khyod kyi pha bdud sdig can gyis ngal bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'dar gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'dar gsol/ bcom
230b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das khyod deng yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab bo zhes gsol ba btab nas/ khyod kyi pha bdud sdig can lang mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smras te/ ded dpon bdud sdig can lang yongasu
